choices: See your computer turn on by itself...
1.content:
"Alex!" a loud female voice bellowed from below you, "You had better be up, young man!"

"Ugh..."

You opened your eyes to the unwanted glow of rude sunshine peeking through your closed blinds. A cursory glance to the clock on your nightstand revealed that it was half past noon in glowing neon green digits, lovely. With a yawn, you sat up and blinked blearily, staring off into space while your sleep addled brain kicked itself awake.

"God dammit," you mumbled tiredly, "that's the last time I start a game of Civilization at midnight..."

Indeed, starting a game of the famed Empire Builder at such a late hour was a horrible idea, especially given that an average game tended to last hours on end. That being said, you were almost certain to do it again at some point. Rinse and repeat.

"Alex!" the loud female voice shouted again.

"I'm up! I'm up!" you called back, not willing to risk the earful you'd inevitably receive if you stayed in bed any longer.

After all, your mom, though fairly tolerant of your chronic oversleeping during Summer Vacation, wasn't about to let you sleep until 2 o'clock like you wanted to after long nights of gaming or reading your favorite books.

With a long-suffering sigh, you got out of your nice, warm bed and stumbled across your room, pausing for a moment to look at your unkempt reflection in the mirror hanging on the back of your bedroom door.

Ignoring the fact that you looked like a zombie freshly risen from the grave, you cut a fairly good-looking figure, in a sort of average kind of way. Your mop of messy dark brown hair sat over perpetually sleepy-looking dark brown eyes, thick brows, a slim, slightly roman nose, thinly pursed lips, and a strong, angular jawline. Pale skin and a slight dusting of stubble on the lower half of your face gave you a scruffy look that you tended to prefer as opposed to clean cut.

A fairly handsome face, if your mother was to be believed. Though, given that said compliment came from your MOTHER of all people, gave you cause for slight doubt. As your mom, she probably felt the need to flatter you.

You certainly weren't going to win any awards for bodybuilding but you liked to think you had a sort of slim and sinewy kind of figure. Fit, without being built, but definitely not out of shape either.

Odd, considering your somewhat hermit-like lifestyle.

But you weren't about to complain, given the alternative...

Grumbling under your breath, you...
1.title: A Journey Begins...

choices: Something is strange about the food you eat for lunch.
Something is off about your mom.
There's a package addressed to you at the door.
Someone's at the door looking for you.
11.content:
You groaned as you got dressed to appease the shrieking cries of your mother, as least throwing on jeans and a new shirt that didn't stink of man funk. You weren't about to comb your mess of hair when it already sounded like your mom was irritated enough. Maybe going down to have some food would appease her enough to get her off your back for the day.

Just another typical lazy summer day.

Though, as you headed downstairs, you were about to discover that this day was about to be anything but typical. Especially as you discovered downstairs...
11.title: Downstairs We Go

111.content: What does Alex encounter on his plate?
111.title: Choice: Freaky Food Day

choices: Heading to your bedroom for some more gaming, you notice a few big changes...
Going outside for some fresh air, a stray cat quickly warms up to you.
You're surprised to find your sister Tori treating you so affectionately...
1111.content:
"Glad to see you out of your cave again, honey," your mom joked as she heard the sound of the creaky floorboards from your bare feet walking down the stairs. Stepping into the dining room she continued speaking without so much as a head turn, focused on moving some clean and dry plates to the cupboards above the sink. "Food's on the table." You were ready to dig into the usual bowl of cereal that she poured out for you, but instead what you saw most certainly did not belong anywhere near that food group.

"Uh...mom? What's this?" you asked, pointing at the chunks of meat currently resting on your plate.

"What, suddenly tired of salmon now?" your mom chuckled. "I don't remember you being so picky about what you ate..."

"I mean...I guess not?" Seafood wasn't something you ate on a regular basis- let alone for lunch. But for all you knew, it was some new Mediterranean diet she was hooked on, and you knew better than to complain about being dragged into it with her. Might as well just put up with it for a week or two, before she gave up on it. Besides, there could be plenty of worse things showing up on your plate.

At least, that's what went through your mind right up until the first bite of salmon.

What the-?! you think while immediately opening your mouth to spit the food back onto the plate. "Mom, is this raw?"

She shrugs in response. "If you want it cooked, you know where the microwave is."

You look at her in disbelief for a moment before getting up, sighing while putting the fish (pre-chewed part included) under 2 minutes of heat. Is this like, a passive-aggressive way to get me to make my own lunch from now on? It wouldn't be like her to do such a thing, but then again, she has been pouring your cereal and making your meals for a long time now. Could've just been straightforward about it, though...

Either way, the rest of your meal goes relatively smoothly; the fish brings a surprisingly positive reaction to your taste buds despite being unseasoned. "Any chance for seconds, mom?"

"You just ate, Alex," she chastises. "No more food until dinner. Well, maybe a treat later, but that's it."

Ooh, is she going out for ice cream? I hope so. You make sure to wash your plate to keep your mother placated, before deciding what to do with the rest of your day...
1111.title: Seafood Surprise

113.content:
As you made your way to the kitchen for some "breakfast," you were stopped by an unusual sight. There was a cardboard box waiting for you at the front door, right at the bottom of your stairs. That wasn't so atypical, your mom would often mail a variety of packages as a part of her business. Only this one wasn't outgoing, it was incoming.

And it was addressed to you.

"What the heck?" you whispered to yourself as you paused to get a better look at the item.

It was in a standard cardboard box, big enough that just about anything could be in it and you had to use both arms just to reach around. Surprisingly, it wasn't too heavy to lift. Or maybe it was and you were just that strong? It was hard to say without opening it up. And you were left wondering who would send you such a thing.

However, a glance at the label only revealed your name and address. The return address was simply "A friend" and nothing else.

You knew for a fact that your mom would be against you opening such a sketchy looking package. She probably intended to hide it away from you but had left it out not thinking you would find it. Unlucky for her you were a bit more perceptive than that. You hoisted the box up and scurried to your bedroom real quick before doubling back to grab your food.

When you returned with your "breakfast" peanut butter sandwich in your mouth, you immediately loomed over the package waiting on your bed and prepared to tear into it like a savage animal.

To your surprise, what was waiting for you at the bottom of the box was...
113.title: The Mysterious Package

1131.content:
It's a...onesie. Not the thing that you actually expected to find in the box. Holding it up, it does look different than usual. You're pretty sure onesies don't have a computer microchip in the back; not to mention the smell of the thing. It smells heavy of incense, just like in Ms. Simone's drama class. On the bottom of the box lies an instruction manual, if you could read it somehow. The different languages are unknown to you.

But what else do you have a computer for? You quickly fire it up and while eating your sandwich you slowly translate some parts of the instruction manual. It describes the onesie as a suit and when you put it on you can "take over" someone. Licking your fingers you think about it; is this real or some kind of prank someone is pulling on you? Are there somehow cameras hanging in your room. Looking around everything looks the same, but then again they don't have to be big to work.

Rubbing your chin you think it over. You can always try it, right? And what if it is a prank, at least it isn't humiliating. Pulling off your clothes you then grab hold of the suit. The suit is a tight fit; you can barely breath in this thing. You are happy that it's still morning as it isn't warm yet.

"Okay, what now?" You ask yourself out loud, but as soon as you say it you notice a soft ringing that gets louder. As you want to put the suit off you feel a blast coming from your back, knocking you to the ground unconscious.

When you wake up you have the mother of all headaches. Everything is blurry and you feel awful; like something sucked the life out of you. "That's it, off with you." You mumble as you try to pull the suit off, but you can't. The suit is stuck to your body. When you try to pull it off your head, it feels like you try to pull your head off as well.

"Uh oh." You begin to panic. What if you were permanently stuck inside this suit? You can already hear everyone at school laughing at you.

Perhaps it's best you get some help. But who to go to help for?
1131.title: Some weird clothing.

choices: Put it back in the box.
Call your genius cousin about the Swapper
1132.content:
If there was something you expected to be in the package, this surely wasn’t it.

Sitting at the bottom of the box, resting comfortably in some packing peanuts, was what looked like some sort of gun. That is to say, calling a it gun might not be totally correct, it looked like a prop from some steampunk film or cosplay.

It was heavy looking thing, about the size of the airsoft sub machine gun you had in your closet,, primarily made out of a tarnished, coppery metal and bolted together with gold bolts and banding. The main body of the “gun” was occupied by several long glass tubes and the “barrel” was a long, thin needle-like protrusion. Various dials and gauges were scattered here and there across the device’s surface.

All in all, a very strange looking thing.

“Almost looks like a syringe and a rifle had sex at a steampunk conversation...” You mused as you picked up the gun.

It was lighter than it looked, but still had a good amount of heft to it.

Turning it over in your hands.m, you spotted an ornate looking plaque riveted to the side of the gun’s body.

“Swapper V1.0” you read aloud.

Well that didn’t exactly help you in figuring out just what this thing was and why someone would send it to you. Steampunk stuff was cool and all but you didn’t like it enough to warrant someone gifting such a well made prop to you.

Setting the “Swapper” down on its side, you returned your attention to the box.

“Maybe there’s something else in here... Aha!” You crowed in triumph, retrieving a small pamphlet printed on old, yellowed paper from under the packing peanuts.

Unfolding it revealed a cheerfully drawn old school cartoon like the ones you would see in one of your post apocalyptic video games.

“Introducing the amazing Swapper!” You read quietly, “the only device that lets you take a walk in someone else’s shoes!”


The “instructions” were a comic strip, oddly enough. Ten panels seemed to illustrate how to use the Swapper.

The first panel of the comic strip had a widely smiling caricature of a dapper looking blond haired man in a suit holding the Swapper.

Standing next to him was an oblivious looking caricature of a young brunette woman dressed in a bright red 1950’s style swing dress and matching heels.

The second panel showed the little man aiming the needle like barrel of the Swapper at the young woman.

The third had a thin beam of green energy shooting from the Swapper and hitting the woman.

The fourth panel showed the woman seemingly disintegrating into motes of pink light, which entered the Swapper. A close up panel had the tubes filling with a soupy pink liquid.

“Uh... huh,” was your eloquent response.

After the fourth panel, things got weird.

The fifth panel had the man positioning the Swapper over the junction of his inner elbow and pulling the trigger.

The sixth panel had the Swapper extend three stabilization legs, before plunging the needle like barrel into the mans arm.

The seventh looked like the man’s arm was bubbling up.

“Okay this is just getting weirder...” you mumbled.

The eighth panel showed the man entire body bubbling and seemingly shrinking. But oddly enough, the little mans hair looked like it was getting longer and turning brown while his clothing was turning red.

The ninth had the grinning man’s suit visibly unfurling into a perfect clone of the woman’s red swing dress while his body shrank and became curvier looking, becoming more feminine looking.

And finally on the tenth, a perfect clone of the woman who had been shot and absorbed by the Swapper stood alone with a wide grin on her face.

You slowly put the pamphlet down, unsure what to make of it. A part of you wondered if this was all just a joke and someone was having a good laugh at your expense, but another part was more curious.

“Someone went to great trouble to make this,” you reasoned, “this seems too elaborate to be a prank...”

So that left you with the decision of whether or not to humor this “Swapper” malarkey and try it out, or put it back in the box and ignore it.
1132.title: A Strange Reunion

11322.content:
While you had to wonder who on earth would send you such a gift, even if it was all a gag, you had to admit that deep down you were curious about its functions. Hell, imagine if it worked! No more angry mom pissed at you for sleeping in all day. You could actually BE mom and get away with anything you wanted. Why was that idea so enticing to you? You had never really thought about it before...

First thing was first though, you needed to decide on a target.

Obviously, you couldn't just run out zapping people like a madman. This wasn't GTA and you didn't want to have to explain to the cops what your gun did, if it even worked at all. More likely than not, you were holding a very detailed and expensive toy. It certainly would appear that way to anyone at a glance. You could use that to your advantage in choosing who you were going to zap.

But who would be your first victim?
11322.title: A Test Drive

choices: Use the Swapper on your Mother
Use the Swapper on someone else in your family
113221.content:
Obviously it wouldn’t be a good idea to go wandering around zapping random people without making sure that the gun actually worked, so picking someone in your family seemed like a safe bet.

In your immediate family you had three options available to you.

The first was, obviously, your clingy, overbearing, and overprotective mother (https://i.pinimg.com/736x/83/94/90/83949...)

Don’t get you wrong, you loved your mother but there were times where her overbearing and overprotective nature really got under your skin.

If the Swapper did as it was advertised, you could effectively take your mother’s place. As the “instructions” said, you could walk a mile in her shoes.

The other option was the Queen Bitch herself, your elder sister, Victoria (https://thumb-p9.xhcdn.com/a/3t0ZoW7UgHL...)

While there had been a time you had gotten along with your older sister, that had long passed since she got to high school. Victoria had developed early and inherited the Hewitt family’s large bustline and natural beauty, which gave her gave her an in to join the popular kids.

Naturally, this gave her an ego the size of Jupiter and a bitchy attitude towards you that could curdle milk. She was hot and she knew it.

Using the Swapper on her could be that wonderful bit of vengeance on her for being so nasty towards you.

But there was a few other options as well.

What would you do?
113221.title: A Family Matter

choices: Zap someone else and see what happens.
1132211.content:
As you thought about your decision, the ear splitting cry of your mom called out from the stairs.

"Alex? Are you done eating yet? Don't make me come all the way up there, you have chores to do today! I'm tired of having you laze about the house all summer, you have to earn your keep, mister."

You stuck your tongue out in disgust. This might be the last summer you would get to truly enjoy with college just around the corner. You weren't about to spend it wasting time doing trivial tasks around the house when your sisters all did nothing and never got flack for it. Your mom always did play favorites with them.

That thought alone made you grip handle of the Swapper tight and hoist it over your shoulder, like a rifleman ready to go into battle. There was no one to boss you around if there was no mom. In the moment, you weren't quite thinking clearly of the consequences of your decision but you had made up your mind. Your mother was going to be the first target.

You didn't answer her cries for your attention. But you shuffled around your room to get into a good position. Your mom had no doubt heard you moving and knew you were up there ignoring her.

"Young man, if I have to go fetch you, you're going to be in big trouble. You already missed half the day as it is!"

You took cover behind your bed like a trench as you aimed the Swapper squarely at the door. All you had to do was wait. Ready...

"You better not be playing games again Alex," your mom said as you heard her begin to ascend the stairs. "I mean it!"

As the door knob jiggled, you put a finger to the trigger. Aim...

"Alex!" said your mom as she opened the door. "What are you--?"

Fire!

The last you saw of your mom was her eyes wide with surprise as a bolt of blue lightning arced from the Swapper's muzzle. It struck her right in the chest and she was left with no time to even process what was happening to her as her body began to disintegrate. It was over so quick that it wasn't even painful as you watched the shocked expression of your mom dissolve away, much like your favorite characters in Infinity War. The only difference though was that her empty clothes were left behind as they collapsed in a heap on the floor. Heidi Tucker had vanished off the face of the earth.

You stood blinking at the smoking sundress, bra, and panties on your bedroom as the Swapper hummed to life.

There had been no kickback when you fired it, but now it was rumbling fiercely as the gears whirled and pumps spewed steam. A hot red liquid began to form in the primarily tube of the gun, as well as the strangest scent of cinnamon and spices in the air. Something clicked as the movement ceased and a green light lit up above a single knob. The words "Inject" were inscribed at the base.

"Holy crap," you said, falling on the bed with your prize in tow. "It worked!"

It wasn't quite how it had been depicted in the comic. The comic showed even the victim's clothes were absorbed in the process, when that wasn't the case here with the evidence still on your bedroom floor. But, as far as you could tell, you had collected your mother's very essence in a glass tube! There was just a matter of the second half of the instruction comic...

It was all well and good to zap away your mom, but to actually become here? The thought gave you pause. Now that the rush was wearing off, you had to ask yourself if that was really what you wanted. Did you really want to spend a day in her tiny women size five shoes? How would you even change back? Or was that a thought for later?

Perhaps you shouldn't be in a hurry to inject yourself with a potentially poisonous liquid. Maybe you could find another dummy to do that?

Also, what would happen if you fired the gun twice? What? Would your mom's essence mix with another victims? Or would it just enhance your mom's traits that already existed? So many decisions, so little time. You had to act fast before someone realized your mom was missing.
1132211.title: Zapping Mom

choices: You begin to feel like your blood is boiling in your veins.
You wait a bit longer before deciding it didn't work and leave the room
Someone knocks on your bedroom door.
11322111.content:
The Swapper had proudly advertised itself as a way to "Walk a Mile In Someone's Shoes", so if anything, you thought if anyone was going to walk in your Mom's tiny shoes, it'd better be you. That, and there wasn't anyone you'd actually consider trusting with the info of a gun that could literally atomize people and create serums from their raw essence.

Yeah, that sounded like a conspiracy that wasn't worth attracting any outside attention. Something told you that lots of undesirables would kill to get their mitts on this thing.

So, you supposed, it'd better be you.

"So," you murmured, picking up the instruction manual, "how do I do this?"

The instruction manual, more of a comic actually, wasn't much help. Where there should've been a detailed write up with numbered steps, all you had was some vague illustrations that didn't even seem to be totally relevant, given that your Mother's plus sized sundress and undergarments were laying in a steaming pile on your floor instead of being outright absorbed like the comic suggested.

Normally, such vague "instructions" would've been a red flag, but you were too drunk on giddiness or adrenaline to actually consider your actions carefully.

You hefted the gun into position, mimicking the comic as best you could, with the needle like barrel pointing at the large vein in the hollow of your elbow. It was kind of an awkward position, given the size and weight of the Swapper, but you eventually thumbed the "Inject" knob and took a deep breath.

"OK," you said, steeling yourself, "here... we... go!"

You gave the knob a twist and the Swapper came to life. The gun made a low whirring sound as long, spindly legs extended from the front of the Swapper's barrel, gripping your arm and holding itself steady.

Slowly, the gun backed off, before ramming forward and piercing your arm with the needle.

You hissed in mild pain. It didn't hurt that much but it felt a lot like the unpleasant shots you had to get when you went to the doctor's office for your annual checkups.

You bit your lip as the pain slowly numbed and the red liquid in the main tube, your mother's concentrated essence, was pushed into your bloodstream. It felt like you were pumping cement through your veins, the liquid essence of your mother was so thick and soupy. The overbearing stink of cinnamon and spice filled the air as the last of the liquid vanished into your arm.

The gun released your arm and you set it down... and waited.

A moment passed, and another.

With a frown, you looked down at the injection point, wondering if you had done anything wrong. The vague instructions would be no help here, if they ever were in the first place.

So what now? Did you simply sit here and wait? Did it even work?
11322111.title: Essence of Mommy

choices: Feed Susie and hope she doesn't notice your hair.
Just leave the house and Susie behind.
Zap Susie and get some peace and quiet.
113221113.content:
Before you could even think, there was a knock on your bedroom door which made you thankful that you had thought to close and lock it during your experiment.

"Alex?" cried your little sister, Susanna. "Are you in there?"

You looked around the debris of your attack on your mother. With the literal smoking gun with the clothes on the floor and the Swapper laid strewn across your bed, it was clear enough what happen that even a ten year old girl like little Susie could figure it out. You muttered a curse and tossed the Swapper under your bed. Then you gathered up mom's clothes and hid them behind your back as your little sister continued pounding at your door.

"Come on, Alex! Why do you always lock it! That's mean!"

"Alright, alright," you answered it. "For crying out loud. What do you want?"

"I can't find mommy," Susie gave you a pout. "And I'm hungry."

"Mom...Said she was going out," you said while thinking a quick lie. "She didn't say when she was getting back."

"Well, I'm hungry! I haven't eaten since breakfast..."

"Just make yourself a sandwich or something."

"I don't know how. Can you do it?"

You groaned, playing with the idea that you could just zap your sister too. Then maybe you might have some peace and quiet around here for a change. But you fought against the idea. You had no idea how you were even going to get your mom back at this rate, that thought troubled you in the back of your mind as you shooed Susie downstairs.

"Fine, I'll make you a peanut butter sandwich. Does that sound okay?"

"Yes, but you have to cut it in triangles!"

You hid your sigh. Both of your sisters were major prima donnas when it came to having things just so. Your mother had spoiled them rotten. Part of you wished that the injection really did work, then you could set them both straight and there would be nothing they could do about it. Instead, all the injection had seemed to do was give you a sore arm. Though, strangely enough, there wasn't even a mark anymore on where it had stung you.

As you made your way to the kitchen, Susie waited for you in the living room, going off to play with her dolls while you served her. You dropped your mother's discarded clothing on the counter and pulled out the necessary ingredients for Susie's sandwich. Best to get this over with quick before you decided your next move.

As you slathered peanut butter over the rye bread, you felt a weird itch at the top of your head.

You absentmindedly scratched away at it as you continued your work. You did pay it more attention, however, when your hair started to get in your eyes. That was impossible, considering you had just gotten your haircut last week and left it really short to combat the summer heat.

Dropping what you were doing, you made your way to the chrome fridge to get a glance at your reflection.

"Oh my god," you said. "Its...Working?"

If you sat still, you could still feel the thick liquid from the Swapper coursing through your veins. Working through the blood must have meant a delay in the actual process as it flooded every corner of your body. Though you could feel it rushing to your head, feeding into your hair follicles and commanding them to grow. Every inch of your was being rewritten on a genetic level to match your mother's appearance. And such a process took a long time, starting with your hair first as the most commonly lost and replaced part of your body.

Sure enough, as you stared watching your widened reflection, you could see your hair growing out. It was at least two inches longer than it had been before the injection. And if you squinted just enough, it seemed to be taking on a shade of red.

You might have been more fascinated to watch the transformation were it not for the annoyed call of your sister.

"Alex? What's taking so long?"

Ugh, Susie could ruin everything with her big mouth, something she had definitely inherited from mom. You would fix her straight when this was all said and down. You just had to finish making the sandwich and hope she wouldn't notice your changing hairstyle. Or maybe you could just run away and she'd never know.

Then again, entertaining the idea of zapping her too might give you a quiet house to work with while your body assimilated your mother's essence.

You decided to..
113221113.title: Motherly Duties

choices: The pale skin begins to spread and more of you changes.
Susie got bored quickly and came upstairs to bother you.
Victoria knocks on your door, thinking you had taken something from her
1132211131.content:
While running off and leaving Susie to her own devices while you underwent your impending transformation was tempting, you decided that was a bad idea.

The last thing you wanted was to have some random passerby catch a glimpse of you as you turned into a clone of your mother.

So, you decided to take a chance, playing to your sister’s naivety. Your hair was only slightly longer and the reddish tinge it was slowly developing was subtle enough to blame it on the lighting.

Placing the sandwiches, cut into neat triangles as Susie insisted, onto a plate, you made your way to the table where the little redhead waited.

“Here you go, brat.”

Susie stared at the plate of sandwiches you held out to her critically, like she didn’t trust them because it was YOU, and not your mom, who made them.

“Well,” you said, getting impatient, “you gonna take em or not?”

Susie looked up at you and squinted in confusion.

Your heart thudded in your ears as she stared up at you. Had you hair grown more? Had it gotten even redder in the short time since you last checked? You didn’t feel like it had, you would’ve felt the sensation of it growing immediately.

For a what seemed like forever, she just stared at you before she finally spoke.

“You look weird.” She stated flatly.

You chuckled nervously.

“What? No I don’t.”

Susie didn’t look convinced.

“Yeah huh, your hair looks red.”

A part of you just wanted to bolt back to the safety of your room to let the transformation run its course in private but Susie had you pinned in place with her suspicious stare.

You did NOT need this right now. So, you activated your patented bullshitting skills and lied through your teeth.

“No, my hair kind of has a red tint during the summer because of all the sun.”

Please, you begged mentally, buy it.

Susie blinked a few times before nodding.

“Ok,” she said and took the sandwiches.

And just in time, too, as a horrible feeling that felt like your flesh was liquefying surged from the injection site on your arm.

You jerked your arm back and held it behind you back as the feeling grew even worse. It felt like your arm was boiling and bubbling like a thick soup under your skin.

Susie looked alarmed for a moment at the abrupt movement, almost dropping her sandwiches.

“Hey!” She exclaimed, annoyed.

You began sweating. The feeling wasn’t exactly painful but it was probably the most uncomfortable thing you’d ever experienced.

“Nothing,” you said quickly, “just an arm cramp.”

She squinted at you again; she didn’t look like she believed you this time.

You did not need this right now. Not only was your mother’s clothing hidden in a ball under your comforter instead of being absorbed alongside their wearer, but the changes, which the “instructions” had shown to happen all at once was dragging on, leaving you at great risk of Susie seeing you transforming into your mother..

So you thought fast, you had to ditch her and quick before you started REALLY changing in front of her.

“Hey, uh, why don’t you go watch some TV?” You tried, hesitantly.

Immediately, her blue-green eyes got huge and she gave you a big grin.

“Can I eat in the living room then?! Mommy never lets me do that!”

“Uh, sure?”

“Yay!” She cheered and zipped through the doorway like a little red rocket.

“Oh, thank god,” you hissed, bringing your hidden arm back out.

You almost wished you hadn’t.

Almost.

Your arm looked like thousands of tiny bubbles were forming under the skin as it seemed to start bloating up, the muscles dissolving into a thick paste under your skin, which was losing its usual peach complexion and paling to a creamier shade of white.

Your long, bony fingers swelled up like over cooked sausages while your palms shrank.

A pinching sensation from your upper arm alerted you to the fact that your t-shirt was starting to bite into your the softening flesh of your bicep, which had almost doubled in circumference.

“Shit!” you cursed quietly.

Peering quickly around the corner, you spied Susie in the living room, eyes glued to the tv and a sandwich stuffed in her mouth.

Quickly, with all the grace of a tiptoeing elephant, you crept upstairs to you room and closed the door, quickly tearing off your t shirt before the sleeve began to cut off circulation.

The bubbles soon subsided and you stared at your arm in stunned fascination.

It looked as though someone had grafted the soft, pudgy white arm of your mother to your body. The ruddy peach shade of your normal, lanky torso now transitioned to the soft, pale limb of your mother, with all the extra flesh that entailed.

“Whoa...”
1132211131.title: Take a Chance

11322111313.content:
"This is so bizarre," you said, holding your hands together.

There was a surreal nature to seeing two very different arms pressed together and knowing they were both yours. Your right hand was a perfect clone of your mother's and you had to confirm it several times by flexing your stubby fingers. Despite the flabby weight to it, your new hand was so much smaller in comparison to your old one. And your reach was several inches shorter too, making you look rather mismatched when you left both of them dangling at your side with one more compact than the other. You almost looked like a mutant, though you had to admire how soft your skin now was.

"Now," her voice boomed. "Give me the watch."

Her giant hand was slow and clumsy as she knocked over furniture to grab for you. You narrowly dodged her and made a beeline for the wall, where you spied a mouse hole you could take cover in.

"Get back here!"

You squeaked as she made another grab for you, she was liable to crush you at this size with how unaware she seemed of her own strength. Would you make it?
11322111313113123112122323221222.title: Mouse-Sized Mistake

113222.content:
As you pondered what to do with your new toy, and if it really worked or not, you couldn't help but hear a noise coming from outside your bedroom window. You looked out next door to the Talbot residence, your neighbors. The Talbots had moved in not too long ago, though in short enough time that they were still getting "settled" in your home town.

Looking out, you could see the father of the family, James Talbot walking out with his suit and tie on his way to work. He was a fifty year old man with a black mustache and trimmed hair. A pretty average looking dad, all around, but someone with a lot of authority and a cool car.

In the Talbot family kitchen, there was Emma Talbot, the mom. Emma got along well with your mom, both of them being fairly short and heavyset. Unlike your mom, who was more pear shaped, most of Mrs. Talbot's weight settled on her impressive chest which were easily E cups but you had never gotten an exact measurement and she liked to wear clothes that didn't exactly show them off. She was busy humming over the sink by herself, all alone.

Then there was Sophia, who was about your age. She definitely took after her mother in looks, being short and with a generous sized chest. Though she was not old enough yet to start looking fat, you had to admit you had a huge crush on her. She was just resting outside by the family's pool, reading a book in the backyard (https://i.pinimg.com/originals/39/f2/f3/...).

All of these three would be prime targets, being separate and far enough away. It would be a simple matter of sniping them and no one would know.

The only question is who you'd pick.
113222.title: Neighbor Targets

choices: An email from your elusive father?
An offer from a Celebrity Gossip Rag?
An email from a person you knew?
12.content:
Just as you were about to leave your bedroom and head out to start your day, you notice that both of your computer's monitors flicker to life by themselves, followed by the quiet hum of the computer's cooling fan.

"Huh? Did I leave those on last night?"

No, you decided, that was impossible. Your computer was always switched off at night so your cats didn't walk across the keyboard and turn it on in the dead of night while you slept, flooding your room with the harsh lights from your monitors in the process. There was even a time when the little shits triggered your iTunes to play your favorite gaming metal mix at four in the morning at max volume.

Yeah, that wasn't a fun time. Your mom and sisters had been pissed.

So, with that in mind, how did you computer turn itself on by itself?

"I hope its not a virus...," you groused as you sat in your worn leather desk chair, "last time I had one of those it nearly killed my whole hard drive..."

With a couple of deft clicks of the mouse, your email opened up and, after a moment of loading, dumped a load of unread messages in your inbox. Most of them were the usual crapware that your spam blocker failed to screen from the incoming mail, but there were a few from your favorite websites informing you of new content or cool shit for sale on eBay that you'd been eyeballing.

Scrolling through the spam mail offers for "KETO DIET: LOSE BELLY FAT NOW!" and fake "iTunes Support" mail everyone seemed to get nowadays, you paused as something odd caught your eye.

It was...
12.title: An Eerie Email

121.content:
... an email from Facebook?

That was definitely an odd thing, wasn't it? Facebook rarely sent any mail to you and whatever nonsense it did try and shove in your face was usually filtered out by the spam blocker. So to have an email from them was a bit of an oddity.

"So lets see here," you murmured, scrolling over it, "hopefully the antivirus catches anything that this might have attached to it."

CLICK

...

"Really?" you said flatly, "a soulmate quiz?"

True enough, the email contained a colorfully animated request to participate in the aptly named "Soulmate Simulator". A cursory skimming of the written blurb confirmed your suspicions. It seemed like the usual procedural generated crap they usually tried to peddle at you from the ads that showed up on Facebook while you browsed. That being said, it looked pretty official compared to some of the "quiz" sites that advertised such useful things like Horoscopes and "WHAT ANIMAL ARE YOU!?".

"Congratulations, ALEX! You've been selected to participate in the SOULMATE SIMULATOR! This new app provides a new way to get closer to that special someone in your life! Simply select another person and let the magic happen! Take a step on the other side and experience a CHANGE IN PERSPECTIVE!"

The page was primarily dominated by two large white squares, one of which held your current scowling profile pic while the other was blank. Presumably this was for your "SOULMATE" as described by the "instructions".

Staring at it for a moment, you actually found yourself contemplating giving it a try. Theoretically, it couldn't hurt, could it? The antivirus program hadn't picked up anything on it and it looked pretty official...

Ah, what the hell. You had nothing better to do, right?

"Now then...," you mused quietly.

CLICK.

"Who to use?"
121.title: FakeBook?

1211.content:
Clicking on the blank white square opened up a menu that looked suspiciously like the image search on your web browser. There was a search bar to type in something as well as an "Upload Image" button.

"Somehow I feel like there's some copyright infringement going on here..." you mused aloud.

Possible copyright infringement aside, this new window seemed to imply that the "SOULMATE SIMULATOR" wasn't limited to just Facebook users. That opened up a lot of possibilities to use. While there was a part of you that wanted to use one of the few girls from your meager friends list or one from your sister's own, much much larger, list.

But, the last thing you wanted was for the results of the app to get posted to you profile using one of the local girls and get outed as a creeper. So, as much as you'd like to use the app on someone like your sister's hot friend Lindsey Riker or your cute lab partner from Chemistry last year, it was best to play it on the safe side and go with someone famous.

Being famous basically made you into the butt of all sorts of odd crushes and fetishes.

You shuddered a bit, some of that stuff was pretty... gnarly, for lack of a better term.

Compared to that, what you were doing was far, far tamer than the kinky, oddball shit that you'd seen on the internet.

So, with that in mind, who were you gonna use?

And wasn't that a tough question?

To rephrase the question, who, among the glittering ladies of Hollywood and beyond, DIDN'T you have some kind of crush on?

Maybe someone like the voluptuous and quirky pop star Katy Perry? (https://www.famousandnude.net/xhc/144247...)

Or maybe someone who fulfilled your closet Rockabilly fetish like Amy Winehouse? (http://www.philanthropicpeople.com/wp-co...)

Or perhaps someone else? There was certainly no shortage of your celebrity crushes.
1211.title: Getting Along Famously?

12113.content:
Katy Perry definitely fit the bill for one of your favored celebrity crushes. Her quirky nature was a bit of an odd thing if you were honest, but holy hell did she have a rockin' bod and that alone was worth a long, hard look.

Amy Winehouse was more a niche crush of yours, fulfilling the Rockabilly fetish you had. There was just something about the 50's and 60's derived style that appealed to you a lot. The more waif-like Amy was certainly cut from a different cloth than the voluptuous Katy but she still deserved a spot at the top of the list.

But there were plenty other celebrity crushes you had that were worth a look as well, and some were a bit odd by comparison.

But hey, who was gonna know?

Perhaps the "bootylicious" figure of Nicki Minaj? You hated her music but she had a killer ass and for you that was more than enough. (https://x.imagefapusercontent.com/u/Niki...)

Or maybe your secret crush on the short and chubby Snooki from the horrible Jersey Shore show you refused to actually watch? (http://cdn.posh24.se/images/:enlarge/p/1...)

Or maybe someone else?
12113.title: Plumbing Odd Tides, aren't we?

121132.content:
You hated Jersey Shore with a passion. It was an opinion that your tightly-knit group of friends all shared. The idea that a group of party-loving, loud mouthed, dumb-as-box-of-rocks people were being touted as “tv stars” rankled you deeply.

But then again, wasn’t that unfortunately the norm now? Making stupid people famous?

“Certainly seems that way...” you grumbled under your breath.

You never saw Jersey Shore aside from commercials and tabloids and you weren’t about to change that.

However, everyone had a “weird celebrity crush”, and you were no exception. It just so happened that one of those oddball crushes that you kept hidden was on one of the girls from the infamous show, Nicole Polizzi, more commonly known as “Snooki”.

You weren’t quite sure what about the Jersey Shore star caught your attention. She was, in a lot of ways, a bit of an outlier compared to your other celebrity crushes. It was pretty normal to have crushes on beautiful celebrities like Kate Beckinsale, Kim Kardashian, or Mariah Carey, but having a crush on Snooki was a bit odd.

You generally tended to prefer thicker or curvier types of girls as opposed to the thin, supermodel types, and Snooki kind of fit the bill, being a bit on the chubby side while also being pretty top heavy for her small stature. You thought she was legit quite pretty in general, even considering her ridiculous hairstyles and fashion sense.

It was a purely physical attraction, though. For as much as you found her kind of pretty, her party animal nature was a total turn off.

“Eh,” you shrugged, “why not? I’ll humor myself a bit, see if this stupid app even works.”

You clicked on the blank icon beside your picture on the webpage, prompting another window to open up to select your “partner” from the files on your computer. You paged through your not insubstantial collection of photos and picked out a nice picture of your oddball crush.

http://cdn.posh24.se/images/:enlarge/p/1...

It was one of your favorite pictures of her. She was looking quite pretty with her bronzed skin, slightly chubby and busty figure, and silky, straight black hair. Her hair was piled on top of her head in that ridiculous “poof” she was known for and had red highlights scattered throughout. Her clothing was both flattering and stylish, a far more tame and possibly even fashionable look than what she usually wore on the show you didn’t watch, even if the bedazzled, gothic-lettered “Snooki” logo on her skirt was a bit much.

You clicked the picture and dragged it to the window. As soon as you released the click, an over-the-top animation of the picture being scanned and analyzed filled your screen.

“Huh,” you muttered in surprise, “this actually looks pretty ritzy for a supposed spam site.”

Facial Recognition Complete! Nicole Polizzi Identified! Is this correct?

You clicked the green YES button and your picture and Snooki’s reappeared, with a large dial appearing in between the two. The needle slowly moved away from the “0” mark, sweeping across the dial until it rested at...?
121132.title: Heading Down the “Shore”?

121133.content:
You had to admit that there was something alluring about Christina Hendricks. Two things, if you were be honest. Among a lineup of sticks and skinny women, she was certainly larger and proud, never afraid to show it with what she was wearing. Plus, she was a redhead and that was always hot (https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2019/11/12/...).

You were never much for the pop scene, even as it played on the radio every summer. But even you found yourself humming "All About That Bass" on the occasion. Meghan Trainor wasn't the first person who came to mind for being super attractive. However, you admired her moxie and willingness to be out there. She loved her body and you loved her for it (https://akns-images.eonline.com/eol_imag...)

Or were there more celebrities you could consider?
121133.title: More Celebs

1211333.content:
While Christina Hendricks certainly had a lot of things going for her, two massive things in fact, and Meghan Trainor certainly had the thick and cute factor, you felt there was someone more fitting for this particular venture.

So perhaps some more... “niche” celebrities from your big black file folder?

Maybe the petite and mature beauty of the ex-American Idol judge, Paula Abdul (https://media.gettyimages.com/photos/act...)? Her outlandish style and your not so hidden liking for older women were certainly hot enough for consideration.

Or perhaps the slender, incredible model-like beauty of Great Britain’s Duchess of Cambridge, the lovely Kate Middleton (https://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dyn...)?

Or maybe someone else?
1211333.title: Carry On, Wayward Son

choices: Use a family member for this.
Pick from someone outside the family.
1212.content:
The obvious choice was to use someone you knew. If this "Soulmate Simulator" was the real deal, even if you doubted it was, it made more sense to use someone that you actually had a connection to rather than a stranger or a public figure.

But with one decision came several more to be made. On one hand, you could pick one of yours or Victoria's friends to try this out with, but on the other, you could try it with someone closer, like Victoria herself or your Mother or maybe even your Aunt Adrianna.

A tricky question to be sure.

While using a family member on a "Soulmate" quiz might be a little odd, you didn't give much thought to it. It was just a silly little app, after all, disregarding the fact that it might not even work. No harm no foul.

But there was much better pickings to be had looking outside the circle of your family, maybe trying it with that cute neighbor girl, Sophia or maybe even Lindsay Riker from school.

So what to choose?
1212.title: A "Soulmate" Close By?

12122.content:
If you were going to use someone you knew that wasn't in your immediate family or otherwise, then two girls came to mind immediately.

The first idea was to pair yourself with your cute 19-year old neighbor, Sophia Talbott (https://i.pinimg.com/originals/39/f2/f3/...). She was a pretty thing with a warm and sunny disposition, a total opposite to your 'Queen Bitch' sister, Victoria. You wouldn't say you were especially close with her but she was always friendly with you when you did interact with her.

The fact that she was very pretty and treated you kindly had you sporting a not-so-tiny crush on her. So that made her a good choice to run in the "Soulmate Simulator".

Or...

Or you could try it with one of your high school classmates, a lovely blonde girl by the name of Lindsay Riker (http://www.imagebam.com/image/d172871328...). She was kind of an oddity, if you were honest. She was on the school dance team and was definitely with the "IN" crowd yet she didn't go out of her way to treat you or your little circle of friends like shit. She never went out of her way to interact with you, but when she was paired with you for projects in class, she treated you kindly.

That gave her a lot of points in your book.

That being said, there were more than just those two, you had plenty of other ideas.

So what would you do?
12122.title: Outside the circle?

choices: A quiz with strange and particular questions.
A morphing program that combines the photos.
121222.content:
You had to admit that you were kind of super curious to see how well you and Sophia would get along. Maybe if it turned out you worked well together then you might actually work up the courage to approach her.

"What the heck?" you asked with a shrug. "This should be good for a laugh."

With your mind made up, you browsed the internet for a quick picture of Sophia and saved it for use in the program. As soon as you uploaded the file, the name popped up at the bottom of the picture as well as other data.

Name: Sophia Alice Talbott
Sex: Female
DOB: 2/4/2000
Height: 154cm
Weight: 92kg

"Wow, this thing is really in depth," you muttered as you glanced down to the button at the bottom of the screen. It was flashy with the word Continue at you. "Let's see exactly what this is going to entail..."

Without a second thought, you clicked the button and were greeted by the next part of the program which entailed...
121222.title: Sophia Your Crush

121223.content:
While you were on the subject of friends, you supposed you'd better include your friend Stephanie (https://cdn5-images.motherlessmedia.com/...). She was of the few girls you could actually call a friend. You and her bonded by suffering in silence under the sneers of the popular kids who always seemed to go out of their way to mess with the "weird" kids.

Stephanie was from Georgia originally but moved to your town when her father got a new job. She spoke with a heavy southern drawl and was almost always making some kind of sarcastic quip, usually at the expense of the "popular" kids. She was a little on the chubby side, but she was rather pretty in a plain kind of way.

So that was an idea.

But maybe someone else?

Stephanie was usually accompanied by her own friend Alyssa (http://www.imagebam.com/image/12f80d1328...). She was a cute, slightly chubby blonde with a friendly disposition. She was also noted for having a phenomenal ass with thick thighs despite her overall smaller size. She usually dressed stylishly and was the "Good Cop" to Stephanie's "Sarcastic Asshole Cop" for lack of a better description.

So who would you pick?
121223.title: Someone Else?

choices: It’s your mom checking on your scream
It’s your younger sister needing the bathroom
13.content:
Yawning you got up and went to the bathroom to complete your morning routine. Jumping in the shower you began to clean yourself when you went to reach for your shampoo and body wash only to realize it wasn’t there.

In its place was a new body. It was bright red and labeled “Fire Delightful .” It had a really feminine label and look about. Smelling It you noticed it smelled like cinnamon and cherries. You also noticed a something written on the back but didn’t bother reading it.

“Smells nice.” You said to yourself as you started lather yourself up in it.

You grabbed another handful and started washing your hair with it and then another handful getting all the spots and places on your body as you began to rinse yourself off.

As you rinsed off you failed to notice your body hair was falling off. It slid off your skin like it was never meant to be there. Every hair not on your head was sliding off your body leaving your skin perfectly smooth.

Speaking of your skin it was also getting lighter shaded by the second. It soon turned a milky white color as your hair was turning a deep shade of dark red.

Getting out of the shower you grabbed a towel and started drying yourself off when you suddenly spotted your reflection in the mirror and screamed.

“How....how did this happen?” You asked looking at yourself.

Your porcelain skin was silky smooth as your deep red hair was...getting longer?

You gasped as you could actually see your hair was getting longer right before your eyes!

You looked back to the shampoo bottle as you grabbed it as you noticed the label on the back.

“Warning! This Shampoo is for feminization only! Use one small dose for a 24 hour feminization. Use two doses for a week long feminization. DO NOT exceed two doses in a 24 hour period. Three or more doses at once will result in a permanent female transformation!”

Your eyes began to go wide when you realized you used far more than three doses in your shower...You just liked the smell and had no idea this would happen...

Your hair was still growing longer as it was now past your shoulders and still growing longer by the second...

You had to figure out what you were going to do when suddenly there was a knock on the bathroom door!
13.title: Head to the bathroom...

choices: A clone of one of your sisters.
131.content:
"Alex, dear. Are you alright then?"

If you still had hair on the back of your neck it would be raising at the sound of your concerned mother. And to think, just a few blessedly short minutes ago she had been yelling at you to get out of bed that morning. She was unwelcome now and she was then.

"It's nothing, mom," you said as you grasped the sink while your hair settled into its new length. "I just slipped on some soap is all."

You gasped as you held your throat. The voice that had escaped your lips was not yours at all, it sounded too high and bubbly. Almost like...Almost like...You were turning into a woman! The label on the shampoo was telling the truth and not just giving you an insane hair job and crazily moisturized skin to match! It was actually transforming you into a redheaded girl!

It went quiet on the other side of the door as your mom was no doubt processing what she had heard.

"Alex," she started. "Did you use my shampoo I left in there?"

"No," you lied as you clutched the bathroom sink tighter.

It was getting harder and harder to breathe, and you had to take deeper and deeper breaths. You felt a crack in your ribs as it seemed like your lungs were collapsing in on themselves, only that wasn't the case when you looked in the mirror. You watched in horror as your sides were concaving, giving your torso a distinctly female shape. You felt weaker as you looked down at your hands. They were shrinking, become more slender and daintier in size. That spread quickly to the rest of your arms as they lost their toned muscle and got skinnier and twig like.

You were scared. So many changes were happening to you so fast, and they should have felt painful. But something was numbing the gross decay of your muscle and bone structure as your entire upper body shrunk in size. You felt your spine drop a notch and then two, causing you to lose several inches in height. There was still your legs to go.

You did the only thing you could think of in this situation and called out to your mom.

"What's happening to me?" you asked, no longer caring that you sounded like a girl. "Who am I turning into?"

Your mother paused again for a long while before saying...
131.title: A Third Daughter

14.content:
In your half=asleep state, you began to look around your room a bit.

It was a fairly modest room all things considered. It was of decent size, with many of the same components any high school boy could have. You had your usual bed, which was a pretty good size and quite comfortable with your blanket and pillows. You had a desk with your computer on it nearby, and also a handstand for just about all the usual things. Your TV and gaming system were on the other side of the room, probably some of the more expensive stuff in the room in all honesty, but you liked them obviously enough.

You had a modest bookcase as well, which also happened to contain many different books. Some were fantasy-inspired, others were manga volumes, and perhaps a few others in there. To an extent actually, you had quite the interest in Japanese culture and naturally got quite in line with some anime and games of that nature. It wasn't exclusively just that though as you had other varieties around your room. No doubt though that if anyone else looked at your room though, they'd likely accuse you of being a Japanophile, which you figured was a harsh way of putting it.

You admittedly did have some posters of that particular kind, though not an excessive amount. You tried to at least keep it a little subtle. There were some game posters too. Your closet was of decent size too to be the finishing touch on what your room featured.

Yeah, a pretty ordinary room in your opinion. You liked it enough that it was comfortable.

In any case though, you guessed you had to start getting ready for the day before anyone yelled at you again. You trudged along the ground, heading over to get something off your nightstand. However, since you were still kind of groggy, you didn't notice something.

That being that some of your blanket had fallen to the ground, and when you stepped in it, you ended up getting your leg tangled with it, suddenly making you lose balance.

"WOAH!"

You cried out as you fell to the ground with a thud, though you had braced yourself a bit to keep yourself from really getting hurt. It made your room rumble just a bit, but nothing too much was changed. You could only wonder if your family heard that though. You groaned as you slowly got up to a sitting position...

However....there was something....strange that you could see....
14.title: Look around your room...

choices: The talisman starts to glow softly.
Place it in a special place and get on with your day.
Bring the talisman with you and head downstairs to ask your mom about it
142.content:
“Huh? What’s that?” You asked no one in particular.

You had seen something out of the corner of your eye as you got up from your impromptu meeting with your floor, a tiny, brightly colored item carefully tucked in between your mattress and box spring.

You reached out and gave the item a little tug. It slid free quite easily and you could only stare at it in wonder.

The item that you had found was something you recognized. It looked, if you could remember correctly, like an Omamori. A charm or talisman sold by Shinto temples in Japan as a token of good luck or to represent a particular blessing from the gods.

Turning it over in your hand, you were struck by how beautiful a piece it was. The wooden talisman was sheathed in a vivid purple brocade bag covered in intricate silver and gold embroidery that resembled gusts of wind and the leaves they carried with them. A line of Japanese kanji that you couldn’t read ran down the center, skillfully embroidered with the same shining golden thread. The bag was sealed with a white corded tassel tied in a particular double looped knot (https://www.omamori.com/322-large_defaul...).

“Wow.”

Yes, indeed. The charm was a thing of beauty and you could tell just by looking at it that someone put a large amount of time and skill into it.

That being said, where did it come from?

As much respect and interest that you had for Japanese culture, you were sure you hadn’t bought this. You would have definitely remembered receiving this.

If you were honest, it weirded you out a bit. It was a harmless trinket but having it suddenly appear under your mattress was odd to you. You were obviously going to keep it and treasure it but you definitely wanted to know where it came from.

The only person that might’ve put it there would’ve been your mom when she changed your sheets, but the only things she knew about Japan came from the stories your grandfather shared from his service in the pacific during world war 2.

So then, how did it get here and who left it? It sure as hell wasn't you and it was unlikely to have been your mom.
142.title: A Little Piece of the Orient

1421.content:
Suffice to say that there wasn't much of an explanation you could think of that would lead to a good explanation. You had some buddies at school but they didn't come over to your house often. Heck, it had been a long time since they did in all honesty, and you would have noticed if one of them had done this for you beforehand.

Then again, guess there was no harm in it otherwise. The item was a real piece of work. You could only imagine how much time and effort were needed to make this beauty, certain far more effort than anyone you knew could put in. You wished you could read the kanji on it, but you really didn't have that much familiarity with the characters. You could probably maybe notice a handful of characters from your viewings of anime and certain video games in the past. Nothing of that sort would really help you here though.

Which was too bad. Given what omamoris were meant to be, you would like to know what this one was supposed to have. Just regular old good luck? Or perhaps it was a specific blessing? Would have been nice to know but you supposed it wasn't a deal breaker.

Guess you could hold on to it until such a time when you learned where it came from. There surely had to be a logical explanation somewhere out there. It's just science after all, not that you were spectacular in this class but that was another matter.

"Guess I can....Huh?" you were speaking when something caught your eye.

The intricate designs of the omamori appeared to be glowing. The blue leaves and silver wind almost looked like they were swaying for real, or was that an optical illusion? The 4 Japanese kanji on it also appeared to be softly glowing golden, almost making the thing look like a living work of art. It...actually looked really cool, like one of those 3D toys you had as a little child. Looking up, you were near your bedroom window, so perhaps it was just the right lighting. Still, really cool effect though.

"Well, if that's the case, I'm definitely keeping you around," you smiled as you put the little thing on your nightstand.

So, in any case, you did have to get going on your day otherwise someone would chew you out. At least the omamori had brightened your mood a bit. That was a plus, right?

Anyway, you usually showered once you got out of bed, though you could go down for breakfast first. Either way worked for you honestly.
1421.title: The talisman starts to glow softly.

choices: You wash your hair, but feel something a bit odd
You wash your body, but feel a bit strange.
14211.content:
As hungry as you were, you decided that a shower was in order. Last night must’ve been pretty warm because a quick whiff of your armpits had even you gagging. And if you thought you smelled bad, your mother would likely be even worse in her criticism of your BO.

The last thing you wanted was a lecture from your mom about hygiene in front of Susie’s giggling form or Victoria’s disgusted, sneering face.

You grabbed some clean underwear, some jeans, socks, and a black t-shirt with a picture of the Chevrolet logo on it and made your way to the bathroom.

You couldn’t help but glance at your new Omamori charm as you left. It still looked like it was glowing softly.

Neat.

You walked down the hall, entered your bathroom and grimaced.

Bending over, you plucked the large, lacy red bra from the floor and tossed it in the hamper. Typical Victoria, leaving her sexy underwear all over the place.

“Honestly,” you grumbled as you turned the knob to turn on the shower, “she’s such a slob, just like Susie.”

Susie was ten years old, she kind of had an excuse. Victoria was nineteen, she had none, but your mother never chastised her over it. And as a result, Victoria had no issue leaving her dirty lingerie all over the place.

You sighed, stripped down to your skivvies and stepped into the warm spray.

You stood in the water for what felt like forever, enjoying the feeling of the water massaging your skin.

But as much as you wanted to enjoy the shower a bit longer, you just knew someone would be banging on the door for one reason or another. So you figured it was time to actually bathe yourself.
14211.title: Take a Shower, You Smell

choices: Finish up but stay in the bathroom
You finish and get back to your room
142111.content:
You began all your usual bathing habits, starting with getting your skin clean. By this point, it wasn't exactly anything noteworthy. Just you cleaning yourself as you had been doing for years. Perhaps with a little extra given how long you spent up last night just for good measure.

All the while, you tried to think of what you could do today. More gaming was always an option, though you played it to death last night. Hopefully Victoria might go out somewhere which could leave you with some relative peace. Susie did like to spend time with her friends on weekends too and Mom often did errands. Hey, maybe you'd have the house to yourself! Yeah, not likely.

In any case though, you got to the part where you washed your hair. You got your usual hair shampoo and began to wash as you often did, though something felt a little off. Was it just you or was there a little more hair to clean? It felt like you almost grab bunches full of hair. Okay, that was an exaggeration but it certainly seemed off.

"Well, it has been over a month since my last haircut," you wondered, though you were sure it wasn't like this the other day.

You combed your hands through your hair, getting the shampoo everywhere. However, something was seriously beginning to feel off, as something felt like it was tickling you. You tried getting rid of it, but when a longer stand of hair flew into your face.

"Ugh, what is going on?!" you asked no one in particular, and thus received no verbal answer.

You pulled your hair back out of your face, but you felt as if you were starting to feel something on your neck and shoulders, maybe even your back as well. To say you were confused would be a total understatement, and you were getting a little frustrated too. Grunting a bit, you tried pulling on to your hair, grabbing a lot of it as you pulled it in front of your face.

"Okay...this can't be right..." you said, finding it hard to believe what this was.

This felt like your hair, but it was much longer, far more than you ever had it before even during your longest breaks between haircuts. Also, was it just you or did it look....darker? You had brown hair which was already pretty dark, but this...almost looked raven black. Was it just the water or lighting messing with you? That wouldn't explain the hair length, You had to be imaging all of this.

And...was it just you or did your hair spell like...something herbal or whatever?

It certainly smelled a heck of a lot different, though you wouldn't call it bad or anything. Still, where was that smell coming from. You looked back at your shampoo. You honestly were so used to your formula that you must not having noticed anything odd. However, upon looking at it, you definitely noticed something off.

Particularly that what you had picked up was some brandless bottle or something. What was inside looked like shampoo and smelled like your hair did now. Was this something Mom picked up? Or maybe Victoria? God could only know what stuff she was into of late.

"Did she get the wrong one?" you asked. "But why would this not have any name on it?"

That was so weird. You could only guess there was a mix-up somehow. Still, you wondered if this was behind your hair troubles. Though that would be something if using something like this really caused hair growth. It seemed unrealistic.
142111.title: You wash your hair, but feel something a bit odd

choices: You get dressed and try to hide your hair under your shirt
You try and give yourself a haircut using some scissors you found.
You hear a knock at the door.
1421112.content:
You frantically rinsed off any suds that were left. You shuddered, unused to the sopping wet curtain that clung to you back and shoulders. Shutting off the water, you almost leapt out of the shower towards the vanity, uncaring of your nudity.

You quickly swiped a hand over the fogged over mirror and started in shock at your reflection.

If the feeling of long wet hair clinging to your skin didn’t convince you something was really wrong, then your reflection certainly hit home that, yes, something was wrong.

Your short dark brown hair had indeed gone through one hell of a growth spurt. It had grown to nearly ten times its original length, now hanging down to your hips. Not only that, but the dark brown had darkened into a shiny raven black. Even your eyebrows were darker.

You reached up and tugged on some of the wet strands, grimacing at the sharp pain in your scalp.

Yep, it was your hair alright.

But that made no sense! You didn’t care what sort of herbal shampoo you had used, hair didn’t grow that fast, let alone to more than ten times it’s usual length! Hair color could be dyed but the glossy blackness seemed too natural to be a dye, but it could be some sort of chemical reaction with your hair and the shampoo.

But that still didn’t explain your miraculous hair growth.

Which brought you to your current predicament.

You were stuck in your bathroom with incredibly long hair that, frankly, looked incredibly girly.

If it was just your hair color that had changed you could explain it as dye and only get a mild talking to from your mother.

The length though, there was no explanation for that.
1421112.title: A Hairy Situation

choices: You race back to your bedroom
14211122.content:
Honestly, the hair being so much longer than you thought was quite the curve ball. The fact that you could feel it all the way on your hips and even your butt felt like something out of an anime. Hey, those always made these exaggerated character qualities look natural. Not so much in this world.

However, there was another thing you could do. There were a pair of scissors in this bathroom. They were kept here in case any of the girls needed a quick cut, but you had never done it yourself. Well, first time for everything you supposed. Finding the scissors was easy enough, and you got enough of the mirror wiped so you could get a better look.

"Okay, I don't know what you are, but it's good bye," you said as you took a strand of hair in your hand and cut it with the scissors.

It sliced through them like a knife through hot butter as one would expect, creating an incredibly long batch of black hair in your hands. Gosh, holding it like this only showed you just how long it really was. Honestly, there was no way you could give yourself a real haircut, but if you could at least get it to your neck or so, you could head to your usual place to get it cleaned up. No problem. You had been going there by yourself for a while now.

You threw the long rope of hair in the trash can, and got ready to finish your work. You felt encouraged at least.

"Okay, shouldn't take too long to finish up," you said. Hopefully you could get it done before any of your sisters bugged you.

However, just as you were about to grab another batch of hair to cut, you suddenly got this really bad itching sensation. You nearly dropped the scissors at the sensation and brought your hand up to try and quickly get rid of it. It was like something was forcing itself out of your scalp, and you got your eyes in the mirror in just enough time to look at it clearly. To your shock, it was the same place where you had just cut, with raven hair flowing out to the same length as before. It looked completely normal, as if you had done nothing.

What.....what was happening....?

"No way....this isn't real..." you said in shock. "Hair....doesn't grow like that....certainly not after a cut..."

Now you were convinced something was totally wrong. There was nothing natural about this. Even if you could believe some hair growth formula, hair reacting to being cut like that was completely out of the ordinary. It bordered on something supernatural, but that couldn't be. Magic was saved for fantasy and media and all sorts of things like that. It wasn't real....

Except....this was real. You made sure you weren't dreaming, and now you had a really big problem to handle. Hiding this amount of hair in your shirt might be near impossible unless you also put on a sweater, and given it was summer break, no one would believe you were in your right state of mind.

You know...it was pretty sad that this was the case given that the hair itself was actually kind of pretty.
14211122.title: You try and give yourself a haircut using some ...

choices: You wrap all your hair in a towel and rush to the saftey of your room.
You feel your eyes begin to tear up.
You hear an incessant knock at the door.
142111221.content:
Pretty.

Privately, the thought of anyone thinking you had pretty hair was a bit demeaning. As a young man, you weren't supposed to be pretty in any capacity, handsome, cute even were acceptable, but pretty wasn't supposed to be applied to you. Maybe if you had been born with looks like a male model it might've been somewhat acceptable but your scruffy, angular features were average, nothing terribly special unlike your lovely sisters or mother.

Until now.

Ignoring the fact that your supernatural lengths of hair had grown from an unkempt mop less than a few inches to a flowing curtain that reached your hips, your hair was beautiful. The raven coloring was deep and glossy, a deeper shade of black than you had seen on anyone not of Asian descent. Though it was fairly style-less in terms of looks, your hair looked thick and well kept as well as being perfectly straight rather than the unruly texture of you old locks.

But as pretty as your hair might've been, that still didn't explain the fact that your hair had grown back like a gecko's tail after it had been cut.

Hair didn't work that way, at all.

But as you stared, mouth agape, at your long haired reflection, the pink flush of your post-shower skin began to return to its usual peachy shade.

Or rather, it was supposed to.

"Wait..." you squinted at your reflection, "something's..."

The pale peach complexion you were used to wasn't returning. Instead, your skin seemed to bypass it completely, slowly bleaching itself of melanin until it settled on a healthy creme white, several skin tones paler than you had ever seen on your skin.

"Wh-what the the hell?" you hissed at your reflection, "Why am I so pale?"

It was then you ntoiced that your face was bare.

You reached up and touched your cheek. The skin there was soft and silky, far softer than it had ever been. In fact, you thought grimly, it felt almost feminine, like the well treated skin of Victoria or your Mother.

But it was also absent of the stubble you woke up with. In the previous excitment created by your newly grown hair, it seemed that your stubble and any other unwanted hair on your face had vanished, as if you had been given the closest shave of your life.

"Wait... wait a minute, what the hell?!"

Not only had you lost your stubble, but the wisps of dark hair that covered you body had disappeared as well! You were as hairless as newborn baby!

Save the massive amount of hair on your head and your eyebrows and eyelashes, you were totally bereft of body hair.

Except...

"Huh!?" was your eloquent response as you looked down at your crotch.

Instead of the snarl of wiry pubic hair that surrounded your genitalia, there was neatly trimmed patch of soft, pitch black hair, not unlike the raven tresses that spilled down your back.

"What the hell is all this?! This can't be possible!"

With all that wet, luxurious raven hair, and your soft and hairless lily white skin, you looked almost doll like, despite your masculine figure and face.
142111221.title: Smooth And Silky

1421112211.content:
This was all just flat out ridiculous. How in the world was this all happening to you? None of it made sense to you in the slightest and your brain was racing to try and rationalize it all somehow. However, there wasn't much to go on. These changes looked random at best, and likely supernatural. But how would you know something supernatural when that shouldn't exist?

Ugh, it was making your brain hurt honestly, and quite frankly just made you feel weak. You had to think somehow and get to the bottom of this, not to mention figure out just what you were becoming, if anything for that matter. First things first though, probably a good idea to get out of this bathroom. Heaven knows your mom or sister would probably bang on the door sometime. Best to at least get in your room to figure it out.

In a haste, you put the clothes you brought with you on, pausing a little bit on how they felt on your skin. Not only was your skin smoother, but it seemed more sensitive too, and your clothes felt really strange. Your jeans especially felt the weirdest, almost making you want to take them off right there. However, you resisted that, and grabbed a towel to try and wrap up your hair. It didn't need to be perfect. It just needed to be good enough to make it to your room.

Granted, you almost never had to do this, but desperate times you supposed. You grabbed your towel, wrapping up your incredibly long hair as much as you could which was a challenge of its own. You used your towel to try and contain it, though it was pretty loose. However, after a couple minutes, you succeeded in at least getting it to stay on without falling. Should be good enough for now.

"Good enough," you grumbled, opening the door to finally leave.

You just had to go down the hallway a little bit to get to your bedroom. Should be simple enough. You walked out of the bathroom and immediately turned to make your way towards your room.....

Only to see little Susie standing right there, nearly giving you a heart attack.

"Ack! Oh, Susie..." you said, breathing a little deeply. You were scared it would be Victoria or your mom.

"Mommy says breakfast is done," Susie said in her usual little giddy tone."Better get it before she gets angry."

"Yeah, about that..." you said as you got by her. No way could you go down right now. "Tell mom I need a few minutes."

"I don't know. Mommy might get really angry," she giggled, and then giggled some more at your look. "And why are you wearing that towel?"

"It's none of your business," you groaned. Seriously, you didn't need this. "Just...I need to be alone."

Probably not the best excuse, but what choice did you have right now. The last thing you would do was try to go down looking like this. You kind of wondered if Mom might think you were sick with this pale skin tone. Well, whatever the case was, you didn't want to know how she'd react.

Not giving Susie any other chance to interrupt, you went straight to your room, closing the door and locking it for good measure. At that, you finally ripped the towel off your head, feeling a little out of breath from the tension there. Seriously, this wasn't what your morning needed.

"Now...wha-UGH!"
