Just as you spoke, your body was wrecked with sensations all around, affecting every bit of you but it felt like it was mostly coming from your torso and extremities. It was hard to tell for sure through all the pain, but....it was almost like you were being squished or something. Your spine in particular felt like something was pressing from the top and bottom, and the same could be felt from your arms and legs. You ended up on the ground, hair flying everywhere as a result. You were pretty much on all-fours now, writhing a bit as you felt something going seriously wrong with your bones.

You crawled a bit, wondering closer to your bed all the while. Your knees sometimes slipped out from underneath you, like your jeans were hanging a little loose. Actually, all of your clothes were feeling a little looser, not that you could tell with how much discomfort you were in. Still, you reached a hand up to try and climb into your bed to at least lay it off a bit.

Except...you didn't have to reach up far. Slowly opening one eye, you wondered if your bed mattress was....a little closer to the ground? Your bed seemed more or less the same, but the amount of space between the mattress and the ground seemed significantly smaller. Or maybe you just couldn't tell the difference with how stressed you felt right now.

"UGH! I.....I don't care....ugh...." you groaned, pulling yourself on to the bed.

Great...as if this morning couldn't get any worse....
1421112211.title: You wrap all your hair in a towel and rush to t...

choices: Your eyes's shape and color continues to change
You see something off about your room.
You feel another bout of pain in your body.
14211122111.content:
You breathed heavily as you hauled your quivering body onto your bed. The softness of your mattress and comforter seemed to soothe your aching body and soon the pain abated, leaving you laying there, motionless atop the soft curtain of your hair. Had your eyes been fooling you? Had your bed been shorter than usual? You found you didn't care. What concerned you was what had just happened.

"What... what the hell..." you whispered, almost afraid to move a muscle lest the pain return with a vengeance.

What was that? It felt like a full body cramp, but you hadn't ever had one so bad before. The last time you had experienced full body cramps was after you were forced into the weight room during gym class and the coach had you bust your ass. You were in pain for days afterwards, but not nearly as much as you just were.

Was this a sign that you were getting sick? Cancer? Some other horrible ailment?

You hoped that wasn't the case; you were only 17 for god's sake!

However, your recent additons, your hair and skin, suggested something far more sinister.

You slowly moved your limbs across the bed and eased yourself to the edge of your mattress. You swung your legs over the side and froze as your feet encounted the ground far quicker than before.

Bushing a strand of your silken hair away from your eyes, you stared at your legs.

Your jeans looked looser on you than they had been. They had never been those skinny jeans that the skater kids wore, but the comfortable slim fit style you preferred usually fit you fairly snugly. Now though, there looked to be a fair bit of bagginess that hadn't been there before.

Not only that, but they seemed too long, the legs almost swallowed your feet.

"What the hell?" you felt like you were gonna say that a lot more today.

You slowly stood up, mindful of the tiny throbs of residual pain you still felt and immediately, your jeans threatened to almost slip away from your hips. Either your pants had somehow grown in size after your episode or, and you really hoped this wasn't the case, you had shrunk.

"Oh no..."

Your jeans, and subsequently your boxers, were very loose on your hips and noticeably too long, and your t shirt wasn't much better.

While your t shirt was on the baggier side, now it was almost draped over you like it was a size XL when you were a size medium. Where the hem should've rested around your hips, it was sitting closer to the tops of your thighs.

"That pain...," you murmured, "I'm shrinking..."

Impossible. Biology and anatomy didn't work that way, but if today's prior events had taught you anything, magic or whatever this was didn't follow the rules.

Magic, or whatever this was, didn't care for physics, or biology, or anatomy.

For all you knew, when magic was involved, two plus two equaled fish.

When magic was involved, apparently your hair could change color and grow to ten times its own length in a few seconds, and your 5'11 lanky figure could lose several inches of height and mass equally fast. In your now oversized clothing, you looked so much smaller, almost waif-like.

God, you didn't know how tall or how light you had gotten, but you almost didn't want to find out.

A sharp sting in your eyes interrupted your frenzied musings.

"Ugh!"

It wasn't nearly as painful as the agony of your body shrinking down had felt, more of a strong irritation if anything. It almsot felt as if someone had thrown sand in your eyes.

You frantically rubbed at them, trying to dislodge whatever had gotten in your eyes as tears slipped down your cheeks

The sting soon faded and you blinked the tears from your eyes.

"Mirror... mirror!" you hissed, still blinking the tears away.

Stumbling towards the mirror over your dresser, almost tripping over your jeans in the process.

You swallowed heavily. Your reflection looked almost alien to you. Surrounded by the inky curtian of hair, your face almost looked like a porcelain doll with its pale, creamy skin, but... there was something new to be noted.

Your eyes looked different.

They looked visibly larger, more expressive, rimmed with full, dark lashes, almost girly looking despite their bloodshot sclera. Your irises looked subtly different too, the brown color seemed much less brown and tinges of dark blue could barely be made out swimming the darkness. And unless you were going crazy, they almost seemed more almond shaped, narrower with a slight tilt that hadn't been there before.

"Something's very wrong here... oh something's wrong..."
14211122111.title: Nice New Peepers

choices: Thinking on that strange word you used
142111221111.content:
You wished you were seeing things, though perhaps that was a bit ironic to say when it was your eyes that were looking different. The stinging feeling wasn't helping either, and it wasn't long before you were bringing your hands to your eyes again and rubbing them, You pretty much had to use one hand on the dresser to keep yourself upright as you were doing so. Your still sore body made it feel like you could fall over at any moment, and if not that, then tripping over your clothes would be the next likely thing to happen.

"Ahh......ugh...." you groaned as you rubbed your eyes. It felt as bad as being out in the sun without sunglasses, and you knew that feeling well. It was horrible. Your eyes felt like they were beginning to tear up a little from the irritation. "Stop it....just.....yamete."

Wait, huh? What was that again? You were trying to say "stop it" but that sounded different. Then again, with all the grunting you were doing, perhaps your words just got garbled up. You were willing to accept that. It sounded better than the alternative a bit. The stinging in your eyes appeared to be going down, only leaving a little soreness. You could only imagine how bloodshot you must have looked after that. Well, you frankly didn't want to look, but you felt like you didn't have much of a choice. Hesitantly, you looked at the mirror.

It....was almost like looking at a doll. An admittedly pretty one if you wanted to put it that way. For one thing, it was stunning at the contrast between your porcelain skin and pitch-black hair, but that paled in comparison to your eyes. You couldn't feel much difference between now and then, but there was a definite tilt to your eyes, larger and expressive, yet almost-shaped thanks to the epicanthal folds on them. The brown color you used to possess now appeared like a sea of dark sapphire. To an extent, they looked almost black, but when you angled your face a bit into slightly better lighting, the dark blue shone radiantly. It was something you'd probably love if not for the fact that they were your own.

There were some tear streaks thanks to your little episode there. Honestly it kind of made you look pretty vulnerable, very much like a doll. All of this seemed pretty feminine in all honesty. Your face still looked masculine in spite of its softness, but your eyes looked like those of a serene woman.

Okay that really wasn't something you wanted to think on. At least they weren't stinging anymore. You kept your balance up as you moved away from the dresser, feeling no closer to discovering what's going on. Though, as you were looking out, now that you could actually think, something stood out.

"Wait, where's the clothes I had right here? And my books?" you asked.

Not that you were a slob or anything, but you had left some things out over the past few days. You had lots of leftover clothes that needed to be washed, and some books you had yet to properly put away. Heck, some of your games had been thrown about when you were looking for something last month. Oh, and did I mention that you hadn't dusted in over a month?

Yet, your floor looked spotless, probably why you hadn't tripped on anything yet. No smelly clothes on the ground. All books properly put away. Your games all stored underneath your TV stand. And there was no dust at all on the furniture anywhere. And...was it just you or did your place smell a little?

And no, not the smell of BO. Rather it was...kind of flowery? Actually it partially reminded you of that shampoo smell, only a little more pleasant this time. You wondered if someone might have air freshened your room, but that didn't seem likely.
142111221111.title: Your eyes's shape and color continues to ch...

choices: Your window rattles a bit in the wind, but sounds stranegly different.
You notice more things amiss about your room.
You notice something subtly off about your clothing.
1421112211111.content:
You looked around slowly, grimacing at the feeling of that wonderfully soft tickle as your hair followed your movements. The reflection you had seen in the mirror haunted you even though you weren't looking at it anymore. Indeed, your face, though still unquestionably you in its facial shape, jawline, nose, and everything, reminded you of a doll. The deep, glossy black of your hair contrasted sharply with your flawless, creamy white skin, but it was your eyes that truly struck you.

The color was incredibly beautiful, subdued and dark most of the time but vibrant like sapphires in the right lighting, but the shape was what got you. While noticeably larger looking than before, the shape was all wrong. Instead of your rounded, sleepy looking eyes, the pretty new peepers you now had were tilted gently with notable epicanthal folds at the corners.

They weren't your eyes in any capacity, they were distinctly Asiatic in appearance, and that made things very complicated.

While the majority of you facial features might've belonged to a young Caucasian man, the huge, beautiful eyes with their full dark lashes and the gentle tilt, and ink black hair suggested undeniable Asian roots.

And now, there was your room.

It looked as though someone had gone through and cleaned it thoroughly, dusting every shelf and knick-knack you had, putting away any stray books or items, deodorized the place of your BO with some flowery, natural scent, did your laundry and made your...

Bed.

"What... what's that... my bed?"

You hadn't gone crazy earlier during your painful episode where you lost so much height and mass, you bed had been getting shorter. Now, though, it had shortened so much that it sat completely on the floor and looked so different you couldn't exactly call it a bed as you knew it.

Your mattress and box spring had seemingly smashed themselves together into a thin, but soft looking, pad that sat on the floor without any frame. A single white pillow sat near the top where you'd put your head and your plain blue comforter had been replaced with a thicker blanket covered in shades of soft lavender and purples and decorated with flowery designs in various shades of complimenting blues.

"Is... is that a futon?!"

Not just a futon, but the same sort of bed that you saw in many of the Japanese anime's you'd watched over the years. A thin, foam pad as a mattress, thick, warm comforters. Simple, but effective.

But not what you wanted to see in your bedroom.
1421112211111.title: Down To The Floor

14211122111111.content:
You reached down and felt your apparently new futon a little bit. Wow, it actually felt really soft. For something so thin, you wouldn't have expected that, and yet it actually felt nice, and the blanket was no exception either. Just feeling it was enough to show you of how warm it could be.

"Wow...that's...actually a little impressive," you spoke to yourself.

Honestly, on closer inspection, the design of the blanket was actually not all that different from that omamori you found. The imagery of leaves definitely reminded you of that. Your new eyes actually widened a bit at that, remembering the omamori. You turned to your nightstand, seeing the little trinket still there. You reached up and grabbed it, and it actually looked no different from before, emitting that really soft glow along the symbols and kanji.

Was it related to these Asian traits you were beginning to see in your room and your person? Didn't seem like coincidence that all of this stuff would happen on the very day you discovered something like this in your room. So, was this little thing really behind it all? If so, maybe you should do something about it?

"Still....I really don't want to throw it away," you groaned. You couldn't help it. The little thing just looked so nice. Hard to think of it as some bringer of chaos to you.

As you were looking at the thing though, there was a little something that seemed off. Well, off just like everything else so far. Your hands holding the charm were aching just a little bit, making you cringe a bit as you brought your left hand to your face. You already knew you were significantly shorter now, both in height and pretty much in frame as well. However, your hands now looked like they were becoming exceptionally dainty, and your eyes widened a bit as you were seeing your nails grow slightly. You had just cut them a couple days ago, but now they were looking kind of like before. Not excessively long though. They were growing to a rather simple and modest cut, looking well maintained without the extravagance that Victoria did.

Honestly, dainty was a word you'd use to describe much of you right now. Not just smooth and petite, but carrying a certain degree of elegance. To be frank, it kind of reminded you of Susie, that being like a girl before puberty. Actually, that had been something on your mind often now. All these changes had one thing in common: that being that they were quite feminine in nature.

Were you turning into a girl? That...honestly seemed to be the case. But why? You know, an Asian girl would have been someone you'd have loved to see in person, but not like this.

"What....Just what can I do?" you hung your head, slumping a bit and making your long hair hide your face a little. "It's all happening so fast...."

And just as you said that, you heard a creaking, making you turn your head up.Was that coming from your room? Actually, it didn't take long for your question to be answered. The creaking noise lead you over to the single window your room had. The wood that comprised your window seemed to be changing color, looking much like dark wood. Actually, such a feature seemed to be taking over much of the window, replacing what was there before. The glass that allowed you to see outside actually looked like it was fogging up, the visage outside beginning to disappear as the material used transformed into something completely different.

What was that called again? You swore you had read this before....oh yeah, rice paper! You had saw that online at some point, but that was beside the point. Your window just changed! And its new design even made a different sound compared to your own one. Also, was it just you or did it look like it was designed sideways instead of up and down?

The fact that whatever was going on was extending to your room like this was frankly terrifying, though you could swear you were seeing a certain light from beyond your window. At that same time though, the clothes on your dainty body were still feeling weird, a sensation that seemed to be building.
14211122111111.title: Your window rattles a bit in the wind, but soun...

choices: More parts of your room start changing.
142111221111111.content:
As the rice paper window rattled quietly as it was jostled by the warm summer breeze outside, you couldn't help but feel overwhelmed by all of this. Your world was being turned upside down, seemingly as a result of that Omamori charm you stubbornly refused to even consider throwing away or destroying.

Honestly, you privately hoped that destroying it or getting rid of it would bring this transformation to a halt, or better yet, reverse it entirely.

"But...," you whispered softly, looking at the charm gently held in your delicate fingers, "that's horrible, I couldn't do such a thing, not to something like this."

The thought of doing anything to harm it was, deep down, extremely offensive, even if the Omamori was the reason that you were seemingly turning into a girl.

A shifting in your clothing tore your attention away from the charm.

"Huh?"

Your jeans seemed breath in and out, almost to emit a quiet sigh. The fabric rustled though there was no wind to do so and shifted against your hairless legs, feeling strangely silky and airy against your skin. The denim looked odd to your watching eyes, lacking the usual lattice of blue threads. Instead, it all seemed far more uniform, for lack of a better term, the woven threads seemed much tighter, the color more consistent and looked like it had adopted a purplish tinge.

You shifted slightly, lifting a leg to take a closer look.

Your jeans now seemed to fit you much better, at least in terms of length, though they still remained quite baggy on you, but in a strangely different way that you couldn't quite put your finger on. Like, despite how baggy they appeared, they felt easier to move in.

Odd.

A quiet rustle and the feeling of fabric gently brushing your arms directed your attention towards your black t-shirt.

"What the... my sleeves..."

Indeed, your sleeves had undergone a change while you were preoccupied with your pants, the looked noticeably longer than before. Whereas a t-shirt would normally had sleeves that ended near the middle of your bicep, your sleeves had somehow lengthened down passed that, very nearly in line with your elbows. They, like your pants, seemed baggier too, but in a different way.

They seemed to fit your upper arms somewhat more snugly while they seemed to flare out slightly near your elbows. The coloring seemed to have skewed slightly, a noticeably lighter, grayer tinge instead of the deep black it had been when you put it on. The Chevrolet logo seemed fainter, and the threads and seams near the end of your sleeves and around your collar seemed to look brighter.

And had your shirt always had a V-neck?

Uneasiness seemed to settle in your gut, as you stood in the middle of your changing room, in a changing body and changing clothing. You gripped your origami tightly, a prayer whispering past your lips.

"Tasukete... please..."
142111221111111.title: A Change of Clothing

1421112211111111.content:
Where....where did that come from? It sounded so strange, like an earnest prayer of sorts. And what was that word you used when you wanted to say "help"? Wait, connecting the dots from just about everything so far from the Asian eyes, and windows, and futon.....was that actual Japanese you were speaking?

You really didn't know much outside of perhaps some common words you heard from anime. You could understand a little, though full sentences was not something you could do. Funny how actually being able to speak the language was something you often found cool. Just wish this instance didn't have the sick undertaste of your whole body and room being turned upside down.

Of course, the clothes didn't help either. While you were coming to the realization that you were becoming more feminine, your clothes really didn't give any obvious indication of what they were becoming. The bagginess of them really didn't give you any clues. Guess you would just need to wait to figure those out.

Only, perhaps the only saving grace right now was neither your mother or sisters shouting your name right now. You probably well missed breakfast by this point, though you weren't exactly concerned with something like that.

"Kind of got bigger things to-UGH!"

Your own words were broken off by a sudden sensation on your face, making you grunt as you held your hands to it, dropping the omamori in the process. It felt almost exactly like the cramping you felt earlier, though perhaps even more sensitive given it was your face. It was like worms crawling underneath your skin, affecting the muscle structure of your face. However, what felt even worse was your skull. It..actually felt like your skull was cracking and reshaping, and it felt even worse than it did earlier.

"Ahhhhhh! Help!" you cried out, hands on your face as you practically shrieked. "Kami ga watashi o tasuketekudasai!" (Please god help me!)

You had no idea what you were saying, and frankly didn't seem to care given the pain you were in. With all the nerves in your head, it was no wonder such a change was this extreme. You imagined probably the whole house could have heard you though with that shriek, though if that was Japanese you were speaking, maybe your family would just mistake it for one of your anime and just tell you to turn it down.

But that was beside the point, as the cracking and remodeling of your skull was taking priority. You staggered all the way towards the mirror again, half wanting to hide but the other half wanted to know what was happening. Against all the pain you were in, you slowly pulled your hands down.

Even with your face contorted as it was, you could see the changes. Your entire head was looking more delicate and smaller in size, with your jawline being less pronounced than before. Your cheekbones had risen a bit, becoming more slender along with your nose becoming cute and button-like. Your lips were puffing up slightly, though merely just to fill out more. The remainder of your face morphed around your new ones, complimenting them as your face was becoming as a Japanese beauty.

You were practically out of breath once it finally decided to die down though, making you slide down a bit as your knees landed on the ground, one of your hands still holding the dresser. God this was painful. Not just emotionally but also physically. Guess this was just how different males and females were in this regard.

"Ow....ow.....my head...." you groaned. "My-ACK!"

Something lumped in your throat, making you go into a bit of a coughing fit, making you bring your own hand down to cover your mouth as you almost felt like something was stuck. Almost felt like those times when water accidentally went down your lung pipe. Your hands covered your mouth, though one of them subtlety went down to your neck. However, rather than feeling a bump, there was nothing. Nothing but a smooth, slim neck.

"My....M-My voice...." you croaked out, no longer hearing the voice of a growing boy. That was drowned out by an incredibly high yet soft voice, youthful yet elegant. "Ōno. Oh no.

This transformation was taking more from you with every minute.
1421112211111111.title: Your body undergoes another change.

choices: Your body undergoes another painful change.
Your hair styles styles itself into something more fitting.
14211122111111113.content:
You breathed hard as you leaned heavily against your dresser, your breaths coming out in soft high pitched gasps as opposed to the rougher, more gutteral sounds you were used to. You hand traced your throat again. There was nothing there, only the same silky smooth skin that covered your body.

No Adam's apple, no nothing.

"Th-this..." you stifled your next words as the soft, high pitched voice you heard before drifted from your parted lips.

Just as you had heard before, your voice was gone.

It was actually very beautiful sounding, high and musical like the chiming of a silver bell. Every word you spoke somehow radiated a sense of innocence and purity. Whether those words would continue in English, though, remained to be seen. Every now and then, you noticed, what you assumed to be bits of garbled Japanese would come out instead of the intended English word.

Kami ga watashi o tasuketekudasa.

Words like "Kami" and "tasukete" were somewhat familiar to you, but everything else may as well have been gibberish. And yet, somehow, those bits of Japanese that had spilled forth from your babbling sounded as though you had spoken the language your whole life.

You had screamed that as your face underwent its horrible change and you didn't know what it meant.

Your face.

Swallowing your fear, you slowly pulled yourself to your feet. You weren't going to lie to yourself; you were utterly terrified to see your face again. You had gotten a glimpse of it during your transformation but were too delirious from the pain to take proper note of it.

As you pulled yourself to you full, insubstantial height, you beheld your face once more and were subsequently struck dumb.

The young girl in the mirror was absolutely stunning.

You traced soft, pale pink lips with a trembling hand, feeling the tiny, slightly upturned nose, the high, elegant cheekbones and those haunting, teary dark pools of sapphire you called eyes. If you had looked a little like a doll before, there wasn't any doubt you completely resembled one now.

Those pale features, big eyes, and gorgeous raven hair together formed a face that was almost ethereal looking. It was a face that didn't radiate the raw sensuous appeal of most American women of beauty, but a more serene, graceful, and innocent type of beauty that was a gift from Kami to behold.

You quailed at that thought, you had no right to have such a face, you were an American teen, an average young man with average features, not the vision of elegance and purity that stared back at you.

Not a vulnerable, innocent young Japanese maiden...

Shuffle

Flutter

Your eyes snapped away from your reflection towards your pants, which shifted and rustled around your legs. The bagginess of your jeans had only grown, in fact they had become so baggy around your legs that they nearly appeared to be a huge skirt, with denim having softened even more with the fabric almost seeming to be pleated slightly. The waistband had tightened around you midsection and your leather belt looked more like a cloth sash with a mangled steel buckle than anything else at this point. That purple tinge from before seemed to have deepened, so your "jeans" looked almost violet rather than faded blue they should've been.

You tugged at them in apprehension, your sleeves brushing against your forearms.

"N-nani?" you whispered, raising your arm.

Your sleeves slowly crept down your arms, remaining snug around your slender biceps before billowing out into large bell shapes, almost swallowing your hands into the process. They quickly grew until they hung from your arms, so long they almost touched your hips. Thin red strips of fabric emerged from the rims of your sleeves as the fabric of your once black shirt skewed further into a light gray.

Almost comically, you waved your arms like a bird, your long sleeves fluttering in the air like the wings of a bird.

Looking down, you saw the last remnants of the Chevrolet logo vanish and the V-neck, also trimmed with red fabric, deepened. It almost looked like your shirt was splitting into two pieces.

"Y-yamete... s-stop changing!"

But, as with before, you were ignored.

It was only a matter of time until you lost something else.

And from its position on the floor near your dresser where you had dropped it, the Omamori continued to glow softly.
14211122111111113.title: A Maiden's Mantle

142111221111111131.content:
Honestly, it sounded hard to take your voice seriously with how high-pitched you sounded. Even talking normally, it sounded so soft. When you were agitated like this, it kind of reminded you of anime girls, which really wasn't a term you wanted to describe to yourself.

You weren't sure if your words were doing much of anything, but your clothes did seem to stop changing for the moment, giving you at least a little relief. Honestly though, you felt no closer to figuring out just what you were beginning to wear. Your pants looking so ruffled and long that they were almost like a skirt? Your top cutting down the middle like this and those long and wide sleeves? You couldn't quite figure out what.

Maybe, a kimono? Nah, didn't seem like that. You'd think the colors would be the same for the whole thing if that was the case. Plus, your clothes didn't seem to be coming together to form such a garment. Hmm, what else could it possibly be? Idol outfit? Well, that was always a possibility, but you weren't sure about that. What other sorts of Japanese girls could there be? You happened to glance over at the omamori, still glowing softly. You had little doubt now that it was causing this somehow, but looking at it did make you think of something.

Maybe....a miko? Shrine maidens could be associated with such a trinket, and your clothes could possibly be like that. Heck, it might even explain your little prayer earlier. Still, it was little more than a guess at the moment.

"So wha-AHHH!" you cried out, suddenly having to wrap your arms around yourself, falling to your knees. "Sore wa itai!" It hurts!

The amount of pain this transformation was causing you irritated you so much. Did it enjoy this? Making you suffer through all the differences that separated boys from girls? Was it a test from Kami itself? Oh geez, even your thoughts were beginning to think differently. The only saving grace was at least this didn't seem to be quite as bad as your face earlier. This was more akin to being punched in the gut and feeling like you're going to throw up, which was still an improvement.

From your neck down, it was like you were being pressed together. Your shoulders, which were actually decently big for a guy, felt like they were being crunched in, slimming your frame even more. However, that was far from the worst. Your waist felt like it was being pulled inwards, almost constricting you as you were being forced to arch your back, getting to such a point where it became permanent. Any excess fat was vanishing, even the little gut you had from perhaps a little too much snacking at times. The area around your stomach was slimming down considerably, only furthering how sick you felt from the aching. A hand pressed to your stomach confirmed how much flatter it was feeling, and another hand to your waist confirmed how it was starting to resemble curves.

Oh Kami, you could only imagine that some of the more distinctive changes of a girl were nearing. The chest and the groin: two very different areas. Half of you wished it would just get it over with, while the other half was too horrified to even think about it. You were still nearly out of breath from just having your torso twist itself into the beginning of womanly curves so experiencing some of "women's bounty" didn't sit well with you.

However, the sensations were still going through your whole body, and it felt like there was some kind of pressure building that worried you a lot. Honestly, you felt like you could cry again. It was all so much, becoming basically an entirely different person, and it was difficult for your mind to really handle that pressure, as it probably would for anything.

"I wish...some...one....would...." you talked between breaths, barely able to get a word out. Your chest was starting to feel even more pressure, and that could mean.... oh no.....oh no....."Ah.....ah.....ah.....ahhhhhh!"

Your voice cracked as you kept on breathing, hard to make a coherent word. Your chest felt like something was pushing down on it, or rather, being pushed on in two places. Whimpering, you looked down through your loose top. Your nipples were pointing up, looking distinctly darker and bigger than usual. You could see them actually grow in real time, growing larger every second. The very air around your room seemed to make them react, as your loose clothing kind of exposed them.

But that was merely the beginning. You grunted and took larger breaths as you ended up falling on your back, chest pointed upwards as you watched it begin to expand. Your eyes teared up as two distinct mounds began to push the flesh around your nipples, going up with each breath, and they became heavier all the same. You had no idea of female breast sizes, so you could only really guess, but that didn't really matter as you watched them grow.

The two mounds continued to grow, partially exposed to the air thanks to your loose top. They got bigger, and bigger, but just when you wondered if you would reach bombshell status, they began to stop, settling at what was probably a pretty decent size. Not super huge, but still kind of perky.

It left you just laying on your back on the ground, looking upwards with your hair flown all over the floor behind you.
142111221111111131.title: Your body undergoes another painful change.

144.content:
You squinted, what the hell was that? You had seen it briefly when you had your unceremonious meet and greet with your floor.

"What's this?"

What was it?
144.title: Something Else?

1441.content:
You reached under your bed and fumbled around in the darkness. After a moment of probing, your fingers encountered a smooth piece of plastic.

"Aha!" you said with a grin, pulling the item out from under your bed.

Your grin was replaced with a confused frown.

It was a CD case. Specifically, just a clear plastic case with a black white cover, making its contents a mystery.

What was odd to you though was why it was even in your room at all, let alone under your bed? It was 2019, not 2006. You hadn't burned or even used a CD in years, not with the iPod and subesequently your iPhone replacing your CD player, and thusly any use for the discs at all came to an end.

So where had it even come from if you hand't used a CD in years?

You popped the cover open and looked at the disc, hoping there was some identification on it. Conveniently, there was a label on it.

It was...
1441.title: A CD?

14411.content:
It was....quite possibly the girliest thing you had ever seen in your life, or at least you had seen in your room.

The front of the CD was entirely pink, with plenty of cutesy designs like flowers of many different colors. There were sparkles all over the place and gave the impression of a bright and cute world of music. It looked like something a crazy otaku would have, of which you wouldn't really consider yourself as. Yeah, you enjoyed Japanese stuff more or less, both in terms of culture and entertainment, but this was kind of out of the ordinary even for you.

It thankfully did have a group name: KSS48. Sounded very similar to some other idol groups you had heard of, probably most famously AKB48. The first three letters of groups like these usually meant something, though you weren't sure why. Saying "KSS" out loud though almost made you think of "kiss".

"Heh, that would be funny," you smirked at such an idea. Who knew if that was the idea but whatever.

Other than that, it seemed like a pretty normal disk. There were mentions of many different songs, ranking in the dozens actually which was impressive for a CD. There seemed to be some Japanese text though that indicated a tag line.

Otagai o shinrai shi,-boshi ni tewonobasu Trust in each other and reach for the stars

Naturally though, you couldn't really read any of this, not to mention that confusing it was for such a thing to even be here. You didn't buy anything of this sort. Maybe someone gave it to you as a prank? Certainly not your family, and you hadn't had any friends in here for quite some time. Your mom would have mentioned something given she often changed out sheets.

Well, as confusing as it was, you couldn't deny J-Pop as a guilty pleasure. If it was here, might as well use it. You didn't see any indication that it was a stolen piece or anything. If that was the case, then you guessed it was all fair game. The closest rationale you could think of was probably someone leaving it there and it just happened to be missed until you found it. Fair enough as far as you knew.

So, as you did a lot of the time, you downloaded the songs to your iphone. Though, perhaps amusingly enough as it was happening, your screen actually showed an image resembling that of the cutesy CD. Huh, was that some kind of promotion for anyone with the CD? Sounded curious but whatever.

Anyway, it wasn't too long until you saw it finish downloading, and you put the CD back in its case and left it in a spare container in your dresser. You actually had to get ready to meet a friend of yours. Jordan wanted to hang with you today.
14411.title: A J-pop album.

choices: The J-pop you had downloaded starts playing.
Jordan stops you and says you need to go to the parts store.
144111.content:
With a sigh, you made your way to your dresser and picked out a clean, plain black t-shirt, somewhat worn jeans, and some socks. You and Jordan had been good friends for a long time, sharing an interest in old hot rods and muscle cars as well as casual interest in anime and such. The two of you often hung out in each other's garages, usually working on some project or another or just bullshitting for hours on end.

As you changed into your fresh clothes, your phone buzzed on the nightstand.

Hey! I'm downstairs! Hurry up, Victoria is really creeping me out! was the message on screen.

You chuckled slightly, your eldest sister Victoria, the queen bitch herself, apparently had a crush on Jordan and would often hover around making eyes at him and flirting. Jordan though, much like yourself, was the awkward sort of guy that had issues talking to anyone of the female gender and Victoria's reputation as a major bitch hadn't ingrained her to him.

"Poor guy," you muttered with a grin, you pitied anyone Victoria had an interest in. Her beautiful, model-like looks didn't match the "bitchy hot girl" trope she personified.

Grabbing your phone, you made your way downstairs to the kitchen.

"Hehe, no, I think I've got... uh... plans that day..." you heard Jordan's nervous voice as your rounded the corner.

"Are you sure? You don't think you can reschedule?" came the sultry soprano of your elder sister.

Jordan was sitting at the kitchen table, looking like he would rather be literally anywhere else. Victoria, dressed in a tight, low cut tank top that flaunted her cleavage and black short shorts that left her long shapely legs on display, was sitting next to him, having scooched her chair as closer as she could to him. She was leaned over so Jordan had a perfect view of her cleavage and was twirling a strand of long deep crimson hair, batting her big green eyes playfully at your sweating friend.

Jordan was a tall, lanky young man a few years olden than you, being 19 to your 17. He had a shaggy mop of dark brown hair and narrow dark brown eyes that could be mistaken as black and rectangular framed glasses. He was wearing a dark blue t-shirt with a picture of a dragon on it, ripped jeans, and worn work boots.

"Yo!" you greeted as you walked into the room, "Sorry about that, woke up late."

Victoria gave you a dirty look and stood up, but not before smiling seductively at your friend and giving a slow wink as she sauntered out of the room, purposely swaying her hips.

"Holy shit," Jordan rasped out, looking torn between being horrified and aroused, "she's relentless... and hot, can't forget hot."

"Yeah, I hear that a lot," you quipped with a chuckle.

Jordan shuddered, "Yeah, but I can barely handle eye contact with a girl, let alone actually date anyone."

He paused, "That, and Grandpa always said, never stick your dick in crazy!"

The two of you gave a loud guffaw and made your way to the garage.

Entering the garage, you flipped on the light, illuminating the low, sleek form of a black 1982 Camaro with its hood up. This was your pride and joy. It was in great shape and when the man down the street was selling it for cheap you couldn't resist, even if your mom had been less than thrilled. She calmed down though, happy you had found a hobby that got you out of your bedroom.

"Alright!" Jordan said with a grin, "Lets get going eh? That transmission leak won't fix itself!"

"Right!" you agreed, "haven't had much luck though, still leaks."

"Well, that's what I'm here for, the Plymouth had the same issues. I like to think I got pretty good at fixing those."

He strode towards the car, dragging a floor jack behind him.

"Hey, put on some music!"

You plugged in your phone to the stereo on your workbench...
144111.title: A Wild Jordan Appears

1441111.content:
Honestly, you had been surprised at how much working on a car was a genuine delight. You had your reservations about actually working on a car, but it turned out for the best. Plus, As established, Jordan was actually fairly competent at these which helped to kind of show you the ropes a little bit. It was certainly rewarding, probably would really come in handy in the future.

In any case, as you had done many times before, you plugged your phone in to the stereo on the workbench, heading for your playlist as you often did. Though, for some strange reason, it was taking a little extra time.

"Slow phone?" Jordan chuckled a bit as he was getting the floor jack set up.

"I suppose," you groaned. You had your iphone for a couple years now but it had been working pretty well for the most part. You really weren't ready to get another phone right now.

However, thankfully, it all seemed to work out, with the stereo beginning to come to life and you hitting play on your phone. After that though, it was not what you were expecting as bright poppy music began to play.

"Mite, sora no kumo o mite." Look, see the clouds in the sky
"Issho ni toberu ka na?" Might we be able to fly together?
"Tsubasa ni kaze o kanjitai" I want to feel the wind in my wings
"Anatatowatashi wa tōku made ikimasu!" You and I will go far!

It was as J-Popy as such a thing would ever be. The voices of many young girls singing in unison to a graceful melody. Funny enough though, the song felt...strong in a sense. It was like every word was ringing clear in your brain, to the point where you could perhaps even imagine the girls dancing to the song.

Your little episode was broken by Jordan's laughing though.

Woah, man! What's with that?!" he laughed as he left he fork behind. "You've never played on of those outside of your room before."

"I-I wasn't trying to!" you blushed heavily and tried to stop it. "It's probably from that new CD!"

"What CD?" Jordan asked, eyebrow-raised.

"Well....I found this CD in my room," you said as you tried to move the music to another song. "It looked like a J-Pop CD, from KSS48 or something like that. I wasn't sure where it came from. Figured you or someone else left it there as a joke."

"Really? Certainly not me if that's the case," Jordan said, a little perplexed as he turned back towards the car. "KSS48 doesn't sound familiar either. Maybe a new group or something?"

"Maybe....UGH!" you groaned, getting a little fed up with this. "The phone won't let me switch to another song. I didn't even put these songs on the playlist."

"Perhaps you do need another phone," Jordan said without turning around as he began to get underneath the car. "Ken's phone was kind of flipping out on him the other day."

"Great...." you groaned again, really not wanting to get a new phone. You knew your mom wouldn't like shelling out more money for a phone. Even the fact that the song was pretty nice didn't help you.

"Well, it's a nice song either way though," Jordan laughed from underneath the car. "Really catchy. And maybe if Victoria hears it, she'll finally lose interest in me."

"I suppose that's a silver lining," you sighed as you put your phone down on the bench, smiling a little bit all the same. "Guess there are worse things that can happen."

In hindsight, you shouldn't have said that.
1441111.title: The J-pop you had downloaded starts playing.

choices: "Since when was there any red in your hair?"
"Are you wearing color contacts? Your eyes look weird..."
"You hungry? Maybe that's what caused that."
14411112.content:
You leaned over the engine bay of the car, racthet in hand as you re-tightened the bolds on the intake manifold, the light and peppy sound of the girls singing their hearts out pounding in your ears. It was a very nice song, actually ranking in your current favorites now that you actually took a moment to listen to it carefully.

"This is actually a pretty good song," Jordan's muffled voice came from under the car, "a bit too poppy for my taste, but pretty good."

You snorted, "Well, it is called J-POP for a reason, man."

"Fair point," he agreed, "at least its better than American pop, that's basically like shoving shit in your ears."

"That's a bit harsh," you said with a grin, "There's some songs that are pretty catchy."

"Oh yeah?" he quipped, grunting slightly as he wrestled with the transmission cooler lines, "name one that doesnt give you a headache after listening to it."

"I'm sure I..." you trailed off midsentence.

"Ima doko ni iru no ka wakaranai" I don't where I'd be right now

"Anata nashide watashi o michibiku" Without you to guide me

"Mikudasu na, tsudzukete" Don't look down, keep going

"Mata aeru made!" until i see you again!

The words hammered into your head like jackhammers and your world seemed to blur and become insignificant. The rapid clicking of Jordan's ratchet and his grunts of exertion seemed to echo, rippling across your mind. You felt lightheaded, weak. The ratchet clattered on the aluminum of the intake manifold as it dropped from your nerveless fingers.

You swayed away from the car, leaning heavily on your toolbox.

"I..."

"Ah, shit!" Jordan's voice seemed to boom in your ears, followed by the sound of flowing liquid.

Jordan slid out from under the car, covered in red fluid and looking very irritated.

"I really fucking hate trans fluid," he groused, "I hate how it feels. I can deal with everything else, but trans fluid just sucks."

"Yamenaide! Tachidomaru na! Watashi wa kono ai o tome sasemasen!" Don't stop! Keep going! I will not let this love be stopped!

"Hey, can you get me rag to wipe this shit off?"

The words seemed not to register to you, the echoes of the girl's voices still bouncing around in your skull.

"Hey."

"I... I..." you slurred drunkenly.

"Hey! Dude are you alright?"

Suddenly the world came back into focus as you felt hands shaking your shoulders and you saw your friend's bearded face lined with concern. The sound of the J-pop song still played in the background but was winding down.

"Dude, dude! Hey, you ok?"

You shook your head to clear the lightheadedness.

"Yeah," you muttered, resting a hand on your forehead, "I'm good, just felt a little lightheaded for a minute."

He stared at you, brown eyes narrowed behind his glasses, not looking convinced.

"Seriously," you assured him cinfidently, "I'm fine."

"Uh huh..." he said flatly, before he blinked and squinted at you closely, his sharp eyes raking over you.

"Hey..."
14411112.title: A Head Pounding Beat

choices: Jordan touches the car, and it lights up
Strange stuff as the music continues to play
144111121.content:
"Since when was there any red in your hair?"

You were still kind of getting your head back on straight after feeling out of it for that brief period of time. Just what was that all about? Catchy songs, especially of the J-Pop kind were nothing new to you, yet that song in particular felt like it was invading your head. It felt like every word was in engraving itself, to the point where you could almost imagine the girls themselves singing and dancing together to this song. It was a unique feeling, one you didn't understand.

However, Jordan's words made you blink a bit, registering his words finally. Wait, did he say red? In your hair? Red was a common hair color in your family but you didn't have it, just having a rather normal brunette color. Hair color could change subtly over time, and you knew this, but that seemed a bit extreme.

"Huh? I shouldn't have any red," you said.

"Well, I think you do right now," Jordan pointed up before turning around. "Take a look if you want."

You hummed a bit, not quite sure what he was getting at. Still, guess it was worth a little look at. You walked over to the side of the car, looking into one of the side mirrors since it was the only real reflective surface around there. Initially, you didn't see anything new, but maybe that was because you were quick to try and prove Jordan wrong.

"There's...Huh?"

Taking a closer look, there actually did seem to be some red, and not a red you were familiar with like your family. The red you were beginning to see through your brown locks looked very vibrant, almost kind of smooth once you touched it a little. Was it just a trick of the lighting? You weren't sure, especially since it looked like it was spreading. Perplexed, you put your hands to your hair to feel it out, feeling that same smoothness as before. Also...was it just you for was it bushier? It had been a while since your last haircut, but your hair shouldn't have been long enough to cover your ears. And....why were your bangs long enough to be pulled along to the side?

"Eh?" you raised your eyebrow, trying to get a better look.

Was this still just you having your head in the wrong place from the headache you had earlier. Your hair shouldn't look like it was alive, curling around your face a bit as it was coming over your shoulders in cherry red locks. Okay, you were starting to feel a little wierded out by this.

"You still looking?" Jordan asked as he was wiping the fluid off of his shirt.

You suddenly jerked your hair up, allowing your red locks to fly into your face a bit. What was going on? You had to be imaging it. Perhaps Jordan was right about....

"I-uh....I...uh...." you fumbled for words as you looked at him, which suddenly made you pause. "Uh, why does your hair look purple?"

"Excuse me? What are you talking about?" Jordan asked. "And I thought I was asking the questions here. What's with...."

Jordan's words were cut off by hair flying into his face as well, the surprise of it making him lose his balance slightly in surprise.
144111121.title: "Since when was there any red in your hair?...

choices: “Why the fuck are you so short?!”
1441111211.content:
“What the fuck!?” Jordan cried as lengthening strands of hair slapped him in the face, causing him to reel back and surprise and lose his balance.

“Dude watch the fucking car!”

Jordan came down hard on his side, his outstretched hand brushing the tire as he came down.

Then a great flash of light filled the garage like a dying star, nearly blinding you. The sound of groaning metal and glass shattering was heard through the flash.

You stumbled back away from the corona of light that enveloped your car, your impossibly cherry red hair tickling your cheeks.

“Fuck!” Jordan scrambled backwards like the worlds largest crab, eyes wide and rapidly lengthening hair trailing down his neck.

Hauling himself to his feet, Jordan joined you in staring at the ball of light that rested in the center of your garage.

“D-dude,” he stammered, “did I hit my head or something? Are you seeing what I’m seeing?”

“Uh Huh,” you whispered in stunned fascination, “I’m seeing it, just working on the believing part.”

You looked away from the light and gawked at your friend. He turned to stare back at you, looking really weirded out.

“Dude, your hair...,” you hissed, “look at your fucking hair!”

“My hair?! Look at yours! Looks like fucking chick’s hair!” He snarled back in response.

Not only had your hair changed, Jordan’s normally unkempt mop of dark brown was rapidly gaining length, now cresting the base of his shoulder blades and showing no signs of stopping.

But it was the color, the color, that stole the show.

The bland, generic brown had changed, now a rich shade that somehow hovered between black and a rich glossy shade of unnaturally pretty purple. It was gorgeous and odd, much like your own bouncy shoulder length red tresses.

And not only that, what should’ve been shaggy and unkempt was straight and beautiful, with loose bangs swept to the side over his forehead and tucked beneath some longer bangs that gently framed his face. It was a very feminine style.

“Dude,” he stared at you, his eyes flicking to your hair, “what the fuck?”

Out of nowhere, a pair of ruffled pink scrunchies secured his hair into two low, loose pigtails just above his shoulders, just as his purpling tresses reached his hips and stopped, their rapid growth finally finished.

The both of you now had heads of hair that wouldn’t have looked out of place on a dedicated cosplayer.

But both of your new hairstyles looked wrong, the tresses looked too full, too glossy and well kept, every strand where it was supposed to be no matter what.

The light surrounding your car slowly dying down stole back your attention from your unnaturally pretty hair.

The light winked out abruptly.

Your Camaro was nowhere to be seen.

“Dude... what the FUCK?! My car!” You bellowed at the top your lungs, hands grabbing at your plushy hair in horror.

In the place of the low slung black muscle car, a small white Toyota coupe sat in the middle of your garage.

All that work, gone.

You slowly turned to your gobsmacked friend and blanched.
1441111211.title: A Hair Raising Situation

14411112111.content:
"What...in the world is happening?!" Jordan shook his head, making his long hair fly about comically. "Did I hit my head or something?!"

You had nothing to say. You were actually kind of on the verge of freaking out. First of all, how in the world did your car just transform like that?! Secondly, how did your hair also just become completely different? You were pretty sure you hadn't drank anything weird over the past few days so this couldn't be a fever dream or anything, and certainly not one you would ever have naturally.

Still, that being said, you slowly turned to Jordan, who was still stunned. Your face blanched as you did though.

"Dude your eyes!" you cried out.

"What?!" Jordan said back. "What about them?!"

"Just, go look!" you cried back, being louder than you had ever been in your whole life.

Jordan ran over to one of the side mirrors similar to what you did, and you could hear his voice hitching in his throat right as he did. His eyes appeared to be...growing bigger? Maybe that wasn't the right word exactly, but they appeared to be becoming brighter and incredibly more expressive. However, what really stood out was how they were tilting, and even taking on an almond shape. But, perhaps most of it, his eyes were turning into those of brilliant green like those of fields. They looked...distinctly Asian for one thing, something that didn't take long for either of you to notice.

"They....look Asian...." you gulped as you looked at Jordan, who turned back at you.

"W-What is all this?! I...I must be dreaming!" he cried out before his wide eyes went even wider. "A-And it's happening to you too!"

You recoiled a bit as you heard that, your hands going to your eyes. You rushed over to join Jordan, getting a good spot to look at yourself. Your eyes were becoming very much like Jordans, similar shape and tilt and everything. The only difference being that your own average orbs were starting to take on a purplish-color, as vibrant as anything else you've seen.

Both your hair and eyes looked so out of place, like too perfect to be real. They expressed a certain colorfullness that you'd expect more out of...well an anime for one thing. Cosplaying wasn't exactly something you and Jordan did, but this looked far deeper than any you had seen before.

"Okay, I think we need to..." you gulped a bit, shaking a bit in uncertainty. "We...really need to..."

"Really try to figure out what's causing this," Jordan said back to finish your thought. "I think we've established we're not dreaming....AH!"

Jordan's cry startled you, but you could see why. His hands were on his face, not looking in pain but certainly something was happening. You wanted to come over and help, but soon you began to feel the same thing on your own face, making you groan a bit. There was no pain, and barely any discomfort either. It was just weird above all else.

Both of you looked towards the mirror again the best you could. Both of your heads were appearing to be a slightly different shape, somehow making your new hair even more benefiting. Soft face adorned both of you, with pale pink lips that looked completely sweet. Your noses looked small and cute, with just the right cheekbones and eyebrows. Longer eyelashes complimented your new eyes as well.

Small blushes were even adorning both of your faces, and both looked very natural on smoother skin.

"Dude....this is seriously messed up..." spoke Jordan, fear evident.
14411112111.title: “Dude your eyes!”

The song starts affecting your clothing.
The song begins to affect your surroundings.
144111121113.content:
You stared at your face in the mirror, a soft pink blush coating your cheeks. The face that stared back at you was eerily beautiful, with a youthful and cute charm that seemed perfect. Too perfect in fact, so perfect it was unnatural. Your skin was too soft, the shade a perfect shade of pale peach, too smooth, without any blemish, not a freckle or zit. Your nose was so small and dainty, and your lips soft and pink, glimmering with faint gloss. Your hair was too vibrant of a red, so soft and full you couldn't resist touching the long strands that curved delicately around your face. And yet, regardless of your tugging and stroking, every strand returned to it's rightful place, always.

Though, it was your eyes that truly left you breathless.

They were huge, almost too big and wide, bearing the typical slightly almond shape of an Asian. Full, dark lashes framed them while your irises gleamed like gemstones, a pure shade of amethyst that couldn't be natural for any human outside of genetic mutation.

It was a girl's face, undeniably. A very very pretty one, nonetheless.

"This is so messed up... so messed up... what the hell is this?"

While you were basically ogling your face, Jordan was pacing back and forth muttering to himself, aggressively tugging on one of his lengthy purple pigtails while muttering to himself. But, like with your own hair, no matter how hard he tugged at them, they remained perfectly styled, not a hair out of place.

"Dude," you said, staring at him worriedly, "you're freaking yourself out."

This proved to be the wrong thing to say.

Jordan's face whipped towards you, anger flashing in beautiful pools of verdant green.

"I'm freaking myself out?" he growled low in his throat, a low and guttural sound that didn't fit his pretty face, "have you looked at your face in the mirror? Because I have, and I don't recognize the face that stares back."

He chuckled darkly, "I look like an damn anime girl, Alex. And so do you."

He was right of course, Jordan had a face that was eerily pretty, much like your own. But, in a few key ways, it was subtly different. Whereas your own purple eyes had a slightly more upward tilt at the corners, giving you a sharper look, Jordan's eyes were the opposite. They had a more soft look to them, having a slight downward tilt, and had they not been flashing in anger and irritation, they might've looked somewhat sleepy, almost serene.

"I know," you said with a wince, "I'm struggling too, but getting wound up and working yourself into a panic ain't helping."

He stared you down angrily for a moment before taking a deep, steadying breath, the tension leaving his shoulders.

"Yeah," he said with a sigh, raking his hand through those lovely purple tresses of his, "I know, but I'm having really hard time processing this, man."

He grimaced, toying with a strand of hair.

"This goes against so many natural laws its not even funny. The fact that we have the faces of anime chicks is one thing but we just watched your car changing into something else right in front of us."

He gestured to the little white Toyota, and you grimaced. You were still feeling that sting, but right now there were bigger fish to fry than your lost car.

"Shit like that doesn't happen."

You opened your mouth to respond.

"Kono hareta hi ni mewosamasu" Waking up on this fine day

Both of you turned your eyes to the phone sitting on the workbench, forgotten in the shitstorm that had taken place, as a new song began to play. A cheerful, upbeat tune compared to the softer one that came before it.

"Dude I can't hear that right now," Jordan said, squeezing his eyes tightly shut, "turn it off."

"Shatsu ga dokoni mo mitsukaranai" Can't find my shirt anywhere

You nodded in agreement and moved to do just that. The song seemed to resonate with you in a strange way, threatening to overwhelm you again. But you shook your head clear of it and picked up your phone and tapped the pause icon on the screen.

"Ima sugu gaishutsu suru hitsuyō ga arimasu" I need to go out now

You tapped on it again, but the phone refused to cooperate and the cheery, upbeat sound of the young girls singing continued.

"Alex," Jordan murmured, hands pressed over his ears as if he couldn't stand the sound, fingers gripping his hair tightly, "for the love of god... TURN... IT... OFF..."

"Sonohi wa watashi o matte imasen!" The day isn't waiting for me!

"I'm trying, just give me a second!"

Your finger jabbed at the screen. The phone ignited in your hands, a bright white flash nearly blinding you. The bulky, impact proof case slimmed down in your hands, the sturdy black rubber and plastic turning a feminine shade of violet, while a small charm in the shape of a flower attached to a thin cord dangled from it.

You stared at it in shock.

1441111211132.content:
"What's going on?" Jordan grumbled, leaning against the car and pulling his head back, still trying to block out the music.

"It....It's not working...." you gulped, looking back towards him with a very worried look. You couldn't see all of it, but your new face made your worry all the more expressive, just like something out of an anime.

"What do you mean?" Jordan asked, turning his head and putting his hands down. The music still seemed to irritate him, but he couldn't keep his hands up forever.

"Look," you said in your shaky voice, holding up your transformed phone. "I keep hitting pause and it won't do anything. And before you mention it again, it was never having this sort of problem before. It....It's like the thing's possessed or something..."

"Well.....given what's going on, maybe that's the case," Jordan sighed, hands going to his hips rather femininely but he really didn't care right now. "Sigh.....God I wish we could do something...but what exactly do we do against something that's supernatural."

"No idea..." you sighed, hand shaking through your cherry red hair.

The upbeat song continued to play, a very curious sort of beat and instrumentation going on with it. Almost sounded like something out of a port town from an RPG or something. Honestly, your head wasn't hurting as much as before, but the song continued to enter your heads easily. You looked down at your phone again, noting how smooth your hands looked. You blinked a bit, turning your hand over as you felt it a bit. Whatever happened to your face seemed to be affecting the rest of you as well, erasing any sort of zits and blemishes you had had over the past few months. Through your pants, you couldn't see all of it, but you had to imagine whatever it was was spreading.

Jordan blinked at you observing your hands a bit, making him look at his own. Behold, it was happening to him as well, a change he and you were barely even feeling, like something just washing over you. a pale peach shade erasing any rough patches it came across. You kind of wondered what that was doing for other things like what hair you had, but if what you were seeing on your arms was any indication, that wasn't spared either. The sensation as you touched your arms a bit sent a little chill down your spine, a perfect shade that almost gleamed in the sunlight getting through into the garage.

Whatever this was, it was spreading and fast.

"I suppose breaking your phone is out of the question," Jordan suggested with another groan, wishing he could shut that thing off.

"Honestly, given everything going on, I get the feeling nothing would happen," you suggested. "Plus, Mom would probably kill....Wha?"

Apart from what you were feeling on your skin, you were suddenly feeling a tingly sensation from your t-shirt. Its slight looseness appeared to be conforming slightly, just to be a little more snug as the color looked like it was bleaching, Eyes widening a bit, you inadvertently took a step back as you looked down at your changing shirt.

"Oh no.....now it's on my shirt..." you said in a shaky voice.

"Mine too...." Jordan said, a little louder in his like he was more worried.

In a way, both of your shirts seemed to be experiencing similar changes, with shirts becoming more fitting and bleaching colors. Furthermore, your sleeves seemed to be moving down your arms, going past your elbows. However, one distinct thing that happened was that both of your necklines were actually closing in around your necks, actually forming up against them as they folded over into some collars.

"What is this? Formal wear or something?" Jordan asked incredulously.

"I couldn't tell you," you replied back. "I know as much as you do."

While that was going on, the tingling sensation was moving to both of your pants, making the material ruffle and flutter a bit on your skin. Looking down past your shirt, you could feel a small breeze on your ankles, showing that they were exposed to the air. Getting a closer look, you could see pale skin beginning to emerge from shortening pant legs. Another distinctive feature was that the color was starting to change, with certain shades coming in certain places.

Oh, and to top it off, your socks looked a little longer too.

"Oh god....don't tell me this is going to be a skirt," Jordan whined, hands on his soft cheeks now. "This is insane. Are we seriously becoming some kind of anime chicks?"

It sounded so ridiculous, yet what could you say to prove him wrong. Your brain felt like mush trying to figure all of this out, and you kind of wondered why you weren't freaking out more. Perhaps it was just the idea that something inevitable was happening.

14411112111321.content:
As much as you wanted to rage against the inevitable, that wasn't going to help you with your predicament. The playlist on your phone continued to march on as one song ended and another soon began. You tugged uselessly at the audio cord, but it remained stubbornly plugged into the headphone jack.

"Ready?!" a chorus of young girls cheered, followed by a harmonic riff from electric guitars, giving it a more rock and roll theme compared to the more pop-sounding song previously playing.

You and Jordan shared a look of dread. No, no you were assuredly not ready, but the girls that were singing their hearts out for this song probably didn't care what you or Jordan thought.

"Mattenai yo...Love!!" I won't wait for you...Love!!

As the music began to pick up the pace, you felt the same tingling that had affected your clothing before return with vengeance. Your sleeves lengthened further to your wrists and conformed closer to your arms, removing any sort of bagginess and creating a far more form fitting look. Your "t-shirt" seemed to split and tear down the center, exposing a crisp white button down shirt that had definitely not been there moments earlier. A pair of shiny gold buttons quickly pulled both halves of your "shirt" back together while another pair emerged from your stiffening shirt cuffs, from which a hint of your new white button down peeked out. New pockets seemed to open up, one along the right pectoral and two on either sides of your waist.

A deep blue shade swiftly bled through and devoured any trace of the black there had been previously.

"Is... is this a blazer?" Jordan asked with an uneasy look as he raised his own lengthening sleeves, also adorned with shiny gold
buttons.

"Mitsuketa! Kimi wa sabishii hitomi datta" I found you! Your eyes looked lonely!

Not wanting to be left behind, your pants continued to shorten, more and more pale peach skin becoming visible with every inch. Like your face and hands, the skin on your legs was soft as silk and utterly hairless, devoid of any blemish or imperfection. It looked far too perfect, seeming to gleam with a healthy shine from the lights overhead.

You pant legs seemed to broaden, slowly merging together into a singular sleeve of softening fabric, which felt more like cotton than the previously more durable denim. The previously uniform shape folded into tidy pleats as the faded blue shade darkened, shot through with a grid like pattern of darker and lighter blues trimmed with red strips, resembling a plaid texture.

"Oh.. oh no..." you said, horrified realization dawning on you.

Jordan didn't say a word, looking in horrified fascination as his own skirt, for it could be nothing else at this point, pulled itself up passed his pale, hairless knees with no signs of stopping.

"Kodou ga natteru "te ni irenasai" to" Your heartbeat's calling out, saying "take me into your hands"

Your black socks thinned, clinging more to your legs more closely before shooting up to rest in the middle of your calves, looking more like some stockings than "socks". Your boots followed suit, their bulky brown forms compacting down, the laces unwinding and vanishing, into a pair of simple black leather flats, which were then polished to a perfect shine.

You swallowed, you knew exactly what this was. How could you not?

You turned to Jordan and found him looking utterly horrified as he tugged at the sinfully short pleated, blue and red plaid miniskirt than sat around his upper thighs. His own boots had formed into the same shiny leather flats you now wore, but his socks had crawled up further than yours, looking like a pair of thigh high stockings than anything else.

"Haigo ni ayumi yoru suriru ga tamaranai" Stepping up in the background, the thrill is unbearable!

"Jordan," you spoke slowly, tugging on your own miniskirt.

He looked up at you, green eyes wider than usual. A green ribbon striped with blue bloomed into existence around his collar, tying itself into a tidy bow. An identical bow soon graced your own neck.

"It's a school uniform," you said grimly.

He merely stared at you in horror, still fruitlessly tugging on his miniskirt as if to coax some more length out of it.

So here you were, your pale, hairless bodies clad in the telltale blazer, blouse, and miniskirt worn by schoolgirls in nearly every anime you'd ever seen. But as much as your faces and skin radiated that perfect beauty that personified the archytpe of a young anime girl, the the identical schoolgirl outfits you'd been forced into were hardly flattering to your tall, lanky figures.

But for how long might that be?

"Nerai sadametara nigasanai kara nigasanai kara My target!!" Because once I've chosen my target, you can't run away. You can't run away, my target!!

You needed to get help, somehow, before this got much, much worse.

144111121113211.content:
"W-We need to get help....somehow...." you said in a shaky voice, your worried face betraying any sense of confidence.

Jordan seemed to handling it much worse, visibly shaking. He truly looked like a worried anime girl, his new features almost adding a sort-of exaggerated feel to his movements. You couldn't help but wonder if you looked similar in some way. You couldn't blame him in any way of course. Honestly, you were surprised you could even form a cohesive thought right now. All that reminded you guys of your male selves were your height, chest, and groin. Oh, and voices too.

But who knows how long that would last. The songs were continuing to play without end.

"Ahhhh....." Jordan whined a bit, shaking heavily. "Why can't those.....darn songs just end already.....?"

"And there were dozens of them," you said, making Jordan widen his eyes at you. "Yeah, when I was downloading the CD, I caught at least a few dozen songs. It could probably just keep going on."

"No....this can't be....not...not a schoolgirl..." Jordan looked like he could crumble at any second. "I thought I was done with high school....I can't be one again.....Kore wa okori enai!" {superThis can't be happening!}

Both your eyes and Jordan's eyes widened in horror, and Jordan's hands clasped over his mouth instantly, eyes as wide as could possibly be. That....That wasn't English. That was undoubtedly Japanese, and even more so, in that moment, both you and he could understand what the words meant as if they were in English.

Not to mention, in that instant, he had the high-pitched voice of an anime girl.

"P-Please tell me you can still talk..." you said, walking over slightly.

"Ah....hello....." Jordan gingerly tested a couple words, speaking in English again and sounding closer to his usual self. "Oh god....what if it's taking me over...."

"And it's probably only a matter of time before...it happens to me too..." you got quieter near the end.

As much as questioning your manner of speech was troubling, you both had more to worry about once a certain pressure hit your entire body.

Both you and Jordan cringed a little as you felt something strange. It was like....like something trying to push you, making you more compact in some way. Like everything else, it didn't hurt, but it felt strange for sure, and you found it hard to move with the sensation on you. In a way, it was kind of like some kind of gravity forcing you.

You struggled to keep your eyes open, but you did anyway, allowing you to see what was happening. That being....a lot of things getting taller, making you gasp.

"I...I think we're getting shorter...." you trembled. "Oh god....everything.....subete ga ōkiku natte imasu." everything is getting bigger

You gasped in a little squeak at the sudden inflection coming out of your mouth. Oh no, it was just like Jordan as you thought would happen. Was it really going to take you over or something? Was Japanese all you were going to be able to speak?! How would you even be able to communicate in this country?! No doubt Jordan was thinking similarly among other things.

Eventually, the pressure finally left, leaving you both a little short of breath from feeling like being packed into a can of sardines. The loss of height was apparent though, with much of your lankiness being taken away. It was hard to tell for sure, but you could tell you both were as far away from 6 feet tall as possible, much closer to 5 feet. Well, to be exact, you were around 5'3" or so, while Jordan looked just a teeny bit shorter at 5'2". A couple centimeters were all that separated you too.

The silver lining that the clothes, more importantly the skirt, felt just a bit better with your new height hardly compared to the fear that you both looked the part of high-school girls from all outside appearances.
