1441111211132112.content:
You couldn't help but give Jordan a once over as he did the same to you. He really did look lovely, you admitted privately, the well kept purple tresses went well with his vivid green eyes and pale skin. Even on his small, but boyishly uncurved body, his schoolgirl's uniform fit him snugly, even if there was currently nothing really to flatter.

While you both possessed sufficiently short, petite statures, beautiful faces and hair befitting young Japanese anime girls, your bodies still had notes of boyishness in their shapes. You still had no discernible curves, your hips still narrow, your legs still too thin and lanky, and your chests still flat.

For now, that is.

Another song began to play and both of you tensed, bracing yourselves for whatever was about to happen. The pounding of electronic bass filled the air, but no vocals came.

"Are... are you ready?" you asked grimly.

Jordan looked at you, dread evident in those pretty green eyes. He squeezed them tightly shut, not wanting to look at what was going to happen to you two.

"No."

The song began to pick up the pace, ready to drop.

Then, the music stopped mid note.

You blinked, some of the tension leaving you. You looked at Jordan, who opened one eye slowly.

"Is... this part of the song?" he asked warily, tugging on one of his pigtails nervously. It was a strange, disturbingly feminine habit he seemed to have picked up ever since they'd grown in. You'd noticed other things as well, and not just with him.

You had also seemingly picked up the habit of twirling some of the strands that curved around your face when you got nervous or unsettled. You both also seemed to want to rest your hands on your hips more than before, as if there was a curve there you didn't possess... yet.

Disturbing. You just hoped that little mannerisms and such were all the mental changes you were going to experience, the thought of you and Jordan ceasing to be, well, yourselves was a sobering one.

"No," you said, moving carefully towards your phone as if afraid it would suddenly blast you with sound, "if it was, it would've started already."

You stared down at the screen and warily tapped it. The screen lit dimly up, the icon for low battery flashing across it. You felt as if a great weight had lifted off yours shoulders. Finally, things might be turning around for the better.

"It's dead, the phone ran out of juice!" you giggled slightly in relief "Yatta! I must've forgotten to charge it last night before I went to bed!"

Ignoring the fact you had just screamed yatta instead of an elated "Yes!", you tugged on the audio cable and, surprise surprise, it came loose without issue. You smiled widely, pointedly ignoring just how lovely it looked on your face in the reflection on the phone's darkened screen.

Behind you, Jordan remained silent.

"Maybe now the changes will stop!"

Jordan made a little noise, a tiny squeak like that of a mouse.

You turned around quizzically, wondering why he had made such a noise and found him standing there with his arms crossed over his chest and his fingers holding his shoulder in a death grip. He was as pale as a ghost and had a look of mortified horror on his face.

"Hey, what's up? Did you hear me?" you asked him curiously, "I said maybe now that music stopped we might stop changing."

"No," He looked up at you, his big green eyes looking even huger, "its not stopping..."

He slowly lowered his arms slightly and his chest bulged out into a pair of rapidly growing lumps under his blazer. The blazer stretched and shifted to accommodate the growing breasts, for they could be nothing else, never losing its well fitted shape despite their growth.

"Are," your mouth went dry, "are those breasts?"

He nodded slowly before his eyes dropped to your own chest.

A soft tickle in your own chest had you paling and turning away from Jordan's wide eyes. Your previously flat chest swelled and grew into a pair of soft lumps under your own blazer, quickly edging past a small A-cup and working their way into the uppers, then passed that into the B-cup range. Like with Jordan's blazer, yours shifted to accommodate the new growths, pulling snug across your chest until the gentle swells of your new breasts under it were clearly visible.

Breath hitching, you undid the buttons on your blazer, then your blouse and carefully pulled it apart. A modest cut of pale, perky B-cup cleavage rested comfortably in a lacy, red bra that went with your hair.

You gave a high pitched squeak of embarrassment, not unlike the one Jordan made, and quickly fumbled with your buttons to hide your chest from your own prying eyes.

Grossing your arms over your chest protectively, you looked over your shoulder at Jordan and found him staring at his own chest blushing bright red. You gaped at him.

"B-big..." he whispered, "Karera wa totemo ōkī..." They're so big...

Indeed, whereas your own breasts had stopped midway in the B-cup range, Jordan's had not, instead shooting past it, well into the C-cups and then possibly just cresting into the D-cup range before stopping. They looked quite large on his tiny frame, their significant cleavage presented to you in a lacy purple bra that, like your own, went well with his hair.

You felt a brief, uncharacteristic swell of envy as you looked away from Jordan's own more substantial cleavage to your own chest, patting it's much smaller additions angrily.

"Lame... so lame..."

Was the heck was THAT supposed to mean?! And how did B-cup breasts mean he had grown? They were small compared....no no no! Those shouldn't be important period! Ugh, stay on track! Suffice to say, your mom was just as confused, if not a little weirded out by two girls acting intimate in her own garage. Come to think of it...wait....where did that Toyota come from?

"Okay just...where's Alex and Jordan?" Heidi asked as she walked forward. "And is that your car? If you're not acquainted with them, then you should leave. I don't want to have to call the police."

You were totally freaked now. No, that would be a terrible idea! How in the world could you explain any of this?!

"No...no, don't do that!" you cried back. "We...uh....Watashitachiha Arekkusu to Jōdandesu." We are Alex and Jordan.

"Excuse me?" Heidi asked, perplexed and wondering if she was being messed with. "Look, this is going nowhere," she added as she was bringing out her phone. Probably as a precaution as she wasn't sure what these "girls" were doing.

"Mama janai!" No mom! you cried out suddenly, getting away from Jordan to grab your mom's arm. You know, agitation seemed to bring these Japanese words out more often, but that was beside the point.

Heidi again looked perplexed as you grabbed her arm. However, she didn't get a chance to talk after that, as a bright light shone from the spot where you grabbed her, making everyone present cry out. The light took no time at all in engulfing Heidi, and you were treated to an astonishing sight.

"Nantekotta....." you said with your hands on your mouth, wondering to Kami what you had just done.

Suddenly, the sight in front of you was the equivalent of watching a balloon deflate. Your mom's absolutely huge size shrunk like all the air and fat was leaving her, like someone had poked a hole in her or something. It looked like some bizarre transformation scene complete with fluffy background to add extra flair. Heidi's limbs flailed a bit as everything about her shrunk, from overall size to bust to just about everything until she was gaining a figure not so different from your own, complete with a bust size just like your own.

But the big changes came afterwards. Heidi's hair was going from its usual red to a sort of orange/light brown color that looked as perfect as yours and Jordan's. Immediately, said hair styled itself into a side ponytail, tied with a bright pink ribbon. Her eyes turned from their usual green to a brilliant sea blue, them changing form into the same almond-sized and expressive eyes you sported. From there, her clothes rapidly changed from the dress she had before, splitting into different parts. The top turned into a white short-sleeved shirt. A sleeveless pale-blazer formed over it, complete with blue bow like your own. The bottom half shifted into the exact same skirt as well, completing what looked like a summer version of what you wore now. The ensemble completed itself with similar dark socks like yours and the same shoes.

And just like that, before stood before you appeared to be another young Japanese schoolgirl, even baring the same uniform.

"M-Mom?" you asked gingerly.
14411112111321121.title: You get a visitor in the garage.

choices: You and Jordan decide you have to leave... NOW
144111121113211212.content:
You stared at your tiny, girlish hand like it had betrayed you.

And, you supposed, it kind of had.

Your mother, or more correctly, the young girl your mother had transformed into looked to have been cut from the exact same cloth as you and Jordan. Her skin a fair peach without any blemishes or imperfections of any kind, her orangey hair perfectly coiffed and tied in a cute side ponytail, her eyes too deep and expressive, the list went on.

However, the newly minted orangette was staring vacantly ahead, seemingly in a daze.

All from a touch.

Jordan, who had seemingly snapped out of his perverted episode, was staring at the girl in horror.

“Oh crap,” he mumbled, “that’s... that’s not good...”

You didn’t say anything in response, still to stunned and horrified by what had just taken place. Your “mom” was still looking incredibly dazed but how long was that going to last?

You had hoped that no one would bother you and Jordan in the garage for this very reason. How were you going to explain how the two of you were in fact the girls who had been groping one another?

How the hell were you going to explain why your mom’s heavyset figure was now a petite schoolgirl much like yourself?

“I think we have a problem,” Jordan said slowly as he walked up beside you, still staring at your “mom” grimly.

You glared at him, like it was his fault you were in this mess. He had been the one to start groping
you out of the blue in some out of character bout of madness.

“You think?”

He looked at you, huge green eyes gleaming with worry.

“You touched her,” he explained, “you touched her and she changed, I touched your car and it changed, you touched your phone and it changed...”

Oh...

Oh.

“Oh fuck,” you breathed out, looking at your hands like someone had just handed you a loaded gun.

“I think... I think it’s like some kind of virus,” he said quietly as he began to once again tug aggressively on one of his pigtails, “its transmitted by touch and from what I can gather, the people and things that are touched by us seem to change quicker.”

He paused, staring at the clump of glossy purple hair in his tiny fist.

“Our changes have been really dragging but everything else seems to change in a flash, pun not intended.”

Looking over at the frozen form of your “mom” who, thankfully, seemed to still be in La-la land. Whether or not her brain was still playing catch up with her body or something more sinister remained to be seen.

But what were you going to do now? Your mom wasn’t her heavy-set redheaded self anymore, how were you going to get out of this shitshow you and Jordan found yourselves in?

You opened your mouth to respond when...
144111121113211212.title: From Meaty to Cutie?

1441111211132112121.content:
Just when you were about to respond to Jordan's words, a suddenly pressure erupted down below, all around your groan and hips. You could immediately tell what it was.

"Oh no....." you groaned, dreading what was to come. What would really make you a girl.

Like the rest, it wasn't painful. If anything, it disturbingly felt...kind of like pleasure, which didn't make you feel good about it at all. You could tell Jordan had exactly the same things, his face all worried as he had hands on his butt.

"Oh man.....this is going to suck," he groaned.

"Why? You're probably going to be bigger than me again," a thought went through your mind, making you shake your head. Sheesh, this was no time for such thoughts!

Still, nothing could prepare you for the sensation as it started. Your eyes widened in surprise as you felt your hip bones shifting, beginning to adjust to a whole new frame fit for childbirth. The very idea of that though sent your mind in a whole other direction that felt just as disturbing. You had wondered about it from time to time as most guys would, but the idea of you being on the receiving end, becoming pregnant and carrying a child through to birth? Nothing about that felt good, especially when you heard all the stories from other women about it but that was beside the point.

Your breath hitched in your throat as your hips continued to expand, growing out to a nice shape that complimented what your figure had been building up to this whole time. The skirt began to fit perfectly well against them, still way too short for your liking. Sheesh, how did anyone really wear these? Well, in addition to that, the pressure went into your butt as well, making you put your hands on your cheeks as they began to grow as well. Much like your hips, they were growing to a complimentary size, not super big but still more than what you had before, making your skirt fit just fine.

You spared a glance towards Jordan, who was feeling the same thing. His hips and butt were growing out all the same, and they were growing to compliment his figure all the same. To your surprise though, his hips actually grew out around the same as yours, if nothing else, perhaps just a little bit smaller. Honestly, you weren't sure how you could ever tell the difference, but something in you just got this good feeling of having just a little bit of a smaller waist and bigger hips than Jordan.

"Oh, for crying out loud, snap out of it!" you shouted in your head. This wasn't the time for getting all angsty on girl sizes. You shouldn't even care anyway. Ugh, it was all so stupid! B-Baka!

However, that could scarcely prepare either of you for the next change, and the fact that it was right on your groins told the whole story. Jordan looked incredibly distressed by it as he should be, and you probably had a similar look. Part of you wanted to pull your skirt up to look, but felt too afraid to do to. You pressed a hand to your skirt, already feeling your thing rapidly shrinking. You had lost in feeling in it already, no doubt thanks to the change in your bones earlier that made it useless. All the while there was a feeling of rearranging going on inside of you.

The prospect of motherhood was growing itself inside of your body, making you feel all the more stressed out on it. However, before long, you couldn't feel anything but a flat surface. Out of morbid curiosity, you pulled your skirt up a little, seeing nothing but a smooth surface covered in red panties like your bra. Likewise for Jordan, he had purple panties.

You...you were both girls now. At least...you were where it counted, leaving you both in silence. It was expected at this point, but no less shocking to the mind.
1441111211132112121.title: Another change wracks your bodies

choices: You and Jordan take “Honoka-chan” with you to get help.
One of your sisters comes home.
14411112111321121211.content:
Honestly, there was something surreal about knowing that down below, you now had all the necessary organs to conceive and birth a child. You prodded at the smooth surface of your red panties feeling nothing but the faint creases and folds of soft vaginal lips in place of what had once resisted there.

But, with that feeling of surreality came a sense of horror.

The male genitalia that you had been born with and carried for nearly two decades had been converted into a fully functioning set of organs that were purpose built for conceiving, carrying, and birthing children.

There was a distinctive cognitive dissonance between your now entirely female body and the very much still male mind that sat in your skull.

Those disturbing thoughts of childbirth aside, you felt your lips instinctively curl slightly upwards as your hands moved away from your panties and began to feel your longer, shapelier legs and trace up your sides.

You felt the broader, more rounded curves of your hips, the full heart shape of your butt, the perfect thickness of your smooth thighs and calves, and the slim dip of your waist and felt that sense of triumph that seemed to lurk in the depths of your brain.

“You might have bigger breasts than me, but my figure is better, my legs too~” you thought with a smug grin as you eyed Jordan, who was busy inspecting his new “goods” with a cherry red blush on his, her, face.

The smug grin froze on your face. What the hell was the matter with you?! Why did it matter who had the better figure or the bigger breasts anyway?! It’s not like either of you wanted a “figure” at all, let alone breasts! Why were you being such a baka!

“But it’s true though, my figure is great~”

Kami, you could somehow just hear the tilde
 in that thought!.

You dragged the smug, treasonous thoughts you had just had a moment ago to the deepest corner of your mind and smothered it with a pillow.

Shaking your head, you turned back to Jordan, who was shifting from foot to foot, inadvertently cocking her hips side to side to accommodate her new balance.

“Is... is yours gone, too?” You asked carefully.

He, she, nodded mutely, grabbing a small fistful of her skirt.

You breathed heavily through your nose. You both were girls, very lovely looking ones, in every way that mattered.

“A-ah...”

Your heads both whipped back to the elephant in the room, your “mom”’s dazed figure. The newly minted orangette shook her head, her side ponytail swinging through the air. Clear blue eyes blinked owlishly at the both of you before she smiled.

You blanched. It was a bright, wonderful thing like rude sunshine through your blinds at the crack of dawn, full of energy and good cheer. Not at all like the tired smiles your mom usually have her children after working all day.

“Okaa-San?” You stammered, “I... I mean, Mom?”

The girl’s smile only seemed to grow, impossibly enough.

“Oh! Ohayo!” She chirped, her voice a high pitched thing radiating a sense of optimism and energy.

She looked around, those clear blue eyes wide.

“Did I zone out again?”

You looked at Jordan, and found her staring back at you uneasily. She stepped forward a bit and swallowed.

“M-miss Tucker?” She tried slowly.

Your “mom’s” nose scrunched up cutely and she shook her head, sending her ponytail swinging again.

“Nope! Call me Honoka-chan!”

Your heart stilled, had your mom lost herself in her transformation? The thought filled you with dread.

“Mom? It’s me, Asu... ah, Alex. Do you remember me?” You dearly hoped so. You decided to ignore the slip in the pronunciation of your name.

Your “mom” smiled at you, “of course, silly! You’re my cute musume! But call me Honoka-chan. Calling me that...”

Her nose scrunched up again.

“... feels a bit weird.”

“B-but Okaa-!” She silenced you by putting a finger on your lips and stepping very close, her big blue eyes unblinkingly staring into your own purple ones.

“H-o-n-o-k-a-C-h-a-n.” She repeated firmly.

You inwardly grimaced but complied. It seemed like this girl, your “mom”, or whatever she wanted to call herself, wasn’t going to budge.

“Honoka-chan...” you mumbled.

She smiled brightly again and clapped her hands.

“There! Was that so hard?”

Yes. Yes it was.

Somehow, your “mom” seemed to have become an anime schoolgirl much like the ones you and Jordan had turned into, but had also held onto her place as your mother. It didn’t make a lick of sense to you, but “Honoka-chan” seemed like she was the stubborn sort and wasn’t going to accept anything else.

*okaa-san = mother
**musume =daughter
14411112111321121211.title: A Peppy Problem

144111121113211212111.content:
This left both you and Jordan in a tougher spot. What were you both to do now? You both were anime girls now, with the only thing sort of left being your voices, and your mom had now fully become one and seemed to think of herself squarely as "Honoka-chan". Not to mention other things like your phone, car, and Jordan's theory that touching stuff seemed to carry similar transformations like a virus.

All in all, it kind of sucked.

"So, what now?" Jordan mumbled, as you could see how distraught she looked. Compared to how she could swear up a storm when agitated, she almost looked demure now, just twirling his hair a little bit.

"I....don't know...." you mumbled back. Kami, how could you handle this now?

Honoka on the other hand didn't seem troubled in the slightest, humming to herself while rolling back and forth on the balls of her feet, making her ponytail bobble up and down as she did. It was one of the most adorable things you had ever seen, and you'd likely enjoy it if not for the current situation. You really couldn't get a grasp on her mentality. She still seemed to believe she was your mom, yet didn't act like it. Asking you to call her "Honoka-chan" almost sounded more like something to call a friend rather than your own mom even though she was about your age now. Ugh, it made no sense what so ever.

"Oh! That car is so kawaii!" she squealed, skipping over to your new Toyota. "Looks all new too!"

"Yeah...that's...not really a good thing..." Jordan mumbled before turning to you. "Seriously man, what now?"

"You think I have a better idea?" you spat out. "I wouldn't know how to handle becoming some anime girl."

"What are you two talking about?" Honoka giggled as she jumped between you two. "The day's too short to stand around moping! Ah! I got a great idea! We should get the others. We could have some family fun!"

Getting Susie and Victoria involved? Well, to be honest, Victoria becoming some nice Japanese girl actually wasn't the worst idea. Heck, you could tell Jordan was thinking that over right now, and he didn't seem too troubled. For your little imōto though, that was a little tricky. Would your entire house be full of high school aged girls now? How would they pay for the house and everything? Ugh, too many questions.

Honoka certainly didn't seem troubled though, humming to herself as she continued to bounce. As she did though, she ended up backing into the table that held the stereo and tools and everything by accident.

"Ah, whoops." she smiled, sticking her tongue out at her oopsy.

Right as she did though, that same bright light began to appear, spreading across the table. Yet, it didn't stop there. No, to your surprise, the light continued from the bench towards just about everywhere in the garage, sweeping over anything and everything. You weren't sure what exactly was happening, but you looked towards the bench which made your eyes widen. All the tools you guys used were vanishing. Actually just about every piece of equipment used on cars was vanishing, the garage getting completely clean as the light washed over it all. The stereo seemed to get an upgrade though, becoming a little fancier while turning white with some sparkles. As the light was dying down, the place looked completely immaculate, not a thing out of place and cleaned still it sparkled.

Okay...now you knew you couldn't stay here, not if every single thing was at risk.

"Okay, we need to go!" you cried out, not wanting to risk anything else and grabbing Honoka's hand, pulling her along to the car.

"Where are we going?" she asked, not sounding offended but rather curious.

"We're....going to visit Daniel," you said.

It took you a while to remember, but Daniel was basically viewed as a genius. He also happened to be your cousin by the way, living in a mansion a little ways away. Honestly, you didn't visit him often, but he was basically the smartest guy you knew. If he didn't know anything about this, well who would then. Jordan actually hit her forehead once you said that.

"Oh right! That guy!" Jordan said. "I forgot about him. That brainiac you don't like to visit."

"It's not that I don't like him," you said as you closed the door to Honoka's seat. "It's just that it's kind of awkward."

Still, it was way better than here, so you guess you both had a plan. Jordan plopped into the passenger's seat while you got into the driver's seat. Hey, it was still your car even when it was different. If there was any positive to this, the car was really comfy. Guess it's kind of a silver lining to this whole situation. Hopefully now you could spare the rest of your house from changing any more. Before long, you had backed the car out of the garage, closed the garage door, and began driving along the way.

"You do remember how to get there, right?" Jordan asked, hearing Honoka still humming in the back, swaying back and forth.

"Yes I know Kaori-chan," you spoke practically automatically, much like you usually acted when you didn't really want to answer questions.

However, that ended up with the both of you widening your eyes in shock at what you just said. You just called "Kaori-chan" like it was nothing.

"I-I mean......" you blushed heavily.

Ugh, this was not getting any better.
144111121113211212111.title: You and Jordan take “Honoka-chan” with you ...

choices: Speak of the devil, you see a cop pull out and turn his lights on.
Honoka's humming starts to affect something.
You make it to Daniel's without issue.
1441111211132112121112.content:
As you drove, you tried to forget the fact that you had called your best friend by another name. Kaori was about the furthest possible thing from Jordan that you could get, a quintessentially Japanese name for a Japanese girl. You hadn't even meant to say it, it just kind of slipped out, as if somewhere in between your brain and your mouth the name you had meant to say had, quite literally, gotten lost in translation.

Ignoring the fact that there had been some disturbingly Japanese-sounding thoughts in your head here and there, there had been several other instances of that sort of hiccup that you could remember.

“Mom? It’s me, Asu... ah, Alex. Do you remember me?”

Whatever you had been about to say then, it wasn't your name as you knew it. Alex certainly did not start with Asu...

"Soooo," Kao-, no Jordan, spoke slowly, "are we not going to talk about what you just said to me?"

"No," you responded immediately, "No we are not."

Your purple haired friend shifted in her seat with an uncomfortable look on her lovely face. You could only imagine what was going through her head right now. Jordan had always been a really logical person, and everything that had happened to him, or rather her, since she had shown up at your house was decidedly not logical at all.

"Are we there yet?" Honoka's high, peppy voice called from the back seat.

You glanced back at her in the rearview mirror. You were still having a really, really hard time associating your mom with the pretty orangette swaying back and forth in the back seat of your not-Camaro.

"N-not yet, Oka-, I mean, Honoka-chan..." you responded, wincing at the slip of the tongue, "we'll be there in about a half an hour so please be patient."

Honoka pouted, "but I'm booooored!"

You grimaced, Honoka seemed to be the hyperactive, bubbly sort. You should've guessed that sitting still for even relatively short periods of time might be an issue for someone like her, who seemed to be moving or doing something at any given moment. The last thing you wanted was for her to wander off and cause chaos by touching things and spreading whatever thing this was. Calling it a virus didn't seem correct.

"Just... just amuse yourself, onegai," Jordan gave a you a sharp glance at the verbal fumble you just made.

Honoka frowned, her nose scrunching up adorably, before she gave that radiant smile again.

"Can I sing a song?" she asked, blue eyes practically sparkling.

You and Jordan shared a grim look. There was no telling what sort of effect Honoka's singing might have on things given the fact that everything that had happened so far seemed to stem from the bizarre songs from the J-pop CD that you had found in your bedroom.

"I'd... prefer if you didn't..." you said with a wince, "it's distracting and I need to focus on the road."

Honoka looked incredibly put out, like a puppy that had been denied a treat. You almost felt bad, almost. But as much as you wanted to keep your mom, Honoka, happy, you had best err on the side of caution until you talked to Daniel. If there was anyone that could help you, it would be Daniel.

"Him", you thought pessimistically, "or the fucking CDC."

Daniel and you had never been spectacularly close, given your awkward natures but you bonded over your mutual disdain for the teeming masses and your bitchy sisters. Your cousin Christina was just an older, hotter Victoria, as if such a thing was possible. Though, if you could remember correctly, your Aunt, Uncle and Christina had gone away somewhere on vacation and left the monstrous art-deco ancestral Hewitt manor all to Daniel for the time being.

At least, you hoped so. You didn't want to encounter anyone else until you figured this out, let alone any more of your family.

You pressed down on the gas pedal a bit more, easing some more speed from the growling little four cylinder engine that sat where a giant fire-breathing V8 should've been. Kami, this car was so slow compared to your Camaro, which had been a barely street-legal monster. You were still feeling the effects of that particular loss, the wound was definitely still very raw.

"Then can I hum?" Honoka whined, looking downright pitiful in the rear view mirror, an adorable pout on her cute face.

You sighed, looking to Jordan for permission. Wary green eyes stared back at you before she nodded slowly with a grimace. You had to placate her somehow.

"Fine, just keep it quiet, OK? We're almost there."

Your "mom" smiled brightly and began swaying back and forth again, a melodic hum coming from her closed lips. Privately, you thought it sounded lovely and you were sure that anything that Honoka sang would likely sound just as wonderful.

You pressed the accelerator down more. You needed to pick up the pace, there was no telling how much worse this could get and how much it could spread.

"Try slowing down a bit, maybe?" Jordan hissed at you, her eyes carefully scanning the road ahead, "Are you trying to get pulled over?"
1441111211132112121112.title: Continuing Onward

14411112111321121211122.content:
"I'm not going that fast," you said back. Seriously, you were only....10 miles above the limit. Could be worse right? You had handled that in the past.

Jordan huffed a bit, leaning to one side and using her hand to prop her head up. Well, if anything happened, it wasn't like she'd get in trouble. It was your car. Though, did this new car come with any identification? Boy, things could go south quickly if you got arrested, especially with the idea of "touching" something right now.

With that, the conversation died down, with the only noise being Honoka's humming, which was to be fully honest very pleasant. It was...almost calming in a sense. Without getting too sappy, it was a very angelic voice, only further enhanced by her appearance and bouncy personality. You weren't sure if that was a good thing or not honestly, but it was the only sense of peace you had since the whole thing started. So, Honoka's sweet humming was all that was heard for a while.

Until you made a red light stop and Jordan noticed something.....

"Um, Asuk-uh, Alex," Now it was Jordan's turn to nearly slip up. "That look different to you?"

"Hmm?" you said back, before following Jordan's fingers. "Oh.....no....."

Various little signs across the intersection were starting to look different, with many of them changing shape and even changing color. However, one big difference was the emergence of giant Japanese characters appearing on them, the signs becoming brighter and quite frankly more noticeable than the rather small signs of old. Actually, in addition to all of that, more signs were appearing on the street as well on the walking sections.

And, of course, you had no problem reading it all as if it made perfect sense. Even the names of the streets were different.

"It's Honoka-chan," Jordan said, momentarily pausing at using that name. "We should tell her to stop,"

"No...we shouldn't...." you said, looking back at her. She hadn't noticed anything and continued to peacefully hum. "It's just signs after all. And...I don't want to make her miserable."

"Ugh, you're too nice sometimes," Jordan pouted before looking a little wistful. "Still, guess that's not a bad thing. You've always had a good moral compass."

Guess that counted as a compliment, though you weren't sure if that was Jordan or Kaori-chan talking there. In any case, you got going once the light went green, and you went right back to the speed you had before. It was no speed you couldn't handle though, even if it was 10 miles above the speed limit. It you could shave a few minutes off, it would make things all the better.

*SIREN!*

Or not.

The tell-tale alarm of a police car echoed through your ears, and you looked back to see such a car. You could tell you were the target from how it was acting, making you groan. Jordan flashed a "I told you so" look back your way, making you pout a bit which didn't mean much on such an angelic face as yours. In any case, you pulled over to the side, to a good place out of the way, and the police car followed you. You sighed, awaiting what this was going to entail.

"Good day ladies," the man said as he approached, being very cordial.

"Can I...help you officer?" you asked slowly, feeling quite nervous now. You know, could the officer even understand you? You could hardly tell now whenever you flopped back and forth between English and Japanese.

"Were you aware of how fast you were going? I clocked you at about 15 over," the man said, not overly stern but you could tell he meant business. "Can I see some identification, please?"

15 over? When did that happen? You thought for sure you kept it rather decent. Guess your speed must have gotten away from you for a time. Oh great. Neither Jordan or Honoka had said anything so far, though you could imagine Jordan being grateful it wasn't his car. In any case though, you went and grabbed your wallet, which by the say looked a hell of a lot more cutesy right now. Eh, kind of par for the course now, not that it made you feel any better though.

However, you were so focused on that little annoyance that you thrust your card out. The police officer grabbed it, but you thrusted your hand so much that you made contact with the man's palm at the same time. It was that contact that made your eyes widen.

"Uh oh...." you said as you slowly moved your hand away from the contacted point with the officer.

"Yokunai..." Not good Jordan said with eyes equally wide.

Honoka's humming actually stopped at that point, curious at what was happening and why her musume looked so troubled. She turned her head over and leaned to get a better look but didn't say anything yet.

The officer began looking at your ID, but you could already tell the damage was done. A bright bit of light was coming where you touched the man, making you gulp as you knew what was coming. It wasn't as fast as Honoka's change, but you could begin to see the man light up a little all the same. From atop his head, his short hair began to flow down his back before turning a purplish color. It was more or less between your transformation and Honoka's in terms of speed.

The next time the man opened his eyes, they were turning a vibrant green, becoming larger and the same distinctive Japanese shape as yours.
14411112111321121211122.title: Honoka's humming starts to affect something.

choices: The "Officer" lets you go and you contiue on your way.
Another officer stops to check in to see what's going on.
144111121113211212111221.content:
You couldn't help but stare at the officer as he scrutinized you license but you didn't dare say a word. Short cut dirty blond hair had rapidly graduated to an exotic shade of purple somewhere between maroon and violet and had grown long enough to brush his waist. A shallow part had formed just off center of his forehead while his lengthening bangs swept off to both sides, curling up ever so slightly.

Unlike Kaori's, no Jordan's, own soft and serene looking green eyes, the officer's now had a sharper tilt and had a slightly blue tinge swimming in their verdant depths.

With his newly grown purple hair and sharp, but distinctly feminine looking eyes contrasting with his very masculine features, the officer certainly cut a very odd looking figure.

For now anyway.

"Alright," the officer said, "I'm going to go run your information, I'll be back in a moment."

He turned, those newly grown tresses swaying with the moment. For just a moment, the man looked very confused, reaching up to touch those odd purple strands before he seemed to shake himself out of it. You noticed a small black beauty mark burn itself into the skin below his right eye. He began to walk back to his squad car and you saw him stumble slightly and a brief flicker of light cover his form.

You weren't sure, but had the officer's shoes just grow heels?

Once the officer shut the door to his squad car, you frantically turned to Jordan, who was looking at you with a horrified expression. Honoka looked perturbed by your troubled looks. You weren't sure if she understood what was happening or if whatever force was at work kept her blissfully ignorant.

"Baka!" Jordan hissed quietly as she leaned in close, the wonderful smell of vanilla filling your nose, "you touched him! I thought we were going to be careful!"

"I'm sorry!" you whispered furiously back, "I got nervous!"

"You got nervous!? I thought you had this handled! I told you to be careful with your speed, baka!"

"I'm sorry!" you feebly tried to rebuff your furious friend.

"Sorry isn't going to help us now, Asuka! We have a big problem now!" the purplette hissed back.

Your eyes grew a bit wide, she had called you Asuka just as you had called her Kaori. But, that was small peanuts compared to the disaster you had accidentally created. Jordan was right, you now had a huge problem.

'What're we whispering about?" Honoka practically breathed in your ear.

You shrieked in surprise, almost smacking your head into the rearview mirror. Jordan frantically made a shushing motion, her eyes frantically glancing at the squad car that still sat behind your car. The windows were dark so you could only see the outline of the officer inside, but you were somehow sure that he was changing just as you, Jordan, and your mother had.

"D-don't do that! You almost gave me a heart attack!" you gasped out, trying to control your breathing.

Honoka bopped her head and stuck out her tongue, one of her blue eyes winking.

"Ehe, sorry Musume-chan..." she didn't sound all that sorry.

"Shut up!" Kaori hissed, "He's coming back... oh..."

She trailed off mid-sentence, staring at the reflection in the passenger side mirror with her jaw dropped wide open, green eyes impossibly wide.

You refrained from sticking your head out of the window to look for yourself as the sound of the officer's footsteps clicked on the concrete. But as you listened, you couldn't help but notice that they didn't sound like those of police issue shoes though...

"Alright, minna-san everyone," a smooth, young female voice that seemed to ooze sophistication and adult charm spoke as the officer approached your window, "I'm going to give you a warning but make sure you watch your speed from now on."

You slowly turned to address the officer and found your face making the same gobsmacked expression your purple haired friend was making.

A tall, slender young woman stood at your driver's side window, long maroon-purple hair swaying in the wind behind her and blue-green eyes staring down at you with a calm, almost serene expression. Her face was sharp where yours were all rounder shaped, giving her a sophisticated, adult looking beauty that belied her young age, which couldn't have been a year older than your were now.

Her outfit was covered in flickers of pale light, still obviously in the process of changing but currently looked like a mangled fusion of the standard issue highway police uniform and something far different. Before your shocked gaze, the flashes tore away at the police uniform's pants and swiftly gave way to a short, fitted black skirt trimmed in gold, white thigh high stockings with black garters that clung to slender and shapely legs, and black knee high boots with the same gold trim and a raised heel. An intricate and elegant looking violet sash adorned with flowers was draped around her hips.

"Uh... officer?" you said slowly, ignoring Jordan's frantic motions telling you to shut up.

But you didn't want to shut up, you wanted to test something.

"Hmm?" the young woman hummed, looking at you, "Hai?"

"Are... are you feeling different today?"

The taller girl tilted her head and, like before, looked lost and confused for a moment. She reached up and touched her temple as the flashes of light devoured the sleeves of her uniform top and replaced them with black, opera length gloves trimmed with gold near the openings.

"I..." she mumbled, a look of extreme discomfort and confusion on her face for a moment before her features returned to the serene, sophisticated look she wore before.

"Feeling different? No, I can't say I am... why do you ask?"

You swallowed slightly. You hadn't imagined it, it was almost like the officer had been resisting it but you weren't 100% sure. A glance at Jordan showed that she had seen it too.

"N-no reason..."

Another flash of light attacked what was left of her police uniform. Golden epaulets formed as the collar folded and turned white with a thin strip of gold trim. The top conformed more snugly to a slender, well proportioned upper body with full breasts somewhere between yours and Kaori's, not too big and not too small. A final flicker of light saw a purple ascot and a violet flower tucked into the collar to complete the look. It resembled some sort of sexy military-esque uniform, complete with faux medals pinned to her chest!

"Sugoi!" Honoka cooed as she practically crawled over you, her eyes glittering in awe, "Your uniform is soo kawaii!"

The "officer" looked surprised for a moment before her cheeks tinged a slight shade of pink. She idly flicked her hair, which was now held in line by a black hairband with a small white feather and smiled. You noticed she was wearing small dangling gold earrings now as well.

"Arigato," she accepted the praise graciously, "my idol group's members designed them. They worked very hard on them."

"I can see that! I can't wait to get something just like it for Kaori-chan and Musume-chan!" Honoka gushed, much to yours and Jordan's growing sense of horror.
144111121113211212111221.title: Officer-chan?

1441111211132112121112211.content:
This was something new. The three of you had just grown school uniforms, but this new officer had an outfit more akin to an idol. Actually, now that you mention it, she outright just mentioned her outfit being designed by her idol group. Guess it could all relate to the fact that music was what caused this whole mess in the first place. Though, did that mean the three of you were in a similar boat?

Ugh...being an idol wasn't exactly any more appealing than being a schoolgirl. Actually, that sounded even worse. Being the kind of person to perform on stage in showy outfits?! That was the worst thing possible for a shut-in. And Jordan wasn't exactly much better off in that regard, especially going on his reaction.

"Well....uh....arigato," you spoke shyly as you got your ID back, wanting to move on from this as quickly as possible.

"Totemo yoi" Very good the officer smiled at you, honestly making you blush a bit. Dang, this new girl really had a cool sophisticated air about her. She just....seemed so cool and mature.... "Anyway, I should be getting back to work. Sayōnara. Ki o tsukete." Good bye. Take care.
"Oh! Can I have your name, onegaishimasu?" please Honoka jumped up, nearing pushing you all the way to the door comically.

The new girl didn't seem to mind though, giving that same adult smile.

"It's Erena," she smiled. "Come see us the next time my group performs."

"Oh, we will! Sayōnara Erena-chan!" Honoka smiled, before you got frustrated enough and pushed her back into her seat, laughing all the while.

With that, you finally got the car started, letting "Erena-chan" on her own way. It took a little bit to finally get Honoka calm enough to actually sit down, with Jordan kind of needing to assist there. You actually got a look as Erena left you to return to her car. Actually, now that you noticed it, another police car had arrived, probably just to make sure everything was okay given you had been there a while. You couldn't see the other person though, but Erena seemed to be talking with them, reaching her hand inside. Right at that moment, a bright flash erupted from inside the car.

And that was your cue to leave, not wanting to see any more come of this. Jordan didn't miss it though, slapping her forehead.

"Oh great, now she's not only an idol, but also spreading it. Wonderful," she groaned, putting both hands on her face now. "This is far bigger than us right now, no thanks to you."

"I said I was sorry, okay!" you cried back, not wanting any of this right now. "Excuse me if confronting an officer wasn't enough reason to panic."

Honoka on the other hand seemed blissfully unaware of such things though, and poked her head through again.

"Really though, we should get you two some cool outfits!" she giggled. "I want you to look really pretty, Musume-chan!"

That did not sound appealing in the slightest, and Honoka slightly cuddling on your shoulder a bit didn't help. Why did she have to look so adorable while doing all of this. You could tell from the slight red on Jordan's face that she was feeling similarly, though she immediately turned her head when you looked her way. Sheesh, things just felt so awkward now, and will probably get even worse if you get a completely new look.

Honoka continued to ramble on about things, from either outfits or even song ideas. Most of them didn't even really make sense to you, but you said nothing as she continued to ramble.

"I really wonder what Erena-chan's group is like. I bet they're amazing."

Admittedly, a group of girls like....Erena-chan...sounded...not like the worst thing in the world. You shook your head again of those thoughts. All this cutesy girl stuff was actually starting to sound just a tiny bit appealing. Okay, you had to admit that if you were still a boy right now, you would find it very appealing. Don't lie.

In any case, the car was filled with the sound of Honoka's words and humming along the way as you got outside of the city and towards Daniel's abode.
1441111211132112121112211.title: The "Officer" lets you go and you conti...

14411112111321121211122111.content:
As you drove, neither you or Jordan said a word. To fill the silence, Honoka seemed to content herself by rambling on and on about cute outfits she wanted to force you into or song ideas for the idol group she seemed to be seriously considering creating.

You shuddered. While the thought of watching a group of young, beautiful girls dancing and singing on stage in showy outfits wasn’t repulsive at all to your still very much male mindset, the idea of being forced into said showy outfit and shoved out onto a stage in front of hundreds of people to sing and dance was wholly unpleasant.

Even if you had a wonderfully curved, slender young body, a breathtaking, angelic face and, based on the gradual rising of your voice’s pitch, a soon to be beautiful singing voice, there was no way you would ever consider it.

Even if Honoka’s puppy eyed stare was drilling into you. Not a chance. Probably.

You sighed heavily, pushing those thoughts away as you turned off the main highway and sped away from town.

The urban landscape slowly gave way to seas of gleaming gold wheat and rolling hills and then to a deep forest of towering pine trees and snakelike, curving roads along rocky ravines.

“We’re really in the boonies right now,” Jordan commented idly. He seemed to be trying to ignore Honoka’s nonsensical babbling from the backseat.

And honestly, you couldn’t blame her. If such ideas were nightmarish for you, they were even worse for her.

“Yeah,” you agreed, carving along the sweeping curves of the road that lead to your aunt’s manor, “great grandpa Aiden didn’t like cities very much so he built his place out here away from all that.”

“Can’t really blame him,” Jordan mumbled, expressing her own disdain for suburbia and the urban sprawl.

Honoka was practically vibrating in her seat, no doubt she had had her fill of being stuck in the relatively cramped, even for a girl her size, back seat of the Toyota.

“Musume-chaaaaaan~ my legs are falling asleep!”

“We’re almost there, about five minutes out,” you responded, glancing at your “okaa-san” as she shifted around, clear blue eyes looking restlessly out the window.

Your car created another curve and the Hewitt manor slid into view.

“Sugoi...” Kaori breathed, green eyes locked on the manor as you drove closer, “when you said it was huge, you weren’t kidding...”

Honoka’s head peeked out from in between your seats, eyes sparkling like the sea.

“Hai hai! Nee-Chan’s house is something, right?!”

Though it wasn’t as immense as some of the ”McMansions” you had seen many times before, it was by no means small by any means. A great, dark brown art-deco masterpiece of architecture built by your okaa-san’s side of the family before the Great Depression, the Hewitt manor loomed before you against the backdrop of the dense forests that surrounded it. A long, cobbled driveway snaked around the front of the manor, crossing a small creek via an ancient looking, but sturdy, wooden bridge.

You pulled up to the front of the house, put the car in neutral and pulled up on the handbrake. As soon as you had opened the door and moved the seat for Honoka to get out, you had to quickly grab the bubbly orangette before she shot off like a rocket.

“Honoka-chan, I need you to stay with us and don’t touch anything, onegaishimasu,” you almost begged her.

A sly look crossed her face. Uh oh, you really didn't like that look...

“Okayyyyy, but you and Kaori-chan have to try some cute outfits on for me in return later~!”

You blanched. Oh god, she had you by, the metaphorical anyway, balls. If you didn’t do as she asked, she would be unstoppable and whatever chaos she unleashed would be your doom.

“Okay fine,” you agreed hurriedly, “just... l-later on, ok?”

You had no choice. You just hoped Jordan would forgive you for the hell you had doomed him to.

“Deal~!” She chirped, bouncing on the soles of her feet, “I’ll be good, musume-chan!”

You turned to Jordan and blushed heavily as you saw her stretching, that wonderfully curved, slender body and full bosom on full display as she arched her back.

You weren’t drooling, you weren’t. Honest.

OK maybe a little. Kaori was hot, so sue you.

Even if she had bigger breasts than you.

She straightened and tilted her head at the odd look on your face.

“What’s with that look? Looks like you just made a deal with the devil?”

You grimaced, that wasn’t too far off...

“OK, let’s go,” you said with a sigh, “let’s hope Daniel can help us.”

“And what if he can’t?” Jordan asked lowly.

You didn’t want to answer that.

You walked up to the massive oak doors and raised your hand but Jordan’s pale hand gripped your wrist.

“We don’t know what your touch will do if you knock.” She reasoned, glancing warily at your hand like it was a loaded gun.

“Good point..., let me find a stick. I don’t think my aunt will appreciate me smacking a rock on her door.”

You found a long stick on the ground and used it to gently poke the doorbell button. A series of low, ominous sounding chimes was heard distantly in the manor.
14411112111321121211122111.title: Over a River and Through the Woods

choices: Honoka suddenly appears for some reason
144111121113211212111221111.content:
A little while passed, though that wasn't anything new as far as you were concerned. If Daniel was by himself, it would take a bit for him to come out. All the while though, Jordan was glancing around.

"Honestly, I can't help but wonder if us just standing here might change something," she whispered.

"That's true....though my whole house didn't change last time. Just the garage did," you replied. "So....maybe the mansion won't change even if we step inside..."

Eventually, as you two were talking, the door slowly opened, revealing your shut-in of a cousin.

"Hey Alex what's....." he was groaning until he actually looked forward, seeing two Japanese girls standing on his doorstep. "Um, can I help you?"

Yeah of course this would happen. Not like you warned him ahead of time, and like he would believe you anyway. Daniel was very much the analytical type. Convincing him of some supernatural phenomenon like this would be difficult for sure. Still, you had to convince him anyway. Not like Jordan could really help given they hadn't really met much at all.

"Um....well first, hi Daniel...." you spoke in more or less the same manner as usual to him. "And....I'm actually Alex."

You were glad you at least spoke English there. Even if keeping it so in your thoughts was hard enough, you needed to make sure you communicated to Daniel clearly. Speaking of which, you could tell from his face that he believed he was getting pranked. It wouldn't be unusual for him to just slam the door right now.

"Excuse me," Daniel sighed as he began to do just that and shut the door.

"Wait!" you cried out, about to touch the door to stop him from shutting it. Right at that moment, Jordan grabbed your wrist.

"Don't do that!" she cried out. "You want to infect the whole place?!"

"S-Sorry!" you cried back, shaking your wrist from her grasp.

Guess you nearly panicked again. Good going Asuka, er Alex. You nearly caused yet another incident. Though, if there was any bright side, the door hadn't closed, and Daniel was still there, not somewhat perplexed.

"What are you talked about? Infect the whole place?" he said in a deadpan tone. "What kind of prank is this?"

"Look....it's not a prank," you said, trying to keep your hands to yourself this time. "I know...it's hard to say....but I'm Alex. I...I...I'm not sure how else to explain it but....well....who else would know about last year's gathering when you had an accident in the woods."

Daniel's eyes widened, while Jordan's just looked confused. What incident were you talking about? Well, it was actually a little embarrassing, and you were the only one to have been around when it happened. Daniel made you swear not to reveal it to anyone or else he would find a way to kill you. And frankly, you didn't want to test his words.

"What?...." Daniel said slowly, eyebrow arched. "Alex? Wait....what?"

It was certainly unusual to see Daniel so flustered, which made sense. He got flustered around anything his brain couldn't compute, and who in the world could compute a transformation into a Japanese girl?

"I get it's confusing, but I'm really Alex," you said, hands against your chest, and breasts for that matter which made you blush. "And we need your help to find a way to change back."

"O....kay....." Daniel was still visibly confused, but did seem willing to trust you for the time being. "Well....guess you should come in so you can explain more."

"Wait!" Jordan spoke up this time. "Um...you think there's something we could wear...like gloves or something?"

"Why?" Daniel asked. "And who are you?"

"I'm Jordan...Alex's friend," she said. "And...we think anything we touch transforms too. It's...gotten a little crazy."

What went without saying. Daniel looked like he was going to have a migraine. Well, in spite of that though, he complied, perhaps if nothing else than to get this headache over with. It didn't take too long for him to return with a couple pairs of oven mits from the kitchen.

"Work fine enough?" he asked.

"That's fine," Jordan said, taking a pair. "Thanks."

You graciously took a pair as well and the two of you entered Daniel's mansion, leaving your shoes by the door.
144111121113211212111221111.title: Daniel answers, he’s home alone.

choices: You head upstairs with him to figure this out.
Honoka tries to get touchy feely with Daniel.
1441111211132112121112211113.content:
The mansion inside was somewhat dark and foreboding, with tall, vaulted ceilings shored up with black steel supports and dark, elaborately carved mahogany woodwork. Ornate chandeliers, also made of black steel hung from chains and gave off a bright amber glow, a strangely old fashioned look befitting a relic from a bygone era of American prosperity. It was certainly no the place to find a trio of brightly colored young Japanese girls that looked right out of an anime.

Once the heavy oak doors had closed behind you, Daniel turned back to look at you and paused seeing your tiny, stocking clad feet on the dark wood floors. Another look had confirmed that Jordan had also done the same, depositing her shoes with yours in front of the door.

"What's with the lack of shoes?" he asked flatly, eyes raking across your figure.

"I... I just felt like I needed to..." you replied lamely. Daniel was still the same as you remembered, intense and analytical.

Daniel continued to stare at you. No doubt he was analyzing your features. While you certainly had the facial features of one, your coloring certainly didn't jive with the looks of a typical Japanese schoolgirl with your red hair, vivid, unnaturally bright purple eyes, and utterly perfect faces and slender figures. Even Jordan, with his somewhat more subdued coloring, didn't look real with his purple hair and bright green eyes.

"Wait a minute, weren't there three of you?" he asked suddenly, only to find himself face to face with a pretty orangette with bright, clear blue eyes that were sparkling with happiness.

"Oikkonephew-chan!" Honoka cheered, her smile lighting up the room, "It's been so long~!"

"Gah! What the hell?!" Daniel exclaimed, practically throwing himself backwards top the floor in surprise, "Who the hell is this?!"

"Ah," you said nervously, instinctively twirling a strand of your carmine hair around a finger, "That's... kind of complex actually..."

Daniel's narrow green eyes flickered from you, to Jordan's nervous figure, to the bubbly, bouncing Honoka who was still beaming at him. He slowly climbed back to his feet, making sure to keep a good bit of distance between him and the strange orangette that had gotten in his face. It was better to err on the side of caution, she could be, and probably was, contagious if what you had said was true.

"Then simplify it for me, use small words," he quipped flatly. Oh yeah, he was still the same withdrawn, sarcastic shut-in with asshole tendencies.

"W-well... this is Honoka-chan," you said slowly, "and she's... well... she's my okaa-san."

He squinted at you, pale green eyes narrowing in thought. Unlike Kaori's vibrant green pools or "Officer Erena's" striking blue-green, Daniels eyes were a very pale shade of green, giving them a piercing look. Combined with his tall, slim figure, messy red hair and haggard looks despite his young age, he certainly held the air of a workaholic scientist.

"I'm assuming that was Japanese, I'm a bit rusty with that language but, if my ears aren't playing tricks on me like my eyes are, you just called her your mother?"

"H-hai," you looked away from Daniel's intense stare, "she's my okaa... I mean, my mom."

He turned to the happy looking girl who had gotten in his face, eyes widening slightly. This was definitely not who he'd remembered. Your mom, to him, would always be associated with a short heavyset figure, blood red hair, green eyes, large bust and decidedly not a slender young lady with orange hair, a cute side ponytail, and cheerful blue eyes.

"Aunt Heidi?" he asked her carefully.

"Nope! Call me Honoka-chan!" she chirped, telling him much the same thing that you had been told after your okaa-san had been changed by your touch.

"She insists on being called that," Jordan chimed in helpfully, "she won't accept anything else, even Asuka has to call her that."

"Asuka? I'm assuming you meant Alex just then?" Daniel said slowly looking like he was deep in thought.

"Yeah as of later we've begun to... slip... occasionally..." you said slowly, once again twirling a bit of hair nervously.

He looked at the three of you, analyzing what he'd just learned. His mind sorting through the information and coming up with theories and hypothesis after hypothesis in mere moments.

"Ok," he said finally, "lets head up to my lab upstairs. We're going to run some tests. Follow me, and don't touch anything."
1441111211132112121112211113.title: Honoka suddenly appears for some reason

14411112111321121211122111131.content:
You had an idea of where Daniel's lab was, not that you actually saw it much. It didn't surprise you as Daniel began to lead you both upstairs. The mansion was more tall than wide as you had seen outside, having 4 floors in all. Daniel basically had most of the 4th floor to himself, hence why it had his room and lab and just about everything. Walking up and down was inconvenient, but he could at least be assured of his privacy that way whenever guests were around.

But that beside the point, you turned to Honoka and put on the best angry face you could, which looked like little more than a cute pout.

"Honoka-chan!" you said to her. "I thought we agreed that you'd wait in the car!"

"Hai," Honoka smiled gently. "But I couldn't resist getting to see my cute oikko-chan after so long. And I wanted to walk around after being in that car for so long."

"It wasn't even that long..." you sighed, both hands on your head right now. "Ugh....I suppose it doesn't matter now."

There seemed to be little you could seriously do to rein in Honoka. She was the kind of anime girl with boundless energy that could never stay in one place for too long. That much was obvious. And she was probably still serious about dressing he two of you up at some point. Terrific. As if this couldn't give you any more of a migraine. Any time you thought you had even a little bit of control over the situation, it just became undone instantly.

Jordan more or less kept to herself the whole time, though you could tell she was thinking along similar lines. She kept on playing with her hair a bit as you began to climb another stair case.

"Hopefully he might be able to figure out something," you told Jordan, who nodded.

"Umaku ikeba," Hopefully she sighed. You know, you were almost kind of jealous at that adult posture she had. You wouldn't know she was stressed given how gracefully she walked.

"So..." Daniel's voice suddenly broke the silence as they were climbing up the stairs. "You might as well start at the beginning."

"Hai," you replied. You could tell Daniel's eyes narrowed every time a Japanese word went through your mouth. It wasn't like you had much control over it though.

So, you began at the beginning, mentioning how you found a CD underneath your bed to start the day. It was from some unknown group called "KSS48" that you knew nothing about, but you downloaded the songs to your phone anyway since you liked the genre. Then, you began working on your car with Jordan when you tried to put music on and the J-Pop began playing without your input, and would continue to play.

"Even when you tried to turn it off?" Daniel asked.

"The phone didn't let me," you shrugged your shoulders. "I hit pause and even tried to turn it off. Nothing would interrupt the song."

You tried to describe to Daniel how you felt the whole time, like the song was practically invading your head. Heck, even now, you could remember most if not all of the lyrics you heard right now, which you didn't thankfully. That was how you and Jordan became who you were right now, and even touching your Camaro turned it into what it was now.

"By touch?" Daniel asked.

"Hai, that was all it took," replied Jordan. "Didn't mean anything by it. It just happened in a flash, literally."

"Just about every change was preceded by some flash," you added. "And most of what we ended up touching changed instantly."

"I see...including...." Daniel pondered as he turned towards Honoka, who was still bouncing behind you guys.

"Me!" she giggled, pointing to her cheeks. "Now I'm totally kawaii just like musume-chan and Kaori-chan!"

"Uh huh...." Daniel pondered again, though you could tell he looked perturbed. He always had a little quirk of making short words whenever he felt out of his element. Not like you could blame him. He probably didn't even know what all these Japanese words meant, not that you did either before this.

"And....then somehow we ended up turning the garage too," you sighed. "That was when we decided to come to you."

"And we got pulled over by police," Jordan huffed, hands crossing underneath her bust. "And Asuka...Alex caused even more problems and touched him. He then turned into another girl just like us."

"I said it was an accident..." you sighed, your expressive face looking downcast at the mention. "Oh...and...we kind of saw the new girl going to another officer and they probably changed too."

"Huh...." Daniel have another short answer, taking in all the information. "Anything else?"

You thought about it, wondering if you missed anything. Your eyes widened a bit at another thing.

"Oh, and...Honoka-chan....mom actually started humming along the way," you added. "There wasn't anything huge, but we saw some street signs change at an intersection."

"So, you're saying a minor change?" Daniel asked.

"Compared to everything else? Hai," Jordan nodded. "Even something that small caused a change."

"I can do it again if you like!" Honoka giggled, clearly not on the same page as the others here.

"Shinaide kudasai," Please don't Jordan asked back, face slightly red as she glared at Honoka, who just giggled.

Daniel just nodded, taking in everything he had heard. Conveniently enough, we had all arrived at the top floor. He took an immediate right, heading towards the nearest door, which conveniently had "Daniel's Lab" etched into it. He gave us another warning not to touch anything, though you had a thought that it was geared towards Honoka more than the two of you.

With that, you entered Daniel's lab. It wasn't the crazy over the top kind of lab you'd expect of a mad scientist, but it was certainly extensive, a product of all the wealth he had to work with. You couldn't understand most of the instruments, but he probably had something for just about every field he cared for. You could tell Honoka had stars in her eyes looking at it.

Actually...did she literally just have stars in her eyes? Ugh, all this anime-ness was getting to you.

"Now that I've heard your story," Daniel said. "We should begin testing so I can see this firsthand."
14411112111321121211122111131.title: You head upstairs with him to figure this out.

choices: Daniel continues to administer his tests on various items
Daniel has you test your touch on something living.
144111121113211212111221111311.content:
You looked around, there were several desks and tables against the walls, each one looking as expensive and well made as the dizzying array of scientific instruments and computers that sat on top of them. You liked to think you were pretty good in science class and always pulled good grades there, especially since Miss Williams, who was a total sweetheart, had taken over for Mister Burnham last year.

But looking at the instruments and whiteboards filled with equations that, to you, looked more like Egyptian hieroglyphs, you felt really out of your element.

"Okay," Daniel began, turning to regard the three of you, especially Honoka, with a serious look in his eyes, "if this... thing of yours is spread by touch, under no circumstances are you to touch anything. If you have to touch something, you are to use the gloves unless I ask you not to."

You and Jordan nodded, but Honoka seemed to be still looking around, literal stars in her eyes. Yep, all the anime-ness was definitely screwing with you.

"Aunt Heidi!" he snapped, seeing her drawn to a very expensive looking device, "or Honoka or whatever, please don't touch anything!"

"Awww...," the girl whined like a puppy, shuffling back to Jordan's side, thoroughly chastised, "so mean... Oikko-chan yelled at me..."

Daniel gave Jordan and you a flat, unamused look, totally unaffected by your adorable "mom's" display, "Keep an eye on her, I don't need any of my crap changed because she got curious."

"Hai," you agreed, "sorry, Daniel-itokocousin..."

He sighed heavily, raking a hand through his messy red hair.

"Alright, let's begin. Alex, since this all seemed to begin with you, we'll test you first. The rest of you sit over there and don't move. Jordan, keep an eye on... Honoka, please."

He paused turning piercing eyes towards your purple haired friend, who stared back at him almost demurely. You could've swore his eyes flicked down to her chest and back and he seemed to blush a bit when Jordan gave a weak smile back, which irritated greatly you for some reason.

He turned back to you and his brow creased, "What's with that look?"

"Betsuninothing..." you pouted, your cheeks puffed up in annoyance and crossed your arms under your breasts.

"Stop that," he said with his usual deadpan, though you could see he was definitely blushing as you crossed your shapely legs, "your making this really uncomfortable for me."

You grimaced. You were acting like a jealous schoolgirl when he looked at your friend's chest.

"Gomen nasai..."

Daniel bustled around the lab, setting up a tripod with a video camera perched atop it and booting up a nearby computer before pressing record.

"This is Daniel Newman, August 22nd 2019... my cousin Alex Tucker-" he began to restate what you had told him earlier, creating a record for his experiments like any good scientist would do. Idly, you tried to fix your hair slightly, even though it was already, and always was, perfect.

Horrifying, isn't it.

"Ok, lets begin with the first test, testee Alex states that the change is initiated by touch so I have prepared a series of items for testing this theory," Daniel narrated calmly, rolling a steel cart with several items on it towards you.

There was a what looked like a white undershirt, a pair of swim trunks, an old cell phone, and an English textbook of some kind.

"Alright, Alex, you may proceed with the first item, remove your gloves and begin," Daniel instructed calmly, his eyes locked on you.

"H-hai," you took the oven mitts off and reached out, your slim fingers gently brushing the first item, a plain white undershirt.

As soon as your fingertips touched the white shirt, a white flash of light covered the fabric and you could feel it moving around and shifting, changing under your touch. The cloth bunched together, shrinking away and compacting down into something smaller. Soft foam cups bulged out as the sleeves narrowed into thin straps, while a lining of lace crawled along the edges.

The light flickered and faded and where the white shirt was sitting was now a cute white bra with pink lace trimming, not dissimilar to the red one that you wore beneath your blouse and blazer. In fact, just by looking at it anyway, it seemed to be your size.

You looked back to Daniel and found his eyes opened wide staring a the bra like it was the most fascinating thing in the world, which you supposed it was to him. Something impossible, proof that magic, or whatever force this was, was real.

"Absolutely remarkable," he poked a gloved finger at the bra, the supple foam cups dimpled at his prodding, "guess you weren't kidding."

"I wish I was," you replied darkly, "but yet here we are."

"Right," he agreed, "let's continue with the testing, we need to establish any variances if there are any before I can come up with any hypotheses."

"Hai," you agreed and with another touch, the swimming trunks were enveloped by another flash.

The swim-trunks swiftly restructured themselves into a daring red and black, halter neck bikini top with a black and white bow in between the cups, in your size of course.

The old cell phone became a more modern model, completely with a cutesy red case and feather like charm on a thin black cord.

And the English textbook became a book on Japanese literature.

With each item changed, Daniel's inquisitive stare became more intense as he muttered to the camera and wrote things in his notepad. You weren't sure what he had in mind, but you hoped dearly that he could reverse all this, or at the very least... halt the changes.

Because, deep down, there were worse things than being stuck as a beautiful girl. You were determined to return things to how they were this morning but if worse came to worse, you could, theoretically, live with this.
144111121113211212111221111311.title: Let the Testing Begin

1441111211132112121112211113111.content:
That way of thinking made you clamp up a bit. Could you really be able to live like this in the worst case scenario? Guess it wasn't too bad in hindsight. Granted, that brought up so many questions on what you could do if that ended up being the case? What about school and all that? You weren't sure if you could continue high school like this, unless you had to move to Japan for it. Funny enough, with Daniel's wealth, it was probably possible should it come down to it. Still, it wasn't something you wanted to accept just yet.

As you were pondering though, Daniel was bringing up even more odd objects, some being old clothes like before, and some other objects.

"Aren't these kind of similar to before?" you asked.

"I need to see if some changes are different between you three. I noticed that the clothes you got....seem to be your size if I had to guess," Daniel coughed a bit, retaining his composure. "So, by that nature, I want to see if the same happens with the others."

Jordan piped up a bit at that, blushing at the idea of having more clothes change to suit her measurements, especially with her chest size. Honoka on the other hand seemed a lot more into it.

"Oh! Can I try first?!" she asked nicely, if not enthusiastically.

"Sure, it's fine," Daniel sighed. "Just don't go crazy and touch anything I don't give you."

"Hai," Honoka smiled gently, waiting surprisingly patiently for her turn.

So, one after another, Daniel tossed Honoka more of some old clothes he had around, of which he had plenty of. Honoka caught both the shirt and shorts at the same time, causing both to light up instantly. Dominant white and pink colors flooded both garments as the shirt sleeves changed into a new pattern and the shorts fluttered into a layered skirt. Essences of sky blue also dotted the shirt with light ruffles here and there. Some fluff surrounded the shoulders and went down the chest a little as well. Topping it off was the emergence of a pink tie.

You and Jordan blushed a bit, seeing what really looked like an idol outfit, and quite the cute one at that. Honoka certainly seemed to seem so, from the excited smile that squealed.

"Oh, kawaii! What else do you have?!" she smiled widely. "You got some gloves? I'd really want those!"

"Um, sure," Daniel said, keeping up his log as he did so. "Curious, so different changes are possible even for similar items. Who causes the change might also affect it."

In any case, Daniel abided by what she wanted and found some old winter gloves. As Honoka caught them, they lit up, turning into a size fit for her while also turning white, even gaining similar fluff to her top. She giggled at all of this, even winking at the rest of us.

"I want to try this out. I won't be long," she smiled as she began to undress.

"O-Okaa-san!" you cried at her, blushing all the whole and covering your eyes. "Don't undress in front of us!"

"I want to turn away....yet I can't," Jordan blushed a bit but didn't turn her eyes away. "Honoka-chan has a very cute build. Not overly big but not too small either."

"Ugh, not again," you groaned, thinking back to how Jordan acted when your mom was still normal. In this new form, Jordan didn't overly seem to mind female bodies, even when naked apparently.

Daniel was no less surprised by this, though he kept his logs going all the same. Not that Honoka's body size was really necessary for him, but any that helped counted. Not to say he wasn't red in the face though. This was probably the first time he had seen a girl partially naked for any period of time.

Still, it wasn't too long before Honoka was decked out in her new outfit.

"Ohhh, it's so comfy," she smiled. "I want something else!"

"What did I say about not touching anything?!" Daniel raised his voice, momentarily stopping Honoka.

You had to admit Honoka looked completely adorable like that, not that she wasn't before. You didn't get the overly jealous feeling you did around "Kaori-chan's" figure that was for sure. As you were thinking on that though, Honoka kept pestering Daniel for something else.

"Fine fine....uh...." Daniel kept going through his old stuff. Randomly, he brought out a really old pair of headphones. "Here."

"Kanpekina!" Perfect Honoka smiled as she caught them and put them on her head.

Just like the rest, it lit up, growing significantly smaller all the while. Actually, it was all concentrating on her left side, forming there before something formed around to the front of her face. Once the light died down, it showed a simple yet advanced earpiece, with a clearly identifiable microphone on it. For the most part, Honoka had assembled a completely new idol outfit out of these old items.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/love...

"Kawaii!" she cried out. Oh, and apparently that microphone worked, considering what she said echoed rather loudly.

"Okay, turn that off!" Daniel cried out, getting Honoka to do just that. "Ugh, well indulging her might not have been the best idea, but it gave me a better sense of how each of you creates a different change."

Nothing catastrophic had happened yet at the least, though you hoped the whole ordeal gave Daniel even more material to work with. Honoka seemed to satisfied at least, lightly skipping in her new outfit. She did wish she had something else like a new hairpiece for her new outfit, but it was clear Daniel didn't want to push things with how much had already changed.
1441111211132112121112211113111.title: Daniel continues to administer his tests on var...

choices: "I have some ideas we could try. They're risky but might help."
14411112111321121211122111131113.content:
"Ok," Daniel said, forcing himself to look away from Honoka's supple legs as she tested out a few dance moves in her new outfit, her skirt fluttering up slightly with her movements, "I have some data to work with on how this spreads to mundane objects but now I need to examine something else."

"Like what?" you asked curiously, tilting your head slightly.

He stared you down intensely before glancing at Jordan, who, judging from the dark blush on her face, was still captivated by the fluttering of Honoka's sinfully short skirt as she danced and twirled around happily.
