The only reason you weren't joining him in his blatant admiration was that deep down Honoka-chan was still your mom.

"I've noticed some things since you got here that I think are important," he began seriously, "your mannerisms and how you sometimes slip up are something I've been watching very carefully."

"Oh," you grimaced, you had been noticing that all day with Jordan and yourself since this mess started, "I'm... aware of that..."

Daniel glanced down at his notebook and began to list off his observations, "your grasp on English seems to slip here and there and you've been using Japanese honorifics to address people, you use a lot of Japanese terminology, goman nasai and hai and the like, and occasionally your name is substituted with Asuka and Jordan's with Kaori."

He took a breath and turned the page, indicating he had been watching and observing what you did carefully since you arrived and cataloguing it as such.

"And then there's your mannerisms, you walk like a girl, sit like one, cross your legs, and Jordan's out of character comments about Honoka's figure stick out in particular."

It all sounded... so clinical when Daniel listed it out like that, so cold and impersonal. It brought up all the insecurities and fears you had been feeling, and suppressing, since you noticed the slip ups and changes you and Jordan exhibited. It felt like stone was sinking in the pit of your stomach. The somewhat light and comical mood that came with Honoka's new outfit was significantly dulled.

"Are... are we going to lose ourselves, Daniel? Is that what you're saying?" you almost whispered with dread. You were certain that Jordan had a similar look of despair on her face as she listened. Honoka had stopped dancing and was staring Daniel down, her normally happy blue eyes looked like frozen chips of ice as she picked up on her musume's distress.

"Jiiiiiii....." the orangette seemed to somehow be audibly glaring at her nephew.

Daniel's cold green gaze didn't waver but his face did soften slightly as he picked up on the fear in your down turned face.

"In my professional opinion, no," he said, causing your head to snap up in surprise, "while you are exhibiting typical mannerisms and speech like what I imagine a typical Japanese schoolgirl might behave like, I don't believe that total identity death is a possibility, at least for you two."

"What... what makes you think that?" Jordan said, relief evident in her tone.

"That particular finding comes from observing Honoka mostly," said girl blinked in confusion, "while she has changed quite a bit compared to what Aunt Heidi was like, she is still very much your mother and acts as such despite her new... peppy attitude. She's been glaring at me like she wants to set me on fire for upsetting you. Based on this, I believe that the mental changes are based on willpower and sense of self, for lack of a better description."

"Willpower?" you asked curiously, that sounded like something from a video game you had played once.

"Basically, the stronger your sense of self is, the less effective whatever force is changing you will be on your mental state. You might get some mannerisms that fit your current bodies and some other girly nuances, along with language changes and such, but you will, at least according to my observations anyway, still be you at your cores."

"So... your saying its more like a subtle mental adjustment?" Jordan said, still looking as confused as you were.

"That's right," Daniel said with a nod, "you two have very strong senses of self so the changes, for the most part, are likely going to be very minimal whereas Aunt Heidi, from what I remember of her, has always been a tired soul so the change was far more drastic for her, which explains Honoka's 180 degree personality shift."

It... made sense, actually. Your mom, while a loving woman and fantastic mother despite her faults, was seemingly always tired. She was tired of work, tired of raising three kids by herself, tired of taxes, tired of her life in general. In a way, Honoka-chan was her FOIL, happy and energetic with an inexhaustible sense of optimism. In a strange sense, it was a blessing for her, a respite that you mom never got.

"The rest of this worthless species though," and there was the misanthropic disdain Daniel was known for again, "most people are sheep so there's a good chance that a lot of people will be totally changed into completely different people if this is allowed to spread."

"So," you said slowly, "do you maybe have a way to stop this or reverse it?"
14411112111321121211122111131113.title: Daniel the Psychiatrist?

choices: Daniel blinks his eyes a bit
144111121113211212111221111311132.content:
Jordan actually raised an eyebrow at Daniel's words, mostly on his views on humanity, which didn't exactly seem surprising given his appearance but was still a little jarring to hear. Granted, it was kind of hard to disagree with it, despite the cold logic of the matter. Certainly something to hear it spoken with a straight face though.

In any case though....

"Well," Daniel started. "I have perhaps an idea to try out. Granted, it's risky."

"Oh?" your eyes popped wide at that. The fact that he had anything of the sort to go on was impressive. "Like what?"

"Simply put, we try to use what has typically worked for humanity: anti-bodies," Daniel said. "I would guess that you three are immune to any other sort of influence from these changes, so perhaps samples from you will be able anti-bodies to prevent anyone who hasn't already changed."

You got the basic gist of anti-bodies well enough. Any high school student would know that. Though, would it really work? It sounded kind of simple...and this "idol virus" as you and Jordan had so affectionately called it didn't exactly work like a typical virus.

"You think that'll work though?" Jordan spoke up demurely. "That sounds like a good science problem, but this feels more like magic."

"I prefer to believe that everything has a basis in something, even for something as bizarre as this," Daniel noted, mostly pointing to the changes made to inanimate objects. "Since everything only seems to change once, there must be some kind of protection."

That all made sense from a science perspective, and he was right about things just changing once. Still, would anti-bodies really be such a factor in this? Both you and Jordan had doubts about that, while Honoka looked kind of lost. Granted, she wasn't trying very hard to understand it. Though she did like the idea of taking risks.

"So, what do you need?" Honoka asked curiously.

"I was thinking....some blood samples," Daniel pondered.

"What?!" you cried out. Blood samples? That was done at doctor's appointments for sure but this seemed pretty far from that.

"Why not?" Daniel shrugged. "The blood is where you'll find protection from viruses and other such diseases. It's only natural. Plus, I'll spare you the talk of how else I'd put it together. I doubt you'd understand anyway."

This really didn't sound right in the slightest, but then again he was the genius here. You and Jordan looked very worried about this, though Honoka seemed all too ready to help, already offering her left arm.

"Hai, you can count on me, oikko-chan!" she said, not flinching in the slightest.

Well, through whatever weird process Daniel decided upon, he was soon going through his instruments, putting so and so together. It truly looked like something out of a mad scientists's lab now what with all the chemicals he soon had doing. You groaned as you rubbed your arm a bit.

"I feel like this is going to end in disaster," you sighed. "I just hope he doesn't poison himself."

"Me too," Jordan replied. "I don't think I could handle someone dying because of us like this."

There wasn't really much of a timetable given for how long this would take, as Daniel refused to give any specifics. Rather typical honestly. So, the three of you just occupied yourselves with what you had. Funny enough, that transformed book on Japanese literature actually was kind of interesting. You and Jordan actually took it up and looked it over, getting kind of engrossed in it actually.

"So weird that I can actually read all these characters," Jordan said, going over character by character.

"I know. Looks so daunting at first," you nodded. "Hey, look at this...."

The two continued to occupy yourselves with that book while Honoka continued to adore her outfit while also poping in every now and then regarding the book. You weren't sure how much time had passed. Funny to believe this had all started in the morning. Probably still was honestly. Was it around lunch time yet?

Suddenly, you then heard a clap, bringing all your heads up.

"And it's done," Daniel said in his usual deadpan manner.

You all looked to see a vial of pink liquid, which seemed to be absolutely sparkling. It...didn't exactly look poisonous, but it didn't look like something you'd ever want in your body.

"You....really sure about this?" you asked.

"The scientific method is all about trial and error. There are no absolutes," Daniel said as he picked up the vial. "Unfortunately, we're not exactly in a position to trial run this on a bunch of people like most studies. I don't think anyone would believe us anyway even with my recommendation."

True enough. An "idol virus" was a hard sell even with the words of a prodigy.

"So...you're just going to drink that?" Jordan asked. "What do you think will happen?"

"If it goes like I think, then nothing should happen," Daniel explained. "The point is to try it and then have you touch me to see if it causes anything to happen."

"Seriously?" you asked, sounding a little incredulous.

"How else did you expect to test it? I can't exactly know if it works if I don't touch something that's infected," Daniel explained, as calm as ever.

Well, you weren't sure if that was reasonable in the slightest, but you knew Daniel wasn't going to change his mind. Nope, he was going to see his hypothesis through to the very end even if it killed him. You, Jordan, and Honoka all held your breaths as Daniel picked up his vial...

And drunk the whole thing down in one gulp! Okay, it wasn't exactly a lot to begin with but still it was impressive. Daniel wiped the excess off with his hand, shaking his head a bit. There was a tense silence for a bit.

"Well.....?" you asked slowly.

"Tasted like bubble gum," Daniel said, almost casually as if nothing was wrong. If you were in an anime right now, it'd probably be the moment where everyone falls to the ground in exasperation.

"That's....great," Jordan said, giving an uneasy smile that suited her face. "So....."

"It should be digested rather quickly," Daniel said as he turned around. "Now, just touch me."

You really didn't want to do this, but Daniel didn't look like he was giving you much choice in the matter. Your hand shook as you slowly began extending it, the air around you feeling tense. Your hand got closer...and closer......even more closer...

And in a fraction of a second, your hand touched down on Daniel's own, making you retreat it quickly as if you touched fire.
144111121113211212111221111311132.title: "I have some ideas we could try. They'r...

choices: Daniel tries to drink more of his "miracle drug" to stop the change
Daniel freaks out and runs to the bathroom
Daniel is able to remain calm... somewhat
1441111211132112121112211113111324.content:
As soon as your fingers had brushed against Daniel's hand, you skittered backwards like a frightened rabbit. It wasn't as if you distrusted Daniel per say, you just had really strong doubts that a scientific approach to something as abstract as magic was a wise choice. Your wide eyes frantically braced themselves for the telltale flash of light that signified the change you were certain that Daniel was about to experience.

But there was nothing, no flash, not even a brief sparkle.

"Masakano way..." Jordan breathed out, her green eyes wide, "it worked?!"

You could only stare, open mouthed. If this was an anime, you were certain your eyes were wide like dinner plates with a jaw that hit the floor in surprise.

Daniel gave himself a quick once over before a somewhat smug looking grin curled across his lips.

"It would seem so..." he nodded in satisfaction, "according to previous experiments, the change should've taken place upon immediate contact."

"I... I don't believe it..." you said, still absolutely stunned by this new turn of events.

"Yatta! I don't know what we're excited about, but you did it Oikko-chan!" Honoka cheered happily, still in her own little world.

He'd done it. Your misanthropic, shut-in cousin had successfully done the impossible and actually brought the spread of "idol virus" to a dead stop, at least in your little group. Of course, now that left the issue of producing more of the stuff and distributing it before Officer Erena and the other unfortunate souls she had changed caused an epidemic.

"Well Alex, as I always say," Daniel began, still oozing satisfaction, "every problem can be solved with a liberal amount of brainpower and science, even something as incomprehensible as magic."

"I almost kinda wanna smack him," Jordan mumbled under her breath, "he doesn't have to be so smug about it."

You sighed and turned to address your friend, "you get used to it after a while, he's usually right about most things..."

Jordan didn't say anything in response, instead she was staring over your shoulder and looking like she'd seen a ghost.

"What?" you asked, "what are you looking at me like that for?"

Instead of replying, she just grabbed you by the shoulders and turned you back around. At first, you didn't see anything amiss with Daniel, who was busy jotting down the results of his impromptu drug test and muttering to the camera.

Wait a minute...

You stared at him, your heart sinking into a pit in your stomach. You noticed a pair of small, dark lumps of hair slowly emerging from two points on either side of Daniel's head, their inky black color contrasting sharply with the red hair surrounding them. The longer you stared, the larger they seemed to be growing, round black bulbs that almost seemed to resemble the ears of a mouse.

"B-but, there was no flash when I touched him! No light!" You frantically hissed at Jordan, "why is he changing?!"

"How the hell would I know, Asuka-chan" Jordan whispered, still staring at the lumps on his head.

Oh this wasn't good. Not good at all. The drug hadn't worked after all, only delayed the inevitable and removed the fancy light show that accompanied the change.

And now Daniel was going to change just as you, Kaori, and Honoka had.

"A-ano, Daniel?" you asked, not really caring at the slip in your native tongue.

Daniel looked up from his notebook curiously, the dark lumps of hair practically doubling in size.

"What is it, Alex? I need to catalogue the results before I can try and make more of this stuff before things get worse."

"Uh... Do... do you feel any different?" you asked hesitantly, eyes still locked on the now apple-sized lumps of hair as they began to quiver as if they were reaching critical mass. A pair of crimson ribbons slowly seemed to crawl out from his hair, tying themselves into neat bows at the base of each bun.

"Uh, no? Didn't we already go through this? The drug worked, Alex, there's nothing to worry about," he said firmly, totally assured in the success of his methodology.

The lumps on his head promptly burst open like pimples and long, glossy black pigtails emerged. They trailed down the sides of his head, gently brushing to just past his shoulders. You swallowed heavily, wondering how you were going to break the news that your cousin, still under the impression he had succeeded, now sported a pair of lovely pigtails that certainly fit in with the sort of "idolized" girls the virus was creating.

He looked... utterly ridiculous, you thought as you tried to stifle the giggles that suddenly threatened to burst forth from your lips. This was a serious situation! This was not a time to laugh! Daniel was changing now too!

It was really hard to stay quiet though, as Daniel's stern and confident face looked utterly unsuited to the frankly adorable tufts of hair that dangled from the both sides of his obviously male head. Jordan looked like she was trying to do the same, her cheeks flushed in trying to keep her expression neutral.

Honoka, however, had no such reservations.

"Kawaii!" the bubbly orangette gushed suddenly from her place beside you and Jordan, her eyes literally shining as she practically skipped over to Daniel's confused figure, "those pigtails look great on you, Oikko-chan!"

"Huh? Wha?" Daniel looked rightly flummoxed by your Okaa-chan's gushing, "Pigtails? I don't have-"

He reached up and his fingers encountered strands of glossy black sticking out of his head.
1441111211132112121112211113111324.title: A Pigtailed Problem

choices: Daniel begins to panic wildly, running around the lab
14411112111321121211122111131113241.content:
Daniel's eyes widened a bit, probably the largest amount of emotion you had seen in his eyes since you got here. He pulled a bit harder on his hair, grunting slightly as he accidentally pulled really hard on them. True enough, what hair he held was pure black, as glossy as the other girls in the room, and just as "perfect" as everyone else's as well. You actually wondered if he was going to panic like you and Jordan had.

Actually, you wouldn't be totally opposed to seeing that. Seeing that smug "oikko-chan" of yours actually panic like a normal person would actually really amuse you on any other day. Ugh, but this wasn't the time for that!

"I-I see....." Daniel stuttered slightly, bringing his other hand to his mouth and coughing a bit, maintaining an air of dignity. "Obviously....I must not have drank enough of it. Thankfully I made more than enough."

"Wait, you're going to drink more?" Jordan asked, hands up in a concerned motion.

"Of course," Daniel said, perhaps a little too quickly, his pigtails flying around him as he turned. "The fact that there was no flash and a slow reaction shows that there is some resistance. All it needs now is more to counteract it."

You really weren't sure if that was how things worked, not like you were any sort of doctor or whatever. Still, you knew Daniel somewhat well enough that he was really nervous underneath that facade. Most people didn't pay that sort of attention, but you knew that when Daniel started going that fast, it was typically a sign that he was nervous or agitated. You had a feeling he wasn't as confident about his diagnosis as he stated.

"Daniel, perhaps you shouldn't," you said. "You know what happens when you rush."

"It's...nothing," Daniel said as he picked up the rest of what he had cooked up. "It's.....a simple solution!"

And with that, he drunk all that remained of his "miracle drug", which frankly looked really sickening. You could only guess he didn't want to take chances, but this had to be dangerous. Hadn't the guy ever heard of overdosing?! People had died from that sort of stuff!

"Itokocousin-chan!" you cried out, running over and putting your hands on his shoulders without thinking. Then again, concern for your cousin was kind of overriding that.

"Asuka-chan!" Jordan cried out, noticing you doing that. "What are you-?!"

"This is bad, I just know it!" you replied back. However, right then, Daniel looked back and pushed you off a bit, making you stumble a couple steps back.

"Ugh......I-I......I'm fine....UGH....BLARG!" Daniel groaned, looking like he was about to hurl. "AHHH!"

He looked like he was during that one time he had stomach cramps, though you imagined this felt a lot worse. You didn't remembering feeling sick at all during your own change, which could only mean Daniel's medicine was being more of a hindrance than a help. You actually wondered if it was causing him real pain right now. The very idea of that was actually making your eyes sting at the corners.

"AHHHHHHHH!"

Daniel started to thrash a bit, arms wrapped around himself as he continued to move about what little wide open space there was. Audible gasping could be heard from all three of you as he did, looking like he was writhing in some sense of pain. However, during a little moment where he began to stay in one place, you noticed something that made your eyes widen more. Daniel was visibly shrinking! Just like all of you had! More and more, he was shrinking into his clothes, his sweatpants already pooling at the ground as he groaned, continuing to hold himself as his shirt was practically engulfing him.

"Oikko-chan!" Honoka cried out, showing something other than excitement and ran right over to hold Daniel up, trying to help.

Daniel was continuing to shrink, barely even reacting to Honoka's help. He had already shrunken down past your level, and now seemed to be getting even shorter than Honoka. Just how short was he getting? He seemed to slow down just as he got past Honoka's height, probably ending a few centimeters below her. He had to be barely reaching past 5 feet right now, looking very short compared to everyone else here.

"Are you okay, oikko-chan?" Honoka asked with concern.

Daniel's eyes had been shut the whole time, and it looked like he was struggling to open them. He wobbled on his feet, thanks to his radically shortened height and completely oversized clothes. He moved his hands to his eyes, rubbing them a bit as if they were irritated.

"Ugh.....This....can't be...." he groaned, barely getting his eyes open. "....Kore.... Suru koto wa dekimasen..." this....can't be...

That first instance of Japanese from his mouth coincided with his eyes practically flickering. His grim and dispassionate green eyes looked like they were beginning to sparkle, the light of life shining through in light red waves. He continued to blink a few times, his eyes showing green and red a few times like Christmas lights. It wasn't long though before their shape changed to the distance Japanese almost shape as well, causing his eyes to pop right open, a new ruby shine glowing from them.

As all of this was happening, the black spots that grew his pigtails spread over the rest of his hair, covering every red thread in glossy black, perfectly styled like the rest. His bangs got much longer, with part of it combed towards the left, and some falling down the middle too. A longer piece of his bangs grow on the right side, growing about long enough to reach his shoulders.

Nope....nothing had changed. Daniel was turning into a girl just like you.

"Itokocousin-chan," you came right over, eyes still stinging a bit as you went past Honoka to hold Daniel now, ruby eyes blinking constantly. "I-It'll...be okay. Somehow...." Probably not the best consoling, but you wanted to try.

"I....I don't understand...." Daniel was now visibly very uncomfortable, his eyes going even wider like an anime girl beginning to panic. "It should...It should have worked!"

Just then, a tingling went straight down to his hands, making Daniel slowly pull them right up. Rapidly, his hands were turning small and dainty, with perfectly smooth skin and trimmed fingernails. That was all rather expected from the rest of you....

But at that moment, a bright light surrounded his hands, and a pair of red fingerless gloves formed, heart shapes on the back.

Daniel....went completely silent, holding his hands up like they were alien. The normally apathetic young man was facing a crisis he never thought possible, the very concept on how he figured everything beginning to shatter. His ruby eyes shone brightly, but were filled with an ever rising panic.

And with that....he screamed...
14411112111321121211122111131113241.title: Daniel tries to drink more of his "miracle ...

choices: Yours and Jordan's/Kaori's clothing is starting to change...
144111121113211212111221111311132411.content:
In the many years you had known Daniel, you had always seen him as a veritable bastion of common sense and cold logic. Even when faced with things that should have paralyzed him with fear or uncertainty, he remained calm and rational. To him, acting on emotion and devolving into a babbling mess of indecision was just about the worst thing to do. Everything he did was calculated and firmly grounded in reality and fact. It was this stalwart behavior and unflappable attitude that you christened him the "Monster of Logic".

That being said, however, Daniel's infamous "Monster of Logic" status had a serious drawback.

When he was confronted with something that can't be rationalized and can't be controlled, Daniel tended to...

"Iieeeeeeeeeeeeeno!"

...freak out a bit...

"D-Daniel-itoko, calm down, onegai!" you futilely tried to calm your cousin down as he shrieked at the top of his lungs and began running around like a chicken with its head cut off.

But Daniel was far too panicked to even hear you as he tore around the lab in a pigtailed frenzy, frantically waving his arms in the air as if he was trying to dislodge the, admittedly, very cute red gloves that sheathed those dainty little hands of his. You knew Daniel was prone to anxiety attacks when confronted with truly troublesome situations but those normally consisted of loud, angry swearing and copious smashing of things. The sobbing and flailing about, though, that was new to you.

"Grab him! He's gonna end up hurting himself of breaking something!" Jordan cried as she leapt at him, trying to pin down Daniel's now much smaller figure as he flailed about and wailed in an almost comical fashion.

Was he actually crying waterfall tears?!

"Asuka-chan! Stop staring like a zombie and help me! Honoka-chan you too!" Jordan's flying tackle missed the twin-tailed blur narrowly and she slammed into the ground in an undignified heap, snapping you out of your disbelief.

"Hai hai! Come here Meikkoniece-chan!" Honoka chirped happily with a mock salute, joining your purple haired friend in her attempts to subdue your hysterical cousin.

Ohhhhhh good, now your Okaa-chan was calling Daniel her niece.

"Waaaaaaaaa!" Daniel cried, tears literally streaming from his watery ruby eyes, "Kore wa okori enai! This can't be happening!"

"Hold still, Meikko-chan!" Honoka had nearly grabbed him, her fingers just barely grazing the baggy pants that, somehow, still clung to Daniel's diminutive figure.

A bright flash encompassed them for a moment and the fabric came alive. The baggy black sweatpants Daniel preferred to wear billowed upwards, their length shrinking until they were barely a quarter of their original length, exposing miles of creamy white flesh not unlike your own. The fabric seemed to tear and flutter, the color flushing a vibrant shade of red that matched the gloves he wore. A layer of darker crimson ruffles emerged from underneath the skirt, for it could be nothing else at this point, as pleating and thin plaid red striping emerged from the formerly uniform fabric. A glittering gold chain snaked out from the hem, a black bow adoring it, while a layered bundle of black ruffles emerged from the right hip.

Daniel skidded to a halt, looking at the, to you anyway, rather sexy-looking ruffled black and red miniskirt that hung from his boyish hips in utter horror. He'd stopped! This was your chance before he started running around again!

"Now!" you cried, sprinting and practically tackling Daniel like a football player, the two of you slamming into the ground in a heap.

You tumbled head over heels, your hips ending up straddling your frantic cousin's tiny figure. He squirmed a struggled under you, tear-filled ruby eyes darting back and forth in sheer panic, now compounded by the newly changed skirt that covered his lower half. It was clear he wasn't going to calm down and all that thrashing might allow him to get free, so you pinned his arms over his head with one of yours, using your slightly bigger size and weight to keep them pinned.

SLAP!

You delivered a rather merciless, open-palmed slap to his left cheek with your free hand, the sharp crack and the sudden sting of pain as his head jerked to the side causing him to go rigid, his comical sobbing going silent.

"Are *huff* are you *huff* are you going to calm down now or *huff* am I gonna have to slap you again *huff*?" you panted, cheeks flushed with exertion. It was clear your shapely new female body wasn't nearly as suited for such physical activities as your old body was.

Daniel turned his head back to you, his pale cheek already sporting an angry red hand print. His eyes were still wide, but they didn't seem to have the frantic and frenzied look they'd had before. Your impromptu slap seemed to have shocked him out of it. For a moment, neither of you moved save for your heavy breathing.

"Are... are you ok, now? Have you calmed down?" you asked again, still breathing heavily.

Daniel stared at you before nodding slowly, exhaling deeply, "Y-yeah... yeah, I... I think I'm good now... gomensorry..."

You grimaced a bit, the Japanese word for sorry that your cousin had just uttered didn't give you much comfort. It seemed like whatever the "Miracle Cure" did, it only halted the changes for a scant moment before they smacked into him like a freight train. As you straddled him, you couldn't help but see how small he was now. He was downright petite in a way that even your own shorter, feminine figure wasn't. His eyes, too vibrant a red to be natural, looked huge on his face which, though you still easily recognized it as your cousin's, looked practically androgynous now. The inky black hair and pigtails did little to help, making him look almost doll-like with his soft, smooth skin.

"Ecchi... ecchi-musume-chan~" Honoka interrupted the silence with a quiet giggle.

Your heads both snapped to stare at Honoka who was trying her best to look at anything but you, he cheeks flushed heavily and playing with a lock of her orange hair in embarrassment.

Kaori, Jordan, on the other hand, was starting at you both with wide, unblinking, green eyes, her cheeks as red as you hair and a tiny trickle of blood leaking from her nose. She was fiddling aggressively with one of her own pigtails and seemed to actually have steam shooting off her head.

"As... as much as I'd love to let you guys sit like that and burn this image into my brain forever..." the purplette said slowly, her cheeks darkening further.

"Huh?" you blinked in confusion, looking down at Daniel's equally confused, and increasingly cute, features.

Oh...

You flushed deeply. In the act of tackling and subduing Daniel, you skirt had ridden up even more, revealing more of your, frankly, incredible legs as you straddled his waist. To the outside observer, it looked like a lovely redheaded girl in a school uniform in a suggestive position atop an equally cute black haired girl in a frilly skirt, ignoring the still very boyish figure under those baggy clothes.

You practically leapt off Daniel, your cheeks flushed as red as your hair in embarrassment, refusing to meet anyone's eyes. Daniel got to his feet slowly, his tiny hands tugging nervously on his ill-fitting new skirt, his cheeks equally red. He, like you, refused to make eye contact with anyone.

"We... we have a bit of problem..." Kaori continued slowly, wiping the blood off her nose, looking oddly serious despite her comically flushed cheeks.

1441111211132112121112211113111324112.content:
"And what would that be?" you asked exasperatingly. Really, you all had a bit of a problem since this whole mess started. What could add to that of all things?

"That," Kaori slowly pointed a finger behind you and Daniel?

"Huh?" Daniel cocked his head a bit before turning to see what Kaori was pointing to.

"Iieeeeeeeeeeeee!" he began to cry out once again, his small hands going to the top of his black-haired head. "Sorerade wanai!" Not those!

Little sparkles were forming up all over the lab, and you noticed them as places Daniel had run through while he was crying. Come to think of it, there was a funny feeling in the air. Hard to describe but...there was something you could tell that much. Felt like a certain energy if you could describe it somehow. Honestly, feeling it kind of gave you a similar sensation to the J-Pop music from earlier. Well, whatever the case was, they were beginning to shine brighter and brighter, beginning to engulf everything they were on.

"Totemo akaruku!" So bright Honoka covered her eyes dramatically.

All of Daniel's chemicals and other such scientific instruments began to morph and change. Some even began to began to combine into larger forms. The one closest to you stretched out into something long and thin before popping into something new.

"Is that...a guitar?" you asked, one eyebrow raised.

"Uwa ̄," Wow Honoka's smile widened and her eyes sparkled. "It's really shiny!"

Daniel was in stunned silence as he watched things continue to change. More and more, his scientific instruments continued to change into more musical instruments. And there were quite a few of them too, some of them small, and others not so small. Many of them modern, and some even looking some old-style Japanese ones as well. Aside from those, the computers he had around (to which you had always said he had too many), all began sparkling and shifting as well. They were already pretty well up to date technology-wise, so nothing changed in that regard, but their shape changed into something very difficult.

"What...is that?" you asked.

"I think...that's an audio mixer....or something," Jordan put one hand to her cheek, a bit more under control at the moment.

"It's like....a recording studio," Daniel spoke up for the first time in a while, still as stunned as before though.

The idea of that was punctuated when a space in the room was magically cleared out, making all of you jump in the air comically. Some glass walls formed over a decently-sized space, complete with microphones and headphones, and just about anything else one would need to sing.

Just like that, any traces of Daniel's old lab were gone, completely changed to a top of the line recording studio.

"Sore wa tada. ... Akka shite iru." It's just....getting worse. Kaori, Jordan, spoke again, worry still evident in her soft voice.

"Kore wa kakkoī!" This looks cool! Honoka cried out, jumping in the air excitedly. "I want to try this out!"

"Shinaide kudasai," You asked your okaa-chan sincerely to not do that before turning to Daniel. "It...might not be safe here...."

Honestly, things were getting even more out of control. This was even more extreme than your garage changing earlier. And what was that earlier with seeing Daniel actually do waterfall tears among other things? It...was almost really like something out of an anime, like an illustration of water pouring from Daniel's eyes. It was weird.

Come to think of it, you had even noticed visible sweatdrops and other such things of late. Was that a further sign of things to come?

"Uh........ahhhhhh....." You heard Daniel cry a bit, making you turn your head back to him. What you were seeing made your eyes widen a bit.

Daniel's changes weren't stopping in light of this. His t-shirt was becoming more form-fitting to his smaller frame, and turning more of a pure white too. The sleeves puffed up slightly while some fluff formed around the edges to hold them closer to his thin arms. The torso of the shirt continued to gain new designs over the front, giving off a somewhat feathery impression of a blouse if you could call it one. A big kicker though was near the bottom where the shirt started to part a little, showing off his naval.

"Ahh..." Daniel blushed heavily, wanting to cover that but not having much to cover with.

More cloth covered the top part of the shirt, with some black frilling underneath. The front of it became punctuated when a pink bow appeared out of nowhere, resting gently on his chest. Another piece of cloth emerged from the changed top, wrapping around his neck to form a cute little choker made of cloth had suited the outfit.

This didn't really surprise you, Jordan, or Honoka, given how it kind of seemed inevitable at this point. Daniel just stared at it, as if his brain was frozen in shock. Nobody seemed to be making much of a move though, making for an awkward silence aside from some high-pitched whimpering from Daniel every now and then.

"C-Come on...." you spoke up, trying to get everyone's attention. "We should..."

"Uh, Asuka-chan?" Daniel suddenly spoke up, his ruby eyes lighting up a little at his words. "Y-Your clothes."

"Hmm?" you said, before looking down. "Nani?!"

Your school uniform was beginning to light up, specifically starting at the spots where Daniel touched earlier. It was quickly spreading throughout your whole ensemble, engulfing the whole thing. Your mind went through the potential possibilities. Was it going to be an idol outfit like Daniel's?
1441111211132112121112211113111324112.title: The lab starts to change...

14411112111321121211122111131113241121.content:
“Why is it sparkling?! It’s not supposed to be sparkling!” You hissed at Kaori as she stared helplessly at the budding light show taking shape on your school uniform.

“I- I have no idea, I would’ve thought that things that have already changed wouldn’t change again!” She reasoned hesitantly, backing away from you slowly, not wanting to get any closer to whatever was about to happen.

“A-ah...” Daniel suddenly made a tiny noise of discomfort, a quiet squeak like a mouse.

You turned to your itoko-chan and found that he was looking even paler than before. His disturbingly androgynous features were screwed up in what looked like severe discomfort.

“A-ano, Daniel, daijōbuare you alright?” you weren’t sure why you even bothered asking that question, it was clear that Daniel was definitely not alright.

Your own sparkling outfit suddenly seemed far less important. Daniel’s “miracle cure” seemed to make his physical transformations far more uncomfortable than yours or Jordan’s or Honoka’s , as if whatever force was at work was punishing him for daring to interfere with said changes.

Daniel trembled slightly, his huge ruby eyes squeezing shut as his face began to change again, what little masculinity being swallowed by the encroachment of girlhood that had him in its ever tightening grip.

His face seemed to crush in on itself, the sharp lines rounding out into a far more feminine heart shape with soft, full cheeks and pale pink lips that gleamed with a slight gloss that hadn’t been there before, much like your own. His new face was notably rounder than your own somewhat aristocratic looking features, adding an irresistibly cute charm to it versus your own more elegant and beautiful face.

“I-itai...” Daniel whimpered slightly, his still somewhat male sounding voice wavering for a moment before settling into a high pitched, frankly adorable, sounding thing. It, like yours, Jordan’s, and Honoka’s, had a very distinct musical quality to it and you were certain, for some indescribable reason, sounded like a beautiful singing voice.

Teary red eyes opened again, newly darkened and volumed lashes sweeping across his eyelids as Daniel’s skin skewed away from the swarthy freckle-dusted complexion he always had and swiftly replacing it with a pale cream color, utterly bare of any blemish, almost translucent looking.

It was beautiful skin, you noted with a strange tinge of jealousy that seemed to come from deep inside your mind. It was notably lighter than your own peach toned skin, contrasting wonderfully with Daniel’s rich black pigtails and vibrant ruby eyes.

With a face like that, he was utterly adorable. Honestly, he almost looked like a porcelain doll, like something that needed a good cuddling.

“A-Asuka-itoko?” Daniel whispered, “I feel...”

“I-I know Daniel,” you tried to console the tiny girly looking boy that was your cousin, “just breath, ok?”

Daniel’s pretty face grimaced, but complied, taking deep steadying breaths as his body continued to betray him.

His already tiny figure seemed to reproportion itself under his blouse and skirt, his waist whittling down into a more narrowed, toned curve while his hips bloomed outward into a slightly fuller, rounder shape while still remaining very petite. His pale legs, almost entirely exposed by the ruffled red and black mini skirt shifted, looked longer and more shapely.

And yet, despite these new curves, with her tiny size, he almost appeared like a small girl that looked much younger than she actually was.

“Eep!” Daniel shrieked, his arms crossing over his chest as his pale cheeks flushed fire engine red. Based on his reaction, it was pretty obvious what had just grown in.

“A-ah... did... do you have...?” You tried to ask, only to receive an angry, embarrassed glare in return.

“Urusai shut up...!” Daniel hissed furiously.

His eyes flicked down to your own chest and then to Kaori’s and then to Honoka’s and his angry expression seemed to get even more so. He patted his chest and began to grumble under his breath with his cheeks puffed up. Did he look jealous?!

“...its not fair...”

You shifted uncomfortably. Daniel’s reaction was eerily similar to your own reaction to Kaori’s much more ample chest back when you had both changed. A part of you pitied him a bit. Though, your breasts were at least respectably sized, and not that mosquito bites that Daniel had likely been blessed with.

Daniel stiffened abruptly and blanched, his envious expression being replaced with a look of horror as his tiny fingers pressed against the front of his skirt.

Or perhaps it was her skirt now, judging by the horrified expression.

Daniel slowly reached down and gripped the ruffled hem of the skirt and pulled up. A pair of rather innocent looking white panties with pink lace greeted your wandering eyes, utterly devoid of any trace of Daniel’s former masculinity.

“Ecchi-itoko-chan...” Honoka’s whispered in Daniel’s ear while the twintailed girl was preoccupied with her new equipment.

Daniel shrieked in surprise, practically warping across the room.

“S-stop doing that, baka-oba-chan stupid aunt!” She hissed, holding her skirt down with an embarrassed flush.

“Ehe...,” Honoka at least had the decency to look sorry though she was doing a poor job concealing her giggles, “Gomen, meikko-chan...”

Daniel glared at the orangette before she turned her attention back to you, or more specifically, your sparkling outfit.

Oh...

In all the commotion with Daniel’s newfound foray into girlhood, you’d forgotten all about that.

Joy.
14411112111321121211122111131113241121.title: Daniel keeps changing

144111121113211212111221111311132411212.content:
The sparkles were basically covering your entire uniform now, creating a strange sensation that gave you no indication of just what was happening. Seriously though, why was it happening? It was a surprisingly slow change as well, given you just witnessed the remainder of Daniel's transformation in the meanwhile.

However, right as you were feeling that, your phone started to ring.

"Hontōni? Ima?" Really? Now? you groaned. However, once you happened to glance at the call number, you noticed it as your home phone. "It might be Susie or Victoria."

"You should answer it...probably..." Kaori piped in. "We left Susie-chan alone...."

You could see Kaori lightly slapping her forehead on that. Seemed like honorifics were just coming into everything that came out of your mouths now. Honka and...Daniel still having words, words that were more in Japanese than anything else. Daniel's vocabulary seemed to be growing pretty quickly.

"Anata wa totemo kawaī, meikko-chan," You're very cute chirped Honoka. "Daniel is not very kawaii though."

Daniel just groaned under the her aunt's star-filled gaze, feeling a whole bunch of emotions she wasn't used to feeling. In a sort of twisted way, seeing him become a bright Japanese girl was honestly quite amusing given his reactions, even though you still felt sorry for him. In any case though, you finally answered your phone.

"Kon'nichiwa," you spoke.

"Uh...hello?" Susie's squeaky voice came out. "Uh, is Alex there? I'm hungry and Mom is gone."

Your face went a little red. Crap, in all the commotion, you had left Susie more or less alone since Victoria tended to mind her own business when it came to being around the house. You did after all just take a brief little trip all the way outside just to visit your cousin.

"A, mōsugu ie ni kaerimasu!" Uh, we'll be home again soon! you cried out, only getting more confusion from Susie on the other side. "Uh...we'll be home soon...."

"Um, are you Alex's friend?" Susie asked, clearly not having any idea it was you. "And why do you have his phone?"

You...honestly had no idea how to answer her question, and you could feel the strangeness of whatever your clothes were becoming sinking in. Your sleeves felt like they were becoming longer and a lot looser, and your shirt was like it was wrapping itself closer on to your torso. Bright colors of red, pink, and white were beginning to cover the garment, with a rainbow of colors beginning to color your skirt.

"Uh.....Sayōnara!" you cried out, hanging the phone up, immediately regretting it. "That was terrible. We need to get back home. Susie's getting worried."

You didn't get much of a reply, though Kaori seemed to be looking straight at you, and Honoka and Daniel had actually stopped their conversation to look at you.

"Nani?" you asked.

"Anata no fuku...." Your clothes.... Daniel's new voice spoke out. "Soshite kami" And hair

Your eyes widened a bit, you looked down to see what had become of them. Some of the sparkles were beginning to die down, revealing how your top now resembled a short kimono. The colors had arranged in many flowery designs across the whole thing, a tapestry of beauty in all honesty. An obi of many colors including red, pink, white, and pink had now covered your waist, keeping the short kimono nice and snug on you. The skirt was about the same length as before, but now shimmering in many colors. Furthermore, your socks and shoes had become a pair of tabi and rubber geta, with their own decorations that added to the look.

Oh, and as for Daniel's last comment there? Apparently while you were busy "trying" to hold a conversation with Susie, your hair had braided itself into a new and neat hairstyle, perfectly kept up as if done by an expert.

https://i.schoolido.lu/cards/transparent...

Your face went beat red at the sight of your new look. Honoka's eyes had literal stars in them again, which didn't surprise you. Though, when you turned to Kaori, you could see her turning her head quickly, a slight trail of red coming from her nose. You sighed at that. Seriously, that again? That was getting out of hand. Well, at least it was just her...

But then you happened to glance over at Daniel. Her ruby eyes were incredibly wide.....and she had a very distinct trail of red coming down her nose.

"Nidoto nai!" Not again! you cried out, waving your arms up and down exaggeratedly.
144111121113211212111221111311132411212.title: You get a phone call.

1441111211132112121112211113111324112122.content:
For a moment, you couldn't help but stare at yourself in the mirror that hung on the wall of Daniel's lab... er.... recording studio. You already knew that your new female body was a bit of a knockout from the get-go, but your new outfit and artfully done hairstyle made your incredible looks shine like a star, so much so that you couldn't look away from your reflection.

The short kimono that had been transfigured from your school uniform was absolutely beautiful. Vibrant shades of reds, pinks, and whites drew attention to your creamy skin and vibrant red hair and eyes and really made them pop. The stylized obi was wound snugly around your waist, hinting at the perfectly slender but curvy figure that lay beneath, tied off with cords of red and white in the shape of a flower with dangling tassels that hung near the hem of your skirt.

"Utsukushiibeautiful....," you couldn't help but whisper and, before you could stop yourself, did a slow twirl in the mirror, exposing the large red bow that fanned out behind your obi and causing your skirt to flutter out beautifully.

Unfortunately, this exposed one teeny little problem.

As you stopped twirling, you found Daniel and Kaori, whose cheeks were fire-engine red, frantically trying to stem nosebleeds. Honoka was still giving you that starstruck look, with her eyes gleaming like actual stars. You flushed, pushing down on your skirt. The one problem with your new outfit was that your kimono skirt was just as short as your school uniform's miniskirt had been and exposed the vast majority of your, frankly, incredible legs and likely a brief flash of your panties, judging by Daniel's and Kaori's reactions.

"Jitto mitsumenaidestop staring at me!!" you hissed, your flush deepening as you glared at your "admirers".

"I can't help it...," Daniel mumbled, twirling one of her pigtails cutely, the bloody tissues inexplicably stuffed in her nose somewhat ruining the cute image she was unknowingly giving off. She occasionally snuck glances at you through her bangs.

So kawaii...

"Tsumari, anata wa chotto atsuiI mean, you're kind of hot...," Kaori admitted without an ounce of shame, her big green eyes still locked on your figure.

You flushed an even deeper shade of red, your entire face almost turning the same shade as your hair and steam leaking out of your ears.

"A-ah, Kaori-chan, you're creeping me out a bit..." you mumbled, hugging yourself self consciously at your purple haired friend's intense stare.

"Jiiiiiiiiiistare..."

You turned slowly, only to find your orange-haired kaa-chan's face inches away from your own, her blue eyes opened wide and sparkling like sapphires. She looked down at her white outfit and back to your kimono and her eyes flashed.

"Muuuuuuusssssuuuummmeee-chaaaaaan!" Honoka squealed, executing perfect flying tackle as she hurled herself at you with stars in her eyes.

"A-ah Kaa-chan, no!"

As soon as Honoka's grabby fingers made contact with your outfit, a bright flash covered her own clothing. The white uniform she had just "created" from Daniel's tests rapidly transfigured itself into something new, something familiar.

Her jacket and blouse slimmed down, conforming more snugly to her chest and waist while her sleeves rapidly lengthened and billowed out into wide bell-shapes. A wide obi with a large bow adorning the back emerged where her belt once sat, with stylized cords tied in the shape of a flower and tassels just like yours. Her skirt fluttered out wider and layered fabric formed over it.

Then the formerly white garment flushed with color. Vibrant shades of oranges and yellows emerged like the sunrise after a long night, and intricate flower patterns emerged, crawling across the top and skirt. Matching tabi socks and geta encased her tiny feet where her boots once were.

http://www.imagebam.com/image/d4166c1331...

Honoka giggled and pressed your flushed face into her not-insubstantial bosom, now dressed in a kimono that was, more or less, an orange and yellow variant of the kimono you now wore. And, like your kimono on your own beautiful figure, it looked great on her.

"Look musume-chan! We match!" She squealed, smashing your face further into "marshmallow hell".

Kaori and Daniel slowly looked at each other and then back to the stimulating image before them and promptly flew backwards from sudden explosive nosebleeds, landing in twitching heaps on the ground, both of their faces glowing red and spirals in their eyes. Kaori even had a slightly suggestive grin on her face and was giggling.

"S-stop Kaa-chan! Yamete!" you struggled vainly against your mother's embrace.
1441111211132112121112211113111324112122.title: On the Road Again? Not quite...

1441111211132112121112211113111324112122.content:
This was seriously getting out of hand, even compared to what had already happened. Funny how you would have actually enjoyed this more before today, if you had a girlfriend. However, this being your former mom and being a girl yourself now, this didn't feel nearly like what you would have wanted.

"Kaa-chan! Yamete!" you repeated those same words, eventually pulling yourself out of Honoka's bosom.

"Hee hee, kawaii," Honoka giggled, flaunting her skirt a bit, a little more willing to show off her own legs, which showed off her panties a bit too.

"Kaa-chan!" you cried out again. "You don't need to be so....flashy."

"Awwwww, but that's the best part," she giggled.

With that, a groan signaled that Daniel and Kaori were coming to. Daniel was wiping the blood off from her nose, trying to look at least somewhat more composed. Honestly, all that blood from the nosebleed was pretty much gone, just like in your average anime. Seriously, where was all that coming from? It looked so out of place compared to the real world. Not that it made any less sense than anything else that had been happening so far.

Kaori was still giggling a bit, her face res as she was getting up. Seeing this sort of thing from Jordan of all people was perhaps ones of the weirdest things. Seriously, when did she become so pervy? Just thinking on that reminded you from when she grabbed your breasts earlier. That still felt just as embarrassing right now as it did back then.

However, as they got up, Honoka smirked.

"Itchi suru autoshitto ga hitsuyōdesu!"We should all have matching outfits! she jumped in the air.

However, as your eyes widened at what she said, you pulled her down.

"Kaa-chan! What about Susie?!" you cried back. "We need to go back!"

"Hai hai," Honoka shrugged, not taking any apparent offense.

Honestly, it really was about time to leave, given it was near mid-day now. You didn't want to risk changing more of the mansion, and you imagined Daniel didn't either. With that, you ran over and helped him up while Honoka grabbed Kaori.

"Gomen'nasai," you said as you pulled Daniel along. "We just got you dragged into this."

"Daijōbudayo," Daniel said, still feeling about the same as she did before. Honestly it was startling how much shorter she was now compared to you. "It's....just a new experience..."

You could tell Daniel was trying to keep an air of composure like she used to, but it was clear it was hard to to do so. Kind of like how Kaori had some new qualities, it seemed like Daniel had some too, whatever those were. You had to admit though, getting a closer look, she was indeed super beautiful. Her skin especially looked wonderful. Honestly, you felt a similar kind of jealousy compared to Kaori's large breasts. Funny how you all seemed a little more sensitive regarding your bodies now.

Come to think of it, you wondered how to even call Daniel right now.

"Say...Daniel?"you asked as you were coming down the last set of stairs. "You...have a name?"

Daniel looked a little confused as to what you had meant, though it barely took a second for there to be a sparkle in her ruby eyes like some sudden realization. Granted, you could tell the idea embarrassed her a little.

"N-Naomi....." she queaked.

"Naomi-chan?" you spoke almost instinctively. You actually smiled at that. "Sore wa kawaī namaedesu." That's a cute name

Daniel' face went red at that, though it felt like she held your hand a little tighter as you were pulling her out of the mansion. You had to wonder about the last time she even went out of here. Still, it was pretty cute to see her reaction.

"Ohhhhh, that IS kawaii!"

And sadly, the worst possible person heard it. Right when you weren't looking, Honoka appeared from behind Daniel, wrapping her up in a big hug that started making her outfit glow just like yours. Daniel stuttered as the inevitable changes started, her old idol outfit transforming into a matching short pink kimono. An assortment of white flower designs adorned the outfit, with some orange tassel and an obi that resembled your own to an extent. A little pink flower even adorned itself around her left pigtail.

For all intents and purposes, it was very similar in theme aside from a little more flutter on the skirt. One little difference though were the socks, which almost looked more like white stockings that reached her thighs.

And as Daniel was left to stutter in her new outfit, you actually had to suppress a nosebleed yourself. Seriously, being that cute should be a crime. She was so much like an adorable doll.

"Now we match!" Honoka cried out.

Apparently, during their trip downstairs, Honoka had taken the liberty of changing Kaori's as well. Hers was by far the darkest theme, that or a vibrant purple with its own flower arrangements. Some lighter colors adorned the bottom of the skirt, but otherwise it was a dark contrast to the other brighter uniforms. No less cute though.

Well....if Honoka was satisfied, what were you to do about it now? You sighed as you took it all in, seeing you all in matching kimono outfits.

"Subarashī. ... Sāikō!" Great....now let's go!

And with that order, you finally got everyone to head into the car. Time to get back before things got worse for Susie.
1441111211132112121112211113111324112122.title: You get ready to leave.

choices: A message pop-up on your screen. It's one of your friends.
Your mother's voice rattling the floorboards.
One of your sisters barging into your room. Without knocking, of course.
14412.content:
It was… a country album. God, it might be the country album.

A cobalt blue sky stretched across the landscape of the CD, the field of grain and cherry red barn completing the assembly of primary colors. The brown moonshine jug in the foreground shattered that aesthetic to pieces, along with the title — you had to stifle a giggling fit, lest it undo you — ‘Jean Shorts and Dirt Roads’, in a black blotchy-paint-font.

You didn’t exactly hate country; Johnny Cash was a decent listen, Willie Nelson was alright, and, hell, Marty Robbins scored a good deal of your virtual treks through the Mojave. But songs of the ‘country pop’ genre — as you’ve heard it called — all seem to be about pickup trucks, denim, beer, and barn-adjacent parties. Judging by its art, this album seemed to be of the latter variety.

Your feet travel towards your computer half-automatically. Morbid fascination thrums through your body like electricity. You have to see what this album is like.

You plop down in your computer chair and open the disc drive on your PC, catching the name on the disc: ‘Brandi Staxx’. God, this is going to be wonderful.

You do some cursory Googling while the disc whirls to life in your tower. But, confusingly enough, you can’t turn up any results for the album. You turn up a few near-misses for the name, but they all belong to adult film stars or strippers. Figures.

“Must be a debut.” you mutter to yourself. But curiously enough, the record label doesn’t even seem to exist. How could that be?

An Explorer window pops up with the disc’s data, as if to interrupt your thoughts. You nearly bust a gut at the song titles: ‘Nothin’ Hotter Than A Farmer’s Daughter,’ and ‘Rollin’ Around in the Harvested Hay’ being two particular highlights.

You hurriedly start the transfer of your songs to your iPhone. This’d be great to show the guys.

You snag your phone after a few seconds of data transfer, ready to listen to some absolute dreck, but you’re stopped by…
14412.title: A country album

144122.content:
“AAALLLLEEXXX! YOU HAVEN’T FORGOTTEN ‘BOUT HELPING TED, RIGHT?!”

Shit. You scrabble for your mouse and click your computer off. “IN A BIT, MOM!”

Ted Dawson was a… really cool guy. It was kinda hard to say that about a guy twenty years your senior, but it was true. A long-time family friend, Ted was a pseudo-uncle to you and your sisters (even though Victoria would never admit it in recent years), and a… friend to your mom? You tried really hard to not focus on that ellipses, and the implication it carried.

But yeah, Ted was cool. He even gave you your first beer three years back. You hated it, sure, but it was the thought, and not the boisterous laughter coming from him, that counted.

You had been enlisted, through the contractor Heidi Tucker, to help him at his place of work for three or four hours. Your mom said that minimum wage would be fine, but you knew that Ted’d probably slip in a fifty or something.

“YOU BETTER HAVE YOUR BUTT IN GEAR, MISTER!”

“I SAID IN A BIT, MOM!” you holler back, snatching your phone and earbuds from your desk. Can’t do some work without tunes, after all. You hastily put on a flannel and jeans over your white tee and underwear, and stumble down the stairs with lightning speed.

Your mom greets you with a cold breakfast and a frown. “You better drive safe, mister.” She points an imperious finger at the clock as you grab a cold piece of toast.

You grab a piece of toast and wave at her dismissively. “Yeah, yeah,” you mumble through the mouthful of wheat. Ted was close enough that you didn't need to drive, and there wasn't much traffic around his business.

The last thing you catch before you wobble out of the kitchen is your mom's face softening into a small smile.

"Say hello to Ted for me."

You somehow manage to not retch and shoot a quick affirmative before the garage door closes behind you.

What business does Ted own?
144122.title: Your mother's voice rattling the floorboards.

choices: To have you listen to the full album
1441221.content:
Ted owned a local woodshop and carpenter business. He specialized in things like kitchen remodeling and building of cabinets, shelves, etc.

You had been helping out here the last couple years mostly as a set of extra hands helping move large pieces of wood and in return Ted paid you a little bit under the table.

As you came into the warehouse several of the workers waved at you as you waved back heading into Ted’s office.

To your surprise as you came into the office you saw Ted there on his computer as he was playing a country album on his computer. It was strange because you recognized it as the title song of the album you had just downloaded earlier.

“Hey Ted, you needed me today?” You said not making any mention of the music yet.

“Hey Alex, thanks for coming, actually I need your help today with something a bit different.” Ted said.

“Oh moving something else?” You asked curious.

“No...this really isn’t a physical job it’s a bit...different than other things I’ve had you do before.” Ted said in a rather odd sounding tone.

Ted’s next request was for sure a strange one...What does he want?
1441221.title: A woodshop.

info.brief_description: A resurrected story of change and being changed where anything can happen.
info.description:
Howdy!

Your life was decidedly dull. That was fact you couldn't escape. Average house, average family, average looks... just average everything.

Characters

You name is Alexander J Tucker, or more commonly, just Alex. You're, unsurprisingly, a pretty average kid of seventeen, 5'11, slim but sinewy build. You're a bit of a misanthropic shut-in with a few close friends, love strategy and racing games and have a mild obsession with messing around under the hoods of old classic cars. Despite your rather cynical outlook, you're an annoyingly average and unremarkable brown haired, brown eyed kid.

Heidi Tucker nee Hewitt (Your Mother) - A 39-year old mother of three. She had apparently been a bombshell when she was younger but the strain of giving birth and raising 3 children all on her own while having very little time for herself lead her to put on a lot of weight. She's a kindhearted woman, if a little clingy towards her children, who does her best to provide for her family. She's the very image of the Hewitt-clan, pale skinned, green eyes, and deep red hair. She's fairly short at 5'2 with a thickly set, pear shaped figure with a very generous bustline (https://i.pinimg.com/736x/83/94/90/839490247f5a64205c95340dd2baba3d.jpg)

Victoria Tucker (Your Elder Sister) - 19 years old, a freshman in college, and queen bitch. You and Victoria, or Tori as she prefers to be called, have never really gotten along. There might have been a time you two could be in a room together without devolving into verbal sparring but ever since she got to high school, those days had long since come to an end. To you, she's the very image of a spoiled, stuck up, hot girl with a nasty attitude that could curdle milk. Like her Mother, she is the very picture of the Hewitt genes, with the same eye color, skin tone, and red hair as your mother with none of the extra weight. She's hot and she knows it. (https://thumb-p9.xhcdn.com/a/3t0ZoW7UgHLtDIWA5QjsyA/000/229/267/249_1000.jpg)

Susanna Tucker (Your Younger Sister) - 10 years old and a hyperactive little hellion. She's a mischievous little imp who's deceptively intelligent behind her childish bearing and knows how to wind your mom around her little finger. She's strong with the Hewitt genes with the same red hair, pale skin, and greenish blue eyes as both Victoria and your Mother. She's a tiny thing, only 3'8, but already showing signs of the same sort of beauty as your Mother and Elder Sister. (https://i.pinimg.com/736x/d8/f8/04/d8f80414e89807ee6e32a22e7a5ab68f.jpg)

Adrianna Newman nee Hewitt (Your Aunt) - A deceptively youthful looking woman of 42, she hardly looks her age, appearing in her early thirties. She has the typical Hewitt-clan vibrant red hair and creamy pale skin, though she is unique in the fact that she's heterochromic, with on brown eye and one green. She has a bombshell hourglass figure with the perfect amount of curves, and large breasts. She inherited the old Hewitt family manor and all of its mysteries. Her teasing nature hides her true motives (https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DrIEBzhW4AArihu.jpg)

Christina Newman (Your Aunt's Daughter) - The very image of a breathtaking example of fine breeding, your 21-year old cousin Christina could certainly turn heads. Unfortunately, like your sister, she has a fair bit of Queen Bitch Syndrome, though to a lesser extent. While she never goes out of her way to bother you, neither does she treat you particularly kindly, preferring a standoffish and distant attitude. She has the typical Hewitt family red hair, pale white skin, and green eyes. She's arguably more beautfiul than Victoria with her hourglass fiugre, lovely face, and D-cup breasts. The sort of beauty that turns heads without trying. (https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CXwBrl0WkAQtyCf.jpg)

Daniel Newman (Your Aunt's Son) - The sole exception to the rule, your 19 year old cousin Daniel is the only male in your mother's side of the family to have the Hewitt red hair and green eyes. He's a notorious shut in and has a disdain for most of humankind. He is incredibly intelligent, having graduated from MIT when he was 15. You and him get a long fairly well, being the "family rejects" with bitchy sisters. He's a good looking, if scruffy guy and always looks like he'd prefer to be anywhere else. (https://outsons.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/546160b5f156006abb854a261a5ee145-...)

Jenny Williams (Teacher) - Your 28-year old chemistry teacher, as well as your favorite teacher in school. An expectant single mother to be, she still does her best to teach her classes to the best of her ability despite being heavily pregnant. She has a bit of a soft spot for you and often relies on your help in class given her reduced mobility. A lovely woman with a beautiful face, warm brown eyes, and silky blonde hair, she's the subject of many a crush from her male students, yourself included (https://x.imagefapusercontent.com/u/jizzbanger/3927509/962886493/Pregnant3686.jp...)

Lindsay Riker (Classmate) - 17 years old and a rare exception to the hot/popular girl has to be a stuck up bitch stereotype. Lindsay has been your classmate for a long time, she's pretty, and a member of the school dance team, and has been one of the few popular kids to treat you kindly. She's the very image of a high school beauty with tanned skin, soft blonde hair, a slender figure, and modest C-cup breasts. (http://www.imagebam.com/image/d172871328152985)

Stephanie Adams (Classmate) - 17 years old and one of your few female friends. Both of you have been the butt of ridicule from the popular crowd and it became a way for you two to bond as friends. A sarcastic girl with strong country accent and a pension for getting her hands dirty, you two had been friends since freshman year. She's of average height, about 5'5, a slightly chubby and busty figure, and strawberry blond hair. She wears braces to fix her bad teeth and becomes quickly agitated when they're mentioned. (https://cdn5-images.motherlessmedia.com/images/65EF1AB.jpg?fs=opencloud)

Sophia Talbot (Neighbor) - 19 years old, Sophia and her family moved in next door not long ago. Sweet and good-natured, Sophia has that girl-next-door charm to go with her good looks. She's quite literally Victoria's polar opposite in terms of attitude, which has you nursing a not-so-tiny crush on her. She's a somewhat short thing, about 5'1, with a very busty figure with just a hint of chubbiness to her, long glossy black hair, dark brown eyes, and glasses (https://i.pinimg.com/originals/39/f2/f3/39f2f33be8aba26a6fd71f34d887667a.jpg).

Carolina Fortes - 19 years old, and your sister's best friend from college, Carolina, though she prefers to go by Carrie, is a bit of an odd fit. A half-blooded girl with a Filipino father and American mother, she's quite the looker, with copper toned skin typical of Filipinos and long, thick and silky black hair, slender, supple figure, with legs, ass and hips that you've not-so-secretly ogled many times. She tends to dress in snug clothing, usually tank tops and yoga pants, that's easy to move around in given her place on the University's cheerleading team. Unlike Victoria though, Carrie seems to be a genuinely friendly and outgoing person, making her friendship with your elder sister a bit of an odd thing. She's at your house quite a bit with school being out for the summer (http://www.imagebam.com/image/7397161333700134)

In your humdrum life of woe and misery, summer vacation has just begun. The weather is heating up and school has come to and end. All things considered, it's a normal summer for a normal kid.

Fortunately for you, however, your life as you know it is about to change drastically.

Howdy!

Welcome to the story! I only have a couple of rules for those that want to add to the story. The subject matter is TG TF related but it can realistically be anything you want, just no smut and such, m'may?

#1: Use proper grammar! Try and keep the nonsense speak and crap spelling and punctuation out of here, m'kay? I'll be watching, children. If things get too nasty I'll likely edit them up.

#2: Try and refrain from overly simplistic changes and additions. So none of "Suddenly he had tits and stuff, da end" m'kay? This is a place where a well written change is appreciated and encouraged. Unless its a chapter solely for choices, keep things longer than a sentence.

#3: Don't intentionally dead-end chapters, I'll step in and edit them up a bit if need be.

#4: Go nuts! Have fun with it!

Other than that, go crazy.
Warmest Regards

SpookyNoodles
